reviews/6/comments: This is an amazing property in Snowmass. A top location in the centre of village within a few steps to a ski lift either a restaurant. The place is sparkling clean with a fully equipped luxury kitchenware. Our family were enjoy staying here and will surely stay here again when come back to Snowmass.
reviews/6/response: It was a great pleasure hosting you Gap. Thank you for staying with us and I hope you visit again soon :)
reviews/7/comments: Amazing property, perfect location. 👍
reviews/7/response: Thank you for staying with us Jian. Please visit again soon :)
reviews/8/comments: Clean
reviews/8/response: Thank you Jimmy, you are always welcome back:)
reviews/9/comments: Place is extremely nice and clean. Great location for when things are open.
reviews/9/response: I'm glad you love the place Nic! I'm sure by the time you come back, more places will be open:)

name: Private Luxury Aspen Ranch w/10,000 sq ft Home
reviews/0/comments: Patak Ranch is a truly special place. We were so lucky to spend a weekend here, and Casey was a phenomenal host- communicative, flexible, and helpful. The ranch is just spectacular, and I can highly recommend staying here.
reviews/1/comments: This place is great.  If you want a secluded paradise near Aspen, this is your place.  The host was very responsive and so was the ranch manager.  During our two week stay the heated pool and pool cover wasn’t working as well as the outdoor fire pit.  The ranch manager wasn’t able to get someone to fix it during our stay.  For what we paid, we expected everything to be perfect.  If those things were working, it would have been perfect.
reviews/2/comments: This home is STUNNING! Other than spotty wifi (which we enjoyed in the sense that we were able to check out and be present) our stay was impeccable. Views are incredible, host is easy to reach and helpful, and the property is like something out of a dream. Was the perfect backdrop for a magical trip. Thank you so much!
reviews/3/comments: Beautiful location!
reviews/4/comments: the home was gorgeous! pictures don’t do it justice because it’s much more massive and beautiful in person! i had a group of 16 young adults — we all slept comfortably and the amenities were more than enough. i’d absolutely recommend this home to anyone needing a getaway. there is wifi service in the home — not enough for streaming, but we were fine. be sure to bring your own speakers if you like music for your group! casey was also very communicative rather quickly, so i never needed to worry about anything. 10/10, i’d definitely come back!
reviews/5/comments: Great stay will be coming back!!
reviews/6/comments: It is a beautiful place. We had a great time, I highly recommend this gorgeous house. Just stunning!
reviews/7/comments: This is hands-down the most positive Airbnb experience I’ve had to date. Not only are the photos and description perfect, the communication with the host was superlative. This is one of the most beautiful homes I’ve ever had the pleasure of staying in and I wish I could come back again soon! The house manager made things very easily, and the house perfectly accommodated our 11 guests. The pool and hot tub looking out onto snowmass mountain was so perfect. Thank you, Casey! You’re the best 🤩🙏🏻
reviews/8/comments: This property was nothing short of SPECTACULAR. Due to the pandemic, I was looking for an AirBnb that allowed small weddings. This listing popped up and we fell in love with just the pictures and felt it was the perfect place to get married. Casey has been very responsive and answering any questions I had since it was a big decision without even seeing the property itself. She has done a beautiful job getting this property ready with all its renovations that is conducive for a wedding. The house felt like a maze but was so much fun exploring it. It has anything and everything you need. My family and guests were in awe and this house and view is definitely worth every penny. They also have a property manager on-site that was available for any questions or problems. I would highly recommend this gorgeous property and would rent this place out again!
reviews/9/comments: My family had a great time here! The house and the views are incredible. The amenities provided are outstanding. The home was spacious for our large group. It’s a great home for kids too. The ranch manager they have on property was so helpful and nice during our stay. We will definitely be back!

name: Hayden Lodge 2304
Newly Renovated Ski-In, Ski-Out "Treehouse"
reviews/0/comments: Great location great communication great decoration = great vacation!
reviews/1/comments: We loved our stay! Would stay again, highly recommend!
reviews/2/comments: Really nice place.  Great location.  Very well appointed and was perfect place to stay to discover Aspen
reviews/3/comments: A+ stay. Everything from the place itself, the cleanliness, modern amenities, the location and the service from Monika were all top notch. We slept 6 very comfortably and there was room for more. Cannot recommend enough
reviews/3/response: Ben, thank you for the great review! You were terrific guests and we are so pleased that you enjoyed the condo and your time in Aspen! We love it there and are especially happy when our guests are happy!
reviews/4/comments:
If you want to ski and have every amenity you could want in a private and brilliantly located option, this is the place for you.

From the convenience of being within 10 minute walk to the best restaurants and bars in Aspen to being able to ski out at Ajax, this is the best spot in Aspen.
reviews/4/response: Thank you for the great review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay in Aspen and that the condo suited your needs!
reviews/5/comments: We loved the “Treehouse!”. It is in a great location, very clean and well stocked for an Airbnb! Monika got back to us quickly with any questions we had.
reviews/6/comments: This was a beautiful, modern condo perfectly situated at the base of the mountain. We parked when we arrived and never had to drive. We hiked the mountain (12 miles!) and enjoyed great food.  The supermarket was close by and we cooked in the fantastic kitchen. The farmers market and bookstore are a must. The condo decor was cool and comfy and the owners left great snacks for us to enjoy. Any questions we had were answered immediately. Thanks for a memorable stay for a milestone "empty nesting" with our friends.
reviews/6/response: Thank you for the terrific review! We are so glad you enjoyed your weekend with friends.
reviews/7/comments: Great location.

name: downtown aspen luxury living in 1bed/bath condo
Lounge on a Cozy Window Seat at a Mountain Haven
reviews/0/comments: Perfect place to stay for Aspen! Quick drive or bus into town and quiet, we’ll designed house. Autumn was super responsive and accommodating.
reviews/1/comments: great location near aspen central! close by to everything. we enjoyed our stay. clean home. only issue  has was a slow drain in one of the showers. nicely decorated. Clean.
reviews/2/comments: Amazing house and host. Kitchen absolute joy. Best part of trip was a last minute thrown together with four friends all cooking at once in the kitchen. Plus the house is just really cool.
reviews/3/comments: The place was beautiful immaculate clean. Peaceful and amazing way to spend a week in Aspen. Highly recommend.
reviews/4/comments: Absolutely excellent home. Clean, comfortable, close to town. Great experience, would definitely stay again.
reviews/5/comments: Great host. Comfortable and clean home. We enjoyed our time in Aspen.
reviews/6/comments: We had a lovely stay in Autumn's home. She went out of her way to make us feel welcome! Great location - quick walk to town - in a beautiful neighborhood.
reviews/7/comments: Autumn was wonderful and helped us out of a different property that was not as written. She communicated as we needed and the house feels like a “home!”
reviews/8/comments: Autumn’s home was wonderful for our small group of girls celebrating an intimate bachelorette party. It ended up being so cozy that we spent more time at the house than we anticipated. The beds and common areas were comfortable, and we loved spending time on the wrap around patio. The location was nicely tucked away but still close enough to the heart of town. Autumn went above and beyond to accommodate our group. Really great experience!
reviews/9/comments: Wonderful location just outside town. So quiet and  peaceful, but close to the action. We walked or biked into town most days. Great set up for families or couples, clean and good amenities. Autumn is super communicative, responded quickly and addressed our needs well. And she welcomed us with a lovely bottle of Rose!

name: Unobstructed Mtn Views. Expansive Aspen Core Condo
reviews/0/comments:
If you want to be in the heart of the best restaurants this condo is right in the mix. So many amazing places to eat. We loved the pool it was amazing to have it since the weekend was hot.

They key pad lock to the door was the hardest. When we were unpacking the wind closed door with all electronics in the condo so we were locked out. It’s a 9 digit code . Had to walk to a hotel to log in and get the pad codes again. So the only issue was the key pad and getting locked out twice, after a day on the jeep ride the phone died with the information again on the phone. Lol. Let’s say the key pad and I did not enjoy each- other !!

Other than the pad this place was amazing and I’m writing the code on my hand next time. Thanks for hosting
reviews/0/response: So sorry you did not find the keypad access convenient. This is the first I’ve heard of it. We have redundancy for access (actual key in a lockbox, additional codes) and could have let you in quickly and effortlessly, had you reached out. Glad to hear it worked out and you enjoyed your stay.
reviews/1/comments: Perfect location 1 block from the best restaurants.  Also parking was so simple in front.  Went to aspen last minute to hike host was very easy to deal with and unit worked perfect. Will come back soon.  Really comfortable bed.
reviews/2/comments: Fantastic location, clean and comfortable. I could have slept forever in that bed! B’s place was perfect for my stay and I highly recommend!
reviews/3/comments: B was a wonderful host. Everything was super easy and as advertised. Location/views were amazing. Would stay here again!
reviews/4/comments: Highly communicative and helpful
reviews/5/comments: Great, cozy space! Near all the action. Walking distance to virtually all the best spots. Would definitely use B’s place again!
reviews/6/comments: Amazing stay! Very nice condo and great location.
reviews/7/comments: Great place , awesome location , helpful host
reviews/8/comments: Me and my two kids decided to go to Aspen for midwinter break. We found B’s condo, and it looked to be perfect: 2BR (and 2 bathrooms!) with 2 separate beds for kids, walkable to downtown, just a few blocks from Aspen Mountain, and seemingly beautiful accommodations. It definitely did not disappoint! We had the best time! The place is mountain cozy. The living room was great to light a fire, relax, and unwind after long days of skiing (Aspen Mountain day 1, then Buttermilk and Snowmass). We spent a few nights in the hot tub while the snow was falling around - so fun! I grilled us steaks on the patio one night, and we walked to dinner the others. We made great memories I don’t think they’ll ever forget. The kids tell me we’re coming back every year. I agree!
reviews/9/comments: The condo was absolutely perfect and everything we needed for our stay. The space was clean and extremely comfortable. Check in was easy and communication with the host was amazing. They made sure that we were accommodated which is really important. We will definitely be staying here again.

name: 7 Castles Ranch
reviews/0/comments: We had our wedding at 7 Castles Ranch and it was the most amazing experience. Chris was the best host. He was so helpful and accommodating. Could not have asked for a better location.
reviews/1/comments: Such a beautiful home!!
reviews/2/comments: Beautiful home in a magical location!
reviews/3/comments: This was my groups second time staying here. Chris is a very accommodating host who knows the area well. The property is beautiful the house is clean, comfortable, and spacious, with great views of the canyon and river access. We will be back.
reviews/4/comments: What a great place with great views and a very cool host!  The house had everything we needed.
reviews/5/comments: Absolutely amazing experience - all around.  Gorgeous location with views that are the best we’ve ever experienced.  House was exactly as described and perfect for our needs.  And to top it all off, Chris was an exceptional host.  He greeted us upon our arrival and was super responsive and supportive throughout our stay.  If you have the chance to stay here, you won’t regret it.  Our highest recommendation!
reviews/6/comments: This place is amazing and the check in process was a breeze. Chris is a superb host, very eager to make your vacation fun and memorable, and also very quick to respond to your questions (before and during your stay). I cannot recommend this place enough.
reviews/7/comments: Chris had went above and beyond for our stay in Basalt. We hope to come back soon!
reviews/8/comments:
House was amazing.
Chris is the best host you could ask for.
Location is superb.
Loved it!
reviews/9/comments: This was an awesome house to stay at with breathtaking views. Chris was so welcoming and gave us lots of food suggestions and things to do in the area and was eager to help with any questions we had. Really made us feel at home away from home. The no AC was a bit of a surprise but that’s on me for not reading the description! But even in June the house was still a comfortable temperature. Very clean inside and the house both inside and out was so beautiful. We really enjoyed our stay and cannot wait to come back. Definitely recommend!!

name: Snowmass Ski-In/Ski-Out Chalet w/Shared Pool/Hot Tub/Private W/D + Free WiFi!
reviews/0/comments: The place was as pictured and the staff was nice. we stayed on the 5th floor and had to take elevator to the 4th floor then walk up some stairs to the 5th floor. very inconvenient with suitcases. overall was a great time.
reviews/1/comments: Awesome place. highly recommended 👍🏼
reviews/2/comments: Absolutely wonderful condo with gorgeous views and plenty of space!
reviews/3/comments: Great location. Friendly and helpful staff. Easy check in and check out. Free shuttle service. Great views. Beautiful condo with lots of space. Nice little bonus room with tv and pull out couch. Would definitely recommend. 5 Stars.
reviews/4/comments: The unit is in a very nice spot for winter or summer activities. It is located directly on a run which was nice for mountain biking. The employees were very helpful and friendly. The only negative thing I have to say is the facility is starting to age. Multiple windows either wouldn't open (summer visit) or were missing screens. Multiple outlets didn't work which made it tricky for charging phones and running a fan. If the maintenance of the unit is stepped up it would be a five star place.
reviews/4/response: Hi Jared, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We apologize for any inconvenience during your visit. We are happy to report that the outlets are working. There was a flipped breaker that has been remedied. Screens have been measured and will be replaced for windows. We hope to host you again in the future!

name: Cozy home in the heart of Aspen w/ Private Jacuzzi
reviews/0/comments: Very good location near town but also you get road noise and no views. Loft spaces only suitable for young adults. House is a rental and not a home. It’s tired and basic hospitality items to welcome guest have been forgotten.  Overall rather than expected sophistication and charm it’s very ordinary at a high price.
reviews/1/comments: Great spot on quiet end of Aspen’s beautiful downtown.
reviews/2/comments: This house is so adorable and charming, truly a classically beautiful house with all the modern amenities. The rain shower and super comfortable beds were a great plus! It did feel tight with 8 people, however, it was still a great place for me and my family to spend the weekend. Would come here again next time I'm in Aspen.
reviews/3/comments: Location location location!  We adored this charming Victorian house in Aspen's West End and could not have had a better experience.  Cute house, clean, comfortable, stylish, great internet, great A/C, fantastic hot tub...the list goes on and on.  Plus we walked and biked everywhere in Aspen from this perfectly located home.  We felt like locals and enjoyed walking to the coffee shop, to get pizza, to go hiking...you name it, we walked there and loved it.  We would stay here again and again.  Such a wonderful experience -- thank you Jamie for being a fantastic host!
reviews/4/comments: Great house in a great location. Highly recommend.
reviews/5/comments: Beautiful house! They’ve used the space really creatively to make it a comfy stay. Location also can’t be beat. Host is very quick to respond to communication.
reviews/6/comments: Great place, great location, great host. Highly recommend.
reviews/7/comments: The reality lives out just like the listing - charming aspen west end stay. We will be back!
reviews/8/comments: Adorable house. Great location. Very enjoyable family trip.
reviews/9/comments: We had a great stay here! The accommodations are modern, while some of the decorations preserve the house's history. The location is nice and central, but in a quieter part of downtown. The bed was very comfortable!

name: Remodeled Luxury Condo in Capital Peak Lodge
reviews/0/comments: This location was prime for our family. Very clean and convenient. Everything you could need was located walking distance within the area including snowboarding/skiiing, equipment rentals, restaurants, bars, shops, etc. Great for families, kids and adults. Will definitely be returning!
reviews/1/comments: Awesome stay, great communication, easy access to everything. Enjoyed myself in Snowmass.
reviews/2/comments: Clean apt ..I will def come back to same place for future aspen trip
reviews/3/comments: Impeccable stay. The Place was at a very convenient location with a beautiful setting and view. The condo was very clean and I was surprised to see that it even came with amenities such as shampoo and there were even condiments in the refrigerator. The service was excellent and it seemed like we were staying at a luxury hotel, Doug and his group were that attentive. I highly recommend this place and hope to make it back there again at some point.
reviews/4/comments: This was an amazing condo. Super clean and comfortable. Location was perfect and it was great that Doug gave us a tour of village, condo and parking.  Great service. I would highly recommend staying there

name: Alpenblick Unit 10
reviews/0/comments: No thank you
reviews/1/comments: We had a great stay! Location is perfect.
reviews/2/comments: Amazing - 4 comfortable bedrooms, great kitchen appliances, perfect location.

name: Aspen Mountain Residences - Ski MLK Weekend!
reviews/0/comments: The condominium was in a perfect location just steps from everything you need in downtown Aspen. Jackie was an excellent host with the communication and check in with super easy. The service and valet is impeccable.
reviews/0/response: Thanks Sue! So glad you and your family had a great time :)

name: Aspen Highlands CO | Ritz Carlton Residence Club | 3 Bedroom Premier
Ski-In/Ski-Out Home in Snowmass w/Shared Hot Tub/Pool/WiFi/Private Washer/Dryer!
reviews/0/comments: Highly recommend
reviews/1/comments: The place was really nice, perfectly located, very comfortable. The only problem was the host never replied to any texts when I tried contacting them regarding an extra night. I texted them 3 different times and never got a reply.
reviews/2/comments: Squirrel infested kitchen in our unit. I get it, it's the mountains, but the solution to address this was to trap one in the cupboard overnight (woke up to the little dude trying to scratch his way out) and call animal control the next day. We were told the problem was addressed, until we saw another squirrel the second night at which time they told us that animal control actually said there were likely more in the unit. They eventually moved us to another unit, but this was poorly handled.
reviews/2/response: Derek, we apologize for the service issues that impacted your visit. We are happy to report that we've successfully treated for any unwanted pests, and we hope for another opportunity to provide you with an exceptional vacation experience in the future!
reviews/3/comments: A great place a short drive or shuttle to the center of Snowmass Village!  The check-in process was easy at the main desk and the guys were really nice.  The space is nice and open and was great for our group of 6.  Beautiful views of the slopes and mountains.  We enjoyed the hot tub!
reviews/4/comments:
This condo is beautiful. My mother/father-in-law enjoyed the King master bedroom with large bathtub while hubby and I took the 2nd bedroom with King bed. My 3 boys stayed in the double twin with trundle room that had its own bathroom and felt like royalty! The kitchen was great too. We always forget to bring things like seasoning so we had to run to Clark’s Market before dinner the first night. It’s a whopping 2 minutes (if that) from the condo!
The boys spent plenty of time in our 2 days here, swimming in the heated pool and soaking in the hot tub! The VIEWS...WOW! Leah was in contact with me prior to our arrival to make sure all was well. Wonderful hosts and I hope we have the opportunity to come back to Aspen and stay here again!!!
reviews/5/comments: Amazing weekend! Leah is superhostes with mostest. Shuttle was very convenient as well.
reviews/6/comments: Leah and Jason were very responsive and gracious hosts. Their home is amazing! Our favorite part was the gorgeous view of the mountains and the ski slopes. The space is large, yet cozy. The fireplace, hot tub, massive comfy couch were all bonuses. We would definitely stay here again!

name: Splendid 2br Core Aspen, walking distance to all!
reviews/0/comments: Andrew’s place was one of our ultimate favorite Airbnb experiences. You cannot beat the location and the condo feels homey but also very clean. We had a wonderful time!
reviews/1/comments: I can't say enough positive things about Andrew's place.  The accommodations are great and the location is even better you are within walking distance to everything.  I would highly recommended Andrew's place...except for when we want to use it again 😀.
reviews/2/comments:
Andrew is a wonderful host, responding very promptly to inquiries with lots of great recommendations.
Condo is sparklingly clean, and perfectly situated in Aspen.
reviews/3/comments: This place may seem a bit expensive but worth every bit. The floor plan, cleanliness and location make it worth it!
reviews/4/comments: We had a great stay at Andrew's place. Perfect location for walking into town
reviews/5/comments: Cozy, stylish and well appointed condo within walking distance to most anything downtown.  Hosts provided great recs for food and were very responsive before and during stay to our questions.  Loved every minute of our visit to Aspen and our stay in their home!
reviews/6/comments: This is a very nicely appointed condo with new furnishings and very professionally decorated.  There were every amenity we have at home and Andrew is a very thoughtful, responsive and concerned host. It is located in the heart of Aspen and walkable to everywhere.  We didn’t rent or need an auto.   We would absolutely stay there again.  Thanks Andrew!
reviews/7/comments: Great, clean place that is true to description and close to everything - main ski lift, restaurants and shopping, etc.  Perfect for two couples. Hosts were very responsive and check in was a breeze. I would rebook in a heartbeat.
reviews/8/comments: We had a great stay and Andrews and did not want to leave! The space was perfect for two couples with each room having a king bed and it’s own bathroom. The kitchen was a dream, and the living room was comfortable and cozy. There are plenty of bars and restaurants nearby - we walked everywhere. Would not hesitate to book here again!
reviews/9/comments: Andrew's place was amazing for X games weekend. Perfect location within walking distance from everything.

name: 🏔 5 Bd Family Home, Walkable, Dog Friendly, Views
reviews/0/comments: great place to stay really close to aspen city center.
reviews/0/response: Thank you! Please reach out if you want to come back. We have a one bedroom in town, too and can be flexible with return tenants. I hope your event was a success!
reviews/1/comments: We had the best time staying with Karla! Karla is the most communicative and helpful host. She let us check in early and was always responsive to any questions during our stay. The house is perfect for our group of friends! Location is fantastic - easy, free shuttle to all the ski resorts.
reviews/1/response: Thank you, you are welcome back any time!
reviews/2/comments: Karla's house is PERFECT!  It's a few minutes walk to the city market and the ski lifts which is very convenient.  She has parking out front if you rent a car and the house is ideal for a family with kids (especially teens) as the entire bottom floor is separated from the top floor.  The kitchen is equipped for all kinds of cooking which we also enjoyed.  Definitely will stay again if the opportunity comes.
reviews/2/response: Thank you! We love our mountain home and are glad it worked well for you. Please contact me about coming back! We can be more flexible than my calendar suggests. Have a happy new year!
reviews/3/comments: Amazing host!
reviews/3/response: Thank you! Please come back any time! I hope you had a great family vacation.
reviews/4/comments: Karla is an incredibly kind host and very easy to communicate with. She is prompt with responses and is very helpful and is very willing to share local information. Our stay here with our family was absolutely perfect for our wedding weekend! We cannot thank Karla enough and we could not have asked to a better home.
reviews/5/comments: We were looking for a peaceful home within close proximity to the Roaring Fork river.  We loved the fact that we could hear the river from the bedrooms and the outside patio was our favorite spot to sit out and enjoy a glass of wine.  The home is spacious and stylishly decorated and was very clean and well stocked with essential supplies.  Our hostess Karla was amazingly responsive and answered every text within minutes, and provided a very nice welcome basket including a great bottle of wine.  The house isn't the fanciest from the outside but it is very comfortable, clean and contemporary on the inside.  Our thanks to our hosts for a great relaxing stay.
reviews/5/response: Thanks, Scott!
reviews/6/comments: This place is very close to town and a very easy walk to almost anything in Aspen. There was plenty of room for our group of 9 and the place was very clean. I would highly recommend for any Aspen trip.
reviews/7/comments: If you’re coming to Aspen stay here :) Karla made everything so easy, the home is beautiful and right on the river - town is just a quick walk away.
reviews/7/response: Thank you! Let me know when you're coming next year and I'll send  you a special offer!
reviews/8/comments: We had some guests arriving for an event in town and wanted them to be able to share a space. They raved about the great accommodations, and were really comfortable and happy to stay. Thank you!

name: Innsbruck 2 Bedroom Suite
reviews/0/comments: Great spot within walking distance to town, shuttle service as well was super helpful for longer trips. Wish we could have stayed longer to use all the amenities!

name: Beautiful, newly remodeled townhome in Snowmass!
reviews/0/comments:
Perfect fit for our family (with Grandparent joining), and we hope to be back soon!

Host was quick to communicate, added helpful hints in/around the unit for our family with young kids, and we couldn’t have asked for too much more.

The unit itself was clean, spacious, and beautifully/centrally situated in Snowmass.

Thanks again for taking great care of our family!
reviews/1/comments: Beautiful, clean, peaceful home in Snowmass! The remodel was beautifully done to elevate the space. The beds and bedding were very comfortable and clean. Great spot!
reviews/2/comments:
This was an absolutely perfect rental.

We checked in very easily to a perfectly clean house that was well stocked with necessities like cleaning supplies, coffee, and some kitchen basics.

We were initially taken with how beautiful the house is, one of the rare times that the house is actually prettier than the photos. The living room has very well placed large windows that let in a ton of light and makes it feel very open. Furniture and design elements are high end and comfortable.

We travelled with a baby, and the bottom floor of the unit is a very child friendly area for those traveling with little ones. There is a living room that serves as a play area, a great bunk room, and there is a door that blocks this area away from stairs if that is a concern.

Outside the house, the bus stop into Snowmass Base village is less than a 1 minute walk to catch the #3 route. Additionally, there is a very pretty hiking trail right next to the entrance to the development. Location an A+.

The Host is amazing. A+ communicator, prepared us for our stay with a baby, and accommodated requests and questions thoughtfully.

Overall an A+ experience and we will be looking to rent this property when we return to Aspen/Snowmass.

name: Brookie Lodge on Beaver Lake (MARBLE, COLORADO)
reviews/0/comments: The overall stay was great!! My family really enjoyed the pool table! The views are incredible! Thank you for allowing us to use your home for our Labor day weekend!
reviews/1/comments:
We loved our stay at the house and hope to make it an annual tradition. We had a wonderful weekend filled with all the fun activities the valley has to offer and the views could not be beat. I found most of my questions about the house were answered in the Airbnb description and Michael was very fast and easy to communicate with if I had any further questions.

Thank you for a family vacation we will never forget!
reviews/2/comments:
We enjoyed our stay at
Brookie Lodge. Lots of space and Great communication with host. The view was incredible, with a perfect glassy lake reflecting the surrounding mountains in the morning. Would stay again and recommend to friends.
reviews/3/comments: Great house, great location. We had so much fun at the lake and playing games indoors during a rainstorm. Plenty of space to take naps and read after playing outside all day.
reviews/4/comments: Awesome place, even better views! Slow Groovin is a must have if they are open
reviews/5/comments:
Brookie Lodge has a wonderful setting, beautiful views and is an attractive home. We were very comfortable there.
The stove is a little quirky and the deck not for bare feet but that didn’t stop either space from being very popular.
One of the bedrooms is an open loft with a trundle bed. The bunk room has a parents room attached separated by a bathroom. The pool/ping pong table room was a favorite hangout for our teenage grandchildren. Having two living spaces gave us room to spread out.
We spent a lot of time tramping around Marble and the locals gave directions to some of their hidden treasures. Marble quarry was amazing. The kids spent time at the lake and everybody made the trip up to Crystal Mill.
We enjoyed staying at Brookie Lodge!
reviews/6/comments:
This house is absolutely stunning! In such a wonderful location in the valley of the mountains. It was bigger than it appeared in the photos, which was great for our group of 10. We all enjoyed the paddle boards in the lake and being able to go down there and swim, as well as the game room and the pool table. We also did a fun 9 mile hike to the silver mill that was only a few minutes away from the house. There was a meteor shower while we stayed there and we saw so many shooting stars! Definitely a prime sky viewing area!

The only down side was that we were not able to use the hot tub at all because it had been serviced our second day there, and the person who did the maintenance said it couldn’t be used for four days. We were all pretty bummed by that since we had been looking forward to sitting in the hot tub and looking at the stars at night. Also good to note, the grill does not work and all the ping pong balls and paddles are broken.
reviews/7/comments: Excellent location.    Marble was great.   Bring bikes.  The barbecue place was terrific.
reviews/8/comments: House is quite large and clean. The water is usable and filtered but has well water taste. Please note one of the bedrooms is accessed through the bunk room. Stove works but takes some getting used to as control nobs are not accurate. I wish more windows opened. The view can not be beat, morning evening, Midday. Go visit the locals at the Hub and Slow groovin BBQ for info around the town. Of note there is a permit required to access the lake (per local authorities) that needs to be purchased online. You just have this to paddle board, swim or fish.
reviews/9/comments: Awesome home in an awesome location. Would book again in a heartbeat.

name: Aspen Ritz Carlton 3 Bedroom Condo
Charming 3 bedroom + large deck in the West End
reviews/0/comments: Her place is super cute and much nicer than the pictures! She was super helpful and provided us all of the information and items we needed. Thanks for the great stay!
reviews/1/comments: Fantastic Airbnb with great location for buses to the slopes. Very homey. Sunni is a fanatic thoughtful host. We hope to return one day!
reviews/2/comments: This home is a great central location to everything. Our family of 6 adults and 3 dogs fit very comfortably. It's a huge plus to have 4.5 bathrooms. Sunni was an excellent host!
reviews/3/comments: Thank you Sunni. We had a great time and loved your home. It was comfortable and spacious and made it easy for our family to have a great time. I also appreciate your excellent communication. Sincerely, Dave
reviews/4/comments: The house is great for families. All the bedrooms are in the ground floor so you don’t have to haul suitcases upstairs. We are a family of 5 and their was plenty of space for our 5 might stay.
reviews/5/comments: Great stay and great location! The host was very responsive and made everything very easy!
reviews/6/comments: Charming and comfortable place in good location.
reviews/7/comments:
Sunni’s property is beautiful. It’s only a few blocks away form the restaurants, shops and gondola.
The rooms and nice and have enough storage for clothes.
There is an amazing deck with a fire pit and a grill. We spent almost all of our time out there.
Bathrooms are clean although a little bit tight.
We had a good, kind and fast response from the host at all times.
Overall we had a wonderful stay and would be happy to stay at Sunni’s again.
reviews/8/comments: Great location and house 😊
reviews/9/comments: It was great. Exactly as advertised. We loved the deck and location. Sunni was a gracious host.

name: Sky Door Ranch
reviews/0/comments: My family and I were beyond impressed. We travel/stay in Airbnb’s a lot. This is our favorite by far. The pictures and description only give you a glimpse. The ranch house is soooo much more beyond expectations. Everything was easy and felt like a real vacation. The location is close to everything you need, but you are secluded enough to enjoy. No corners were cut in this home. Carbondale isn’t touristy and crowded, we liked that. The beds are comfy. You do not need anything but your clothes and groceries. Enjoy! Great host
reviews/1/comments: What an absolutely magical place! Our family loved our time at this beautiful home. The pool alone was worth it for our two children who had an absolute blast. Waking up to the view of Mt. Sopris each morning was such a treat as were the sunsets on the back patio. The cooling system for this home worked great for us-the first mountain property in the summer we’ve had a good night’s rest in! We would definitely love to return to this home for another relaxing stay.
reviews/2/comments: Beautiful home and the best vacation we’ve ever had. Great location close enough to Aspen and Glenwood Springs but far enough outside of town to feel fairly isolated. Liesl and Peter were very helpful. Everything was well stocked and in good working order.
reviews/3/comments: Peace, quiet, barn animals and wildlife all in a beautiful bucolic setting. What could better? A bit of Rocky Mountain paradise!
reviews/4/comments: Incredible space, nestled in a mountain paradise! Perfect for a large crowd. Easy to get to from 82, and great communication from hosts!
reviews/5/comments: The property is spectacular.  We spent the holiday with family from throughout the US.  The house was immaculate.  The rooms were spacious.  The kitchen was fantastic for preparing meals for large groups.  There was more than adequate living space.  Internet coverage throughout.  Outside patio fireplace was used daily.  The heated pool was a favorite for the kids (and some adults).  The hosts are great communicators and answered questions quickly.  We highly suggest this property.
reviews/6/comments: Beautiful home and property with many conveniences of home.
reviews/7/comments: What a spectacular home! It is even more spacious and beautiful than the pictures. Unbelievable mountain views - breathtaking! Liesl responded to every question we had within minutes - what a fabulous hostess! The home was immaculately clean and perfectly supplied. The property was beautiful and allowed for some fun short hikes. Location has easy access to grocery stores, restaurants, etc - some within 5 minutes. Only a direct 30 minute drive to Aspen and the airport. We would highly recommend visiting this beautiful home which easily accommodates up to 12 people.  5 stars all the way!
reviews/8/comments: Incredible place, especially all the little details (heated floors, steam shower, fireplaces, etc). Stayed here for a month and would go back in a heartbeat. Exceptional

name: Snowmass Luxury 15 mins from Aspen
reviews/0/comments: Really wonderful house in a perfect environment for our family stay - we had one 3yo and one 1yo, and the house was perfect. The owners had tons of kids toys and the boys loved them! In the winter would recommend coming with 4x4/AWD. The new wing is awesome and was a pleasant surprise!
reviews/1/comments: Loved the house and location.
reviews/2/comments: Incredibly appointed home in an even more amazing location. A place you do not want to leave.
reviews/3/comments: I can't say enough good things about this house. We've been coming to Aspen every year for 7 years and this is by far the best rental we've had. It's not even close. We like to cook and the appliances(mostly Smeg) were as good or better then we have in our home. The house is so stylish and the view of the mountains are breath taking. So many nice touches to this home, like heated floors in the bathroom, amazing beddings and towels.  The area is also very quiet and secluded which we like so we didn't mind that we were 20 minutes from the slopes.  We plan on staying next year for sure.
reviews/4/comments: Beautiful house and views, outstanding appointments, comfy beds, top notch.  About 20 min or so from ski areas but beware of traffic near aspen on weekday mornings!  We had a group of 6 and thoroughly enjoyed the stay, skied every day at either Buttermilk or Snowmass.  Would stay there again!
reviews/5/comments: Hidden gem! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. Perfect for relaxation and taking in the gorgeous landscape. Well-appointed home with thoughtful touches (heated bathroom floors, ultra-comfortable beds, ample plush towels) made for a super-comfortable stay. We love to cook and enjoyed the fully-stocked kitchen (Le Cruset!) and grill. An added bonus was how family friendly the home is — perfect for our family. Would also be great for a couples’ or girls’ weekend away. If you are hard-core skiers, note that it’s a bit of a drive to the mountain each day. But it was perfect for our family. We skied Snowmass, Buttermilk and Aspen Highlands.

name: Oasis in peaceful Old Snowmass
reviews/0/comments: We had a wonderful time staying here over a week. The house is very warm and spacious, and everything we needed was amply stocked. The views of this house are absolutely unbeatable and the area where it’s located, Old Snowmass, is beautiful and very safe. Larissa was a great host and we had a fun time skiing during the day and playing board games provided over the evenings.
reviews/1/comments:
We had a perfect stay over the New Year and very much enjoyed especially the warmth and comfort of the home while being based in this stunningly gorgeous old Snowmass zone.
Larissa has thought of every detail to make it a very well appointed kitchen and living experience.
We would visit again in a heartbeat!
reviews/2/comments: We truly loved our time in this special, beautiful home. It is stylish, comfortable, clean, and set on an incredible piece of land - the views were calming, amazing hikes and bike rides nearby. We sat on the balcony for hours on end and swooned at the mountains. Larissa was very accommodating and easy to deal with. We'll be back!

name: The Aspen House
reviews/0/comments: The home is lovely and in a great location to walk every in town. Dennis was super easy to work with and everything in the listing was accurate. The kitchen was especially well appointed. Highly recommend!
reviews/1/comments:
This spacious house comfortably accommodated 8 of us and had all the modern appliances/amenities we needed (washer/dryer, grill, functioning wifi, hot tub, etc.).
House was centrally located, quick walk to downtown Aspen and the Silver Queen gondola.
The host was very responsive.
reviews/1/response:
Hi Luka
Leah and I are so glad you could stay with us and gratified you had such a great time. Safe travels and return soon.
Leah & Dennis
reviews/2/comments: Best host you could ask for and ideal location close to downtown.
reviews/3/comments: This rental property was the very best we've ever rented, in that every inch was immaculately clean and spotless,  everything you could possibly want was amply provided, the heating system worked consistently well on all three levels, and the host Dennis is very thoughtful and responsive.  There were 7 of us (4 adults, 3 children) and we all were very comfortable and had plenty of space.  For Aspen, the location of the house is great, only a 5 minute walk to the center of town -- extremely close, only a few blocks.  We took the short walk into town nearly every day.  (We also enjoyed the short drive to SnowMass for family skiing and outdoor ice-skating).  There is a beautiful large stone fireplace and enough firewood for an entire winter.  The home is totally filled with lovely comfortable furniture and furnishings. Everything we needed, we instantly found available in the home -- it seems every need and detail has been thoughtfully anticipated by the host . . . everything you can think of, like plenty of warm blankets & cozy throws, puzzles & books, hair dryers, soaps,  shampoos/conditioners/body washes, many rolls of toilet tissue, closets full of large thick bath towels for every bathroom -- more than you could ever use, dishwasher and clothes washer detergents, multiple rolls of paper towels, trash bags, napkins, and a completely stocked pantry with canned & boxed goods, napkins, spices and condiments.  You could easily arrive in a snow storm and not have to go to the grocery store for the first few days.  Dennis asks that you replace pantry items you use up  --  we used up the pancake mix and oatmeal, which we happily replaced (along with some of the paper towels although that maybe wasn't required).  The kitchen is very well stocked with lots of nice dishes, pots & pans, and utensils.  We easily cooked-in almost every meal due to covid, including baking a whole turkey.  There is a sizable back yard with tables, chairs, and a nice large hot tub.   Check-in and check-out were very easy, thanks to Dennis.  I would definitely rent from this host again.
reviews/3/response:
Julia
That you had such a good time under difficult circumstances (Gas Company pipeline trouble, the Pandemic, etc) is as much a testimony to you and your family’s indomitable spirit. It was our privilege to have you as our guests.
Leah and Dennis

name: Lumber Jack Lodge: Spacious Ski-In/Out Home w/ Hot
reviews/0/comments: Loved this place, great views
reviews/0/response: Thank you, Eniel, for your review! The RRR Family

name: Aspen Townhome
reviews/0/comments: Spacious townhouse in the so called West End of Aspen. Very good bus connection to downtown Aspen which is also in walkable distance (approx. 10 min walk).  There was a power outage in Aspen (this happens very rarely) which affected a major part of town. Dave was very good at communicating and updated us on what the issue was and how things were getting fixed. I can highly recommend Dave as a host and his place to stay at!
reviews/1/comments: Great spacious townhouse with a wood burning fireplace!!! Both bedrooms on separate floors and feel like master bedrooms in their own ways. We couldn’t have been happier staying here. *Bonus Hickery House nearby for killer breakfast and Downtowner rides makes it easily accessible to anywhere*
reviews/2/comments:
Charming Townhouse, better than anticipated!! We had the luxury of staying at Dave's place over the past few days. Pictures do not do justice!! Way nicer in person......

PROS:
Super charming and clean
New Finishes
Fire Place
Comfortable beds
Renovated
Great dining table
Amazingly located - 2 minute drive to the heart of downtown
Heated bathroom floors
Close personal parking spot

CONS:
2 bedrooms are in the basement
Downstairs - You must go through 1 bedroom to get to the other bedroom
No bathroom on main floor
Couch is comfortable but a bit small for more than 3-4 people

Overall it was lovely and highly recommend!!!
reviews/3/comments: Beautiful,  spacious,  nicely decorated  and excellent location. New appliances,  luxury bedding and amenities! Cool!
reviews/4/comments: Great place.  Clean and comfortable.  Location wise is good.  Quick drive to downtown and to the ski areas.
reviews/5/comments: Great location. House was very clean and updated. Would certainly stay here again.
reviews/6/comments: Wow. What a wonderful Airbnb experience. From the moment we booked, Dave was so helpful- accommodating our requests to send gear early / stored it for us, and even helped out when the airlines lost luggage on the way out there by allowing us to send boxes from amazon to the house. Then when we got there the entry was seamless, the place adorable, clean and sneaky big! Was able to comfortably accommodate all of us. Right next to 8th Street bus stop that stops at all mountains and in town. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

name: LARKSPUR MOUNTAIN MODERN CHALET    5 Bed/5 Bath
reviews/0/comments: Awesome stay! Everything about the place was top of the line. Would love to come back- Thanks again!
reviews/0/response: Thank you, please come again!!!!
reviews/1/comments: Love this house! Everyone had space even though we had 12 adults. The house was very well stocked and the hot tub relaxing.
reviews/2/comments:
Great house as advertised. The kitchen was top-notch. The mattresses were all quality, hot tub & patio were amazing. The only qualms I had were: 1. Propane on both the grill & outdoor fireplace was out / running on fumes. We went out to go buy two new canisters. 2. The mayor of Vail lives next door. While we were not having parties, he was looking over into our house during the day several times a day to perhaps "monitor" us? (felt a little weird).

Most importantly for us, the check-out time was way too early at 10 AM. I feel that industry-standard check-out times are between 11 to 12 pm. We were told the owners were flying in but so what, we paid for the last day, so that fact is irrelevant IMO. They can wait.

There was also no extra laundry detergent. We had to provide for our own.

Outside of that, we were very happy with the place.
reviews/2/response:
Dear Takk,
I'm so glad that you enjoyed the home! I apologize for the lack of propane - it has been a very busy ski season but that was an oversight on my part and I'm sorry.
In regard to the mayor living next door and making you feel "monitored" I think he was concerned as we clearly state that you are allowed a maximum of 4 cars at the home (1 in the garage and 3 in the driveway) and you had 6 cars and a motorcycle parked outside the home. Code Enforcement in Vail tickets all cars parked on the street and I think he was concerned that the Sprinter Van and car parked on the street would be ticketed which is why I texted you warning you that you might get a ticket. I'm sorry if this felt invasive.
A 4:00pm check in and 10:00 check out is quite common in Vail as the housekeepers need that time to clean and prepare the home for our guests. We try to be flexible whenever possible which is why I happily agreed to let your group check in at 1:00 on arrival day. It does not matter who is checking in, the housekeepers always arrive at 10:00am as they need to make sure they have time to properly prepare the home for the next guests. I'm sorry if this felt too early to you but it is clearly stated everywhere that this is our check out time.
Again, I'm glad that you were happy with the home and enjoyed your time in Vail! Thank you for staying with us while you were here,
Meg
reviews/3/comments:
The house was absolutely fantastic for us and easily catered to our group. The location was great - either a short drive to Vail and Beaver Creek and very close to the Vail Bus.

The facilities were great and had everything we could have possibly wanted or needed and more.

Andrew and Meg were consummate hosts. Thanks!!!
reviews/4/comments: Everything about this home is perfect! Our family stayed here for annual Thanksgiving trip and this home was everything we needed and more. The distribution of the bedrooms was ideal for us. Loved the large kitchen table for us to all eat together. Location was great close to great skiing, stores are close by, restaurants! It really is perfect
reviews/5/comments: This is a beautiful home and served our needs very well. Impressive attention to details and every little thing has been thought out and all amenities actually work and we didn’t find anything missing. The instructions were very clear, check-in was easy and so was check out. We would definitely book this house again for our next Vail trip.
reviews/6/comments: Meg and Andrew’s place was amazing for my family reunion. It’s located 5 mins from the Vail village. The Airbnb was perfect for my whole family, very roomy! Just a heads up, it’s a 4.5 bath, so 2 rooms have to share 1 bathroom. Highly recommend this place!
reviews/7/comments: My group and I had a great time. Beautiful property, responsive and friendly host. Would stay here again.

name: Village Hall 13 - Mountain Style Three Bedroom
reviews/0/comments: Great place!

name: Gorgeous Mtn Top Contemporary
Black Swan Unit B
As Seen in CB Magazine!
reviews/0/comments: Thanks Sarah, great house!
reviews/1/comments: Beautiful home and awesome location! Sarah is super easy to communicate with.
reviews/2/comments:
Amazing home for a ski weekend. Our big group of 11 had more than enough room in common areas.

The grill is not accessible in the winter given the snow banks but the infrared char-broiler on the Wolf gas range worked great for a night of cooking in. Kitchen was fully stocked!
reviews/3/comments: Wonderful house!  It has everything you need, and the location is spectacular.
reviews/4/comments: This house is amazing. Great location and Sarah is an awesome host. Would definitely stay there again!
reviews/5/comments: Excellent location right in town and within walking distance of hikes, etc. great sleeping options for adults and kids, nice backyard with lawn. Zero complaints!
reviews/6/comments: We stayed with two families with children and a babysitter.  The place was very comfortable for group hang outs and meals.  The space was comfortable and stylish.  The beds and linens were very comfortable.  The kitchen was great for cooking meals together.  And it’s 2 blocks from the best morning lattes!!!  Sarah was very communicative and easy to work with.
reviews/7/comments:
Sarah's house was amazing, and I highly recommend it. It was extremely close to all the shops and restaurants on Elk Ave, so you could easily walk around town. There is a great sledding hill nearby if you have kids and the Nordic Center/ice skating rink is very close as well.

The house was very clean, and the beds were very comfortable for all. I loved my bed so much that I want to replicate the setup at my house! Check-in was super easy, and Sarah was very accommodating in letting us drop our bags off before the official check-in time.

We loved this house and would definitely stay here again.
reviews/8/comments: Great location!  Beautiful space!  We usually stay up on the mountain, but decided to try town.  Everyone from 3 to 65 loved the convenience and fun of town.  The bus stop is just around the corner as well as top restaurants. We hope to stay here again!
reviews/9/comments: This space is beautiful, comfortable, well located and cozy warm. Sarah was helpful in answering questions before hand and during my stay. I would absolutely return and strongly recommend this house to future renters!

name: Warming Hut: True Ski-in/Out, Hot Tub, Video Wall,
reviews/0/comments: Great stay and great service. We’re coming back!

Aspen Highlands CO | Ritz Carlton Residence Club | 2 Bedroom

reviews/0/comments: A member of our party contracted Covid 19 and all of us were exposed and decided to cancel trip 10 days in advance. Pitkin County closed down all restaurant and other operations. They would not issue a refund.
reviews/0/response: Mr Bower- This review is inaccurate. You failed to provide proof to Airbnb that someone in your party contracted Covid. Pitkin county did not close down nor did all operations. Pitkin county remained open to travelers as did the ski resorts and restaurants although the restaurants did have restrictions.
reviews/1/comments: Location is great! Very cool to be able to ski right back to your house. The house had everything we needed and our group had enough space to rest and relax. Will definitely be coming back!!
reviews/1/response: We're happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to your next visit!

name: Luxe Winter Home | Elevator, Hot Tub, Game Room, Mountain Views By InvitedHome
CB Trailhouse
reviews/0/comments: Dream location, fantastic house. The home sits above downtown Crested Butte, less than a five-minute drive. The setting is stunning, smack in the high mountains. The house is warm and welcoming with just about everything we needed, down to the coffee and filters. The two decks were favorite morning and evening gathering spots for our group of mountain bikers. The host/owner was very responsive before, during and after our stay, taking care of any issues. I hope we are lucky enough to stay in this home again.
reviews/1/comments: The home was a wonderful place for our extended family to gather, and the placement of bedrooms gave us the space to spread out when needed. We enjoyed watching foxes playing in the snow, a wonderful full moon, and the bright bluebird skies.
reviews/2/comments: Large comfortable home with a spacious great room in a beautiful setting and a very short drive to Mt Crested Butte.
reviews/3/comments: This house in Crested Butte was so perfect for our group looking to stay close to the mountain to ski and also enjoy the downtown area! Dusty and Greg were able to answer any questions we had which was a bonus. Overall an amazing trip and house!
reviews/3/response: Awesome! So happy you enjoyed it! And it looks like you got some nice powder! Come back anytime!
reviews/4/comments: Great location looking at the mountain. Short drive to Mt. Crested Butte or into town. Plenty of space for all of us to have our own area, including the kids. Would definitely considering staying again.
reviews/5/comments: Fantastic location. The house is ginormous and has plenty of space for a large group. Internet is 15 down / .5 up so a bit limiting if you are working remotely but you can do it. Also there is an espresso machine in the house which is a nice convenience. The caretakers are fantastic and if you are lucky they might even ski with (they are amazing skiers). As a whole this is a fantastic value if you have a large group of friends/family.
reviews/5/response: Hey Erik-Glad it went well. Dusty and Greg loved you guys and couldn't stop saying positive things...including some laughs about the moonshine garage incident. Hilarious! Come back anytime!
reviews/6/comments: A spacious 5 BR 5 Bath home with individual room  thermostats for radiant heating and a good location a short drive from the. Ski area
reviews/7/comments:
Cary's home was a great space for our large family to have a special Crested Butte Christmas vacation. The room set up helped everyone to have their privacy and the living, dining and kitchen area provided a nice gathering space. The home itself has a nice quiet location on Washington Gulch and is a short drive to both CB and Mt. CB.
We had a couple of issues upon arrival but overall enjoyed our stay.
reviews/7/response: Kevin's group was great and had good communication...we'd love to have them again.
reviews/8/comments: If you are looking for a large house to accommodate a larger group this is your place. We had several small families and this place was perfect because of the large number of bedrooms and bathrooms. It has a large common space for everybody to be together And plenty of space for parking. It is just a few minutes drive to the base of the mountain and even has a great place for the kids to go sledding. We had a couple of issues when we arrived and Cary made sure to make those right.  I would definitely rent from him again.
reviews/9/comments: The host canceled this reservation 344 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

reviews/0/response: Thank you for your kinds words! I try to make it a great experience for each guest.  I hope you will come back soon!

reviews/2/comments: 10 out of 10 recommend this cabin to anyone. It’s beautiful and the host is amazing and does everything she can to make your stay perfect!

name: Luxury ranch home on 70 acres with stunning views, hot tub & fireplaces
reviews/0/comments: Such a beautiful home! Would definitely love to stay here again.

name: Skywatch 50
reviews/0/comments: Skywatch 50 is an amazing property with absolutely beautiful views. The stay also included access to the Ritz facilities - pool, hot tubs, and spa - which made the experience that much more relaxing. Skywatch 50 has everything you need for a week/weekend away in the mountains.
reviews/1/comments: Exceptional summer holiday!
reviews/2/comments: Skywatch 50 is an amazing property.  First of all the views are outstanding!  Skywatch 50's location in Bachelors Gulch provides ski in/ski out accessibility as well as snowshoe (Winter) and hiking trails (Summer) just outside the front door.  The house is very spacious and is well furnished with a fully equipped kitchen.  Everything about the property is top notch and we would recommend this property highly.
reviews/3/comments: Check in was seamless and we were able to move up the check in time one hour which was convenient.  The house was well appointed.  Kitchen was easy to use.  An additional kitchen prep sink would have been helpful. Stove and oven worked well and it was quite convenient to have two dishwashers.  The multiple TVs were great and furnishings were very comfortable.  Bedrooms were also very comfortable and extra pillows, robes etc were appreciated.  The hot tub got a bit funky in three days.  The toilet in the master did not flush well.  We appreciated the steam shower in the master.  The "ski in ski out" feature should be clarified as its a 75 yard walk to the trail.  Overall great experience!
reviews/4/comments: We had great time. House is big, cozy and clean. It was our second time at this house, we will go there again.

name: Snowmass Club Townhome Available for Holidays
reviews/0/comments:
Home could have been lovely but BEWARE that there is ongoing construction on both sides of this unit. Shared walls means hammering and drilling as early as 7 am in the bedrooms. Host told us she was not aware but then local property manager must have seen all of the contractor trucks (there daily) and the large construction bin that has obviously been there for several weeks. There was non stop commotion during Christmas week! The host did send over a bottle of champagne but we would have preferred the construction be disclosed ahead of time so we could have found another place.

The description should also mention that access to the Snowmass Club gym is not included (we had to pay $35 for each. visit) and that the 3rd bedroom isn’t really a bedroom. This is a 2 bedroom . The 3rd bedroom is actually an attic loft that has no closet, no door, and is accessed by a step ladder (not regular stairs). It is difficult to get up and down (you must hold on to the side bar) and would be unsafe for children (even with the baby gate apparatus) or anyone who has trouble walking, is older, or not keen on walking down backwards.

name: Beaver Creek Condo in Ski-In/Ski-Out Complex w/Shared Hot Tub & Pool, W/D, WiFi!
reviews/0/comments: It was a wonderful stay! The place was lovely, and location was perfect. I will definitely be back!
reviews/1/comments: Beautiful condo, well cared for, upscale kitchen.  Convenient storage for ski and snowboard gear.  Short walk (about 0.3 miles) up to Beaver Creek Village and short drive down to Avon to shop for groceries or grab food.  Easy to park.

name: Elegant Mountain Retreat-Ski in, Ski out
reviews/0/comments: Madelaine was a fantastic host and the condo was absolutely amazing.  I would give this rental unit an A+ in every category.  The ski-in/ski-out was excellent - better than expected.  The condo was spacious, clean and well-equipped.  Madelaine had excellent communication and allowed for easy early check in and easy late check-out since there was nobody checking in on our day of departure.  I cannot say enough good things about this host or this rental.  We hope to be back!!!
reviews/1/comments: Madelaine's place is amazing!
reviews/2/comments:
This unit is fine. The location is not described accurately in my opinion. To ski to the lift you ski ski out and into Bachelor Gulch or Arrowhead. To access the unit you must ski all the way over to the Arrowhead lift then down. In both situations you are carrying your gear about 30 yards.
The unit itself is too stuffed with furniture and decor. Hard to find a spot for our belongings and the unit appears much larger in the pictures than in person. Owner's clothes were left in two of the three bedrooms. This was annoying. Also, the owner did not state that she brings dogs to this property. There were several dog beds left out, even one in a bedroom my daughter stayed in. My daughter experienced an allergic reaction. Owner states that her dogs are "hypoallergenic," which I believe, but my daughter has had reactions before to other "hypoallergenic" dogs. It would've been nice to know that dogs stay in the property. We would not stay here again or recommend it. Over priced. We prefer other properties in Beaver Creek/Bachelor Gulch for the same cost.
I reached out to the owner hoping she would offer some sort of solution or apology, this did not happen. (Hidden by Airbnb) should be aware and please list that there are dogs that stay in this unit.
reviews/2/response:
This review is false.
(1) If you decide to stay in my property or anywhere else in BG, please call the Bachelor Gulch club/Vail Resorts (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) or the Hummingbird Lounge (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and they will confirm that all units in Hummingbird are ski-in, ski-out. You can also visit (Website hidden by Airbnb) to verify that Bachelor Gulch is a separate mountain from Arrowhead and you don't have to ski into Arrowhead to access Bachelor Gulch.
(2) As far as not having enough room for belongings, the master bedroom has 2 walk-in closets. One is locked for my own use and the other one is left empty for my guests with plenty of hangers and a dresser with 6 drawers for their belongings. All the other rooms have walk-in closets with respective dressers.
(3) I do not bring dogs to my property. I only have 1 dog that is hypoallergenic and that doesn't shed. He is a Golden Doodle. The last time he was there was during Christmas for 5 days and he only has 1 bed. We do not have multiple beds because he doesn't even use the one he has. Many guests have come and gone before this guest arrived and my unit is thoroughly cleaned each time by a professional property management company.
(4) This guest was not looking for an apology but for a reimbursement of $ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) after she stayed in my unit for the whole scheduled reservation and never complained about anything until after the fact. She says her daughter suffered from an allergic reaction to my hypoallergenic dog that is there a few times in the summer and hardly ever in the winter. I, myself, am very allergic to cats and would not be able to stay in a house with cats for a few seconds never mind for 5 whole days.
I am very disappointed to have rented and trusted my place to someone that feels comfortable making false statements. I have always been very considerate of my guests and if I felt I was at fault I would be more than happy to make a reimbursement. Fortunately, every other guest that has stayed in my property was kind enough to express their honest impression of my condo and of BG in general which negates every false claim from this particular guest.
Madelaine
reviews/3/comments: This place felt just like home. Very clean (and two of our party are VERY picky), well appointed, and extremely quiet. Our two families have traveled a lot together, and we all agreed that this was the best of the places we've rented for skiing. I also loved that the Christmas decor was still up - thank you for that! :)
reviews/4/comments: This is one of my favorite AirBNBs I’ve ever stayed at. Perfect location. Immaculately clean. VERY well stocked. Comfortable beds. This was so much better than staying at the Ritz (which we considered). It is literally right off the split between a blue and green run….15 steps out the door and we were on a ski run. Couldn’t ask for a better location. Luxury living too. Nice furniture. Nice amenities.
reviews/4/response: Thank you for the nice note. It was a pleasure having you as guests!
reviews/5/comments: More spacious than the pictures indicate.  Excellent gas fireplace to keep you warm and cozy. Ski in/ski out. Closest unit to the hot tub.  We would definitely stay here again.
reviews/6/comments: Fabulous time in this beautiful home. Everything presented on the arbnb website was accurate and the pictures were spot on .  Our family stated this was the best family experience we have had in Beaver Creek.  Would definitely return.
reviews/7/comments: This is a gorgeous home in the absolute best location. Ski in/ski out doesn’t get much better than this. Luxurious accommodations and a comfortable ski locker room to prepare for your day made it so easy to enjoy with the family. Well appointed kitchen for family meals.  The  hot tub and rec room were steps away.
reviews/8/comments: This place is nothing less than spectacular. The location is perfect - great views and access to the slopes and the Ritz. Very comfortable with all the amenities you will need. Ski locker room a bonus, not to mention the well located hot tubs.
reviews/9/comments: Outstanding property! This apartment is luxurious, beautifully decorated and spacious. Park your car in the underground garage and take the elevator directly to the apartment. So convenient! The location is excellent! Up the mountain in the Bachelor Gulch area, quiet and private but just 5-7 minutes drive to restaurants and supermarket. True ski in -ski out. Get your equipment in the ski locker room, walk out the automatic door and ski down to Ritz Carlton lift. The description of the apartment details and amenities is 100% accurate. Comfortable beds, luxury bedding and towels. Kitchen and bathrooms well stocked with everything guests might need. True that no detail has been left out. Staying in this property contributed to having one of our best ski trips ever!

name: Marble Lodge on Beaver Lake Campus
reviews/0/comments: Nice location,Nice Property we enjoyed through out our stay
reviews/1/comments: Vince's property has a beautiful view of Beaver Lake and the surrounding mountains.   Our  party of family and friends were very comfortable with these accommodations.  Vince communicated very well both before and during our stay.  Staff was nearby to assist us in anything we needed.  You will enjoy this quiet, peaceful get away and the activities that this area offers.
reviews/2/comments: Beautiful location with a wonderful rustic feel. Very accommodating for large groups.
reviews/3/comments: This is a great place for a remote vacation! The house has everything you could need from a coffee maker, to dishes, cooking ware, a great hot tub, and tons of sleeping space. And the view is to die for! We skied in Aspen and the drive to from the house was easy. Thank you Vince!
reviews/4/comments: Ok
reviews/5/comments: Make sure u have chains to get up the drive way and also make sure all amenities are working before you book. I was really looking forward to the hot tub.
reviews/5/response: We thought we had made it clear numerous times that driving up the drive fast was all that was needed but will try to have guests better inform us if they are going to be 9 hours later arriving than they estimated so that some staff who'd planned to be there to instruct or demonstrate between noon and 5 PM on Christmas Eve could have been of help as intended.  I'd called the guest's cell at noon, and they were only an hour away. Why they did not show up till 9 PM we're not sure,  We only had a day's notice that a hot tub pump failed, and even without Coronavirus shipping backlogs, there was no way to get a new pump on a day's notice or on a holiday weekend. Regrettable but unavoidable.
reviews/6/comments: Our group thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Such a unique home with unparalleled views.
reviews/7/comments: Great hosts, great views, amazing amenities. We had 14 people and it was more than big enough for us! The views and things to do are unreal!

reviews/0/comments: We had an extraordinary time here!  The home is beautiful, relaxing and well appointed home with everything you need.

reviews/0/comments: Everything went perfectly.  It is a beautiful property.  Everything was organized and seamless. Check in and check out was a breeze. Overall it was great with fantastic service with absolutely zero issues.  Would definitely stay here again!
reviews/1/comments: Great home in the middle of Beaver Creek with easy access to Stawberry Park charilift and Beaver Creek village. The home had a nice layout, spacious kitchen, living, and dining room. The private hot tub was also wonderful. The living room had great views of the mountains. If you stay there on Thursday night, you'll get a great view of the fireworks at night from the living room. Moving Mountains is also a great management company. Highly recommend!

name: Crested Butte Mountain Family Home!
reviews/0/comments: Our family of 10 was perfectly comfortable in this home. The view from the large living room is spectacular. This well appointed home is a true mountain gem!
reviews/1/comments: Great stay, fantastic location and views!
reviews/2/comments: Great home. Lots of room to hang out and a beautiful location. Loved the hot tub and back porch. David was very helpful and communicated when we had questions.
reviews/3/comments: We went to Crested Butte for our daughter's wedding.  Hosting a large event in the area required finding just the right property that fit our budget, had adequate parking (a huge issue in CB) and allowed for the number of guests we required.  When we walked in the front door we were blown away.  The decor was beautiful, the majority of the interior had been updated recently and the view was magical. The owner was responsive, friendly and helpful.  We had a wonderful time in CB and this beautiful rental was the perfect setting to enhance the whole experience.
reviews/4/comments: This house is amazing!  The layout is wonderful and the location is prime.  It is clean and well-appointed.  We loved our stay here and will be back!
reviews/5/comments: This house is gorgeous and so close to base. The free shuttle that stops by was always on time and dropped you very close to the lifts. Everything about the house was very well thought out and had everything we needed. The hosts were very responsive and helpful from booking through the end of the trip. We would definitely stay again!
reviews/6/comments: This place is great! Plenty of room for large groups, the kitchen was well stocked. The hottub was large and relaxing, and the view was amazing. This place had plenty of towels, and other small thoughtful things that made our stay easy and relaxing. Also not a far walk from the resort. Would highly recommend this place for anyone with a large family or group.
reviews/7/comments: The house is fully stocked with dinnerware, pots and pans. Towels for hot tub and bathrooms. A lot of games to play also.
reviews/8/comments: I was very happy with the furnishings, appliances, dishes, utensils.  Hard to find any fault.  I would recommend this location for anyone interested in great views and a hassle free stay.
reviews/9/comments: Very nice. Lots of parking. Way up the mountain.

reviews/0/comments: Amazing time in this home a block away from downtown. Owner paid attention to details so the home flowed nicely. Can’t think of anything we didn’t like.  It’s definitely a home we would stay in again!! Just loved💜
reviews/1/comments: This house is a great spot, so close to everything in Crested Butte!  Every detail was thought of and the decor was very chic. reviews/0/comments:
This unit is in a great location. We didn’t rent a car and never missed it. We walked to town, took the free bus to the other mountains. The unit is quiet, clean. The cons:
- there is no hot tub
- no in unit laundry
- gets overly hot at night
- rooms are small
Aspen is expensive so this unit was expensive, so we missed having the laundry and hot tub for that price.

reviews/0/comments:
The condo is in a great location. The washer drier was a great asset as we had not luggage for the first 24 hours.. Stephanie, Diane’s co-lister was phenomenal, attentive and very responsive.
The unit needs updating as the rugs are stained and the kitchen dated. The smoke detector was not functioning as one was broken and off the ceiling. I had to ask for disposable supplies and fireplace tools that were lacking but they were delivered to me right away. The walls are also a little thin. All-in-all its a nice, sufficient unit in a great location next to city market and a block and a half from the mountain. I would stay there again with my family and hopefully it will be updated soon.

The house is large and roomy, but the best part were the views of the mountain out the front windows.  Lastly, Cheryl was a very accommodating host.  :)  I highly recommend.
reviews/4/comments: An amazing place to stay! Great location. The sauna and spa are great!  Worked really well with a large family gathering. Kitchen had all that was required to cook large meals. Heating was great-you would never know that it was freezing outside!
reviews/5/comments: We've stayed at Cheryl's home twice now. There is plenty of room for multiple families to stay together in one home and still have private space. Great location. Beautiful views!
