name: Great Location 1 Block from Gondola!!! - Outstanding Views of Ajax
Lovely Snowmass Home w/Ski-In/Ski-Out Access/Shared Pool/Hot Tub/Washer/Dryer!
reviews/0/comments: The Enclave is a perfect spot right next to the main Snowmass gondola run.  Easy ski/board in and out.   Our condo unit was beautiful, clean, great kitchen, fireplace/wood stock and even a washer/dryer.  Enclave/Vacassa staff were friendly, professional, and great to work with.  They got back to me quickly with any questions.  I recommend without hesitation, and will likely return next year to The Enclave!
reviews/1/comments: Our group of 5 stayed at The Enclave while we were in Snowmass for JAS 2019. The unit was clean and spacious, the staff was OUTSTANDING! A free shuttle took us to and from the festival venue, the maintenance staff spent extra time helping with an unforeseen issue and did everything possible to rectify the situation. The convenience of staying in a home versus a hotel room will ensure our return to The Enclave.
reviews/2/comments: Great property, better service.  Great advice for how to best access the area, like the Maroon Bells and Aspen.
reviews/3/comments: Leah and Jason were excellent hosts. Great communication and the unit was beautiful. We definitely reccomend!!!
reviews/4/comments: We had a wonderful stay at Leah & Jason's condo. It was incredibly clean and comfortable, two significant criteria as we ran the Ragnar race over 26 hours.  No reason to dine out much as the kitchen is fully stocked and updated for group cooking.  The staff at the complex were accommodating and helpful, too.  This is a "can't miss" home!
reviews/5/comments: Leah and Jason were great communicators before, during and after our stay.

name: Opulent Forest Cottage Getaway with Mountain Views
reviews/0/comments:
This property is lovely! It is an open concept home with the living/kitchen/dining rooms all facing an amazing view of the mountains. Like truly - amazing. The light over the mountains changes all day long making it a perpetual art show!

The house was very well stocked and the bedroom set up was great for large groups. The bunk room downstairs was great for all the kids. The utility room was great. The dining room chairs comfy for long dinners. The living room big enough for family movies after dinners. The WiFi great. Everything you needed in the kitchen, Etc!

We definitely needed a 4wd vehicle to get to the house over thanksgiving (the road leading up to the house stays in the shade and holds snow/ice) so plan accordingly. It was easy in our 4wd but my sister in a minivan couldn’t make it up.

We did the green lake trail from the house which was super fun. Town has a cute bookstore, coffee shop, and well stocked local grocery store.

Jordan was very responsive and helpful when I had questions. Definitely one of the nicest air bnb properties we’ve ever stayed in! I hope we can come back!
reviews/1/comments: The Mountain View’s from this home are incredible. We had a wonderful time and thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
reviews/2/comments: Jordans place is AMAZING!!! from the extremely comfortable beds we never wanted to get out of, the stylish and comfortable space, and the absolute insane views, we never wanted to leave. And we absolutely will be back again.
reviews/3/comments: Absolutely awesome property with stunning views. So many thoughtful details that made it feel like home for our group. Truly a special place.
reviews/4/comments:
What a wonderful house to rent with your family (extended family and friends). The views, amenities, appliances, furniture, beds, etc are all fabulous. We enjoyed our stay and that you can hike and bike right from the house

Thank you for a memorable stay and one we want to continue annually :)
reviews/5/comments:
The pictures do not do this home justice. The accommodations were very comfortable and the home was very well equipped. We did a lot of cooking and the kitchen had everything we needed. What is unique is the location. This home is situated in the middle of a forest which affords privacy but is only 4 miles from the town of Crested Butte. We loved the outdoor space which surrounds the house and included a very nice outdoor spa and gas grill. We also enjoyed being visited by deer and foxes.
Jordon, our host, was readily available for any questions. We spent 2 weeks at this home and our only regret was not being able to stay longer.
reviews/6/comments: Having owned 2 houses in Crested Butte, I can say with assurance that it doesn't get any better than Opulent Forest Cottage. The drive from town to the house is an easy 2 miles and the SPECTACULAR view is worth it! We had our extended family of 12 and every couple had their own gorgeous room (also with views) and private bath. The bunk room has 4 double bunks on one side (and 4 single on the other) so there are plenty of big beds. Everyone commented on the comfort of the beds. We even stripped the master bed to find the brand of the mattress and sheets, it was that cozy. The house is stylish and super livable at the same time. The great room has lots of floor space in front of the huge fireplace where we spent evenings playing cards and games or watching the 1 year old. There are baby gates provided which made the main floor super baby friendly. The deck on the main floor has great space to hang out and play or have cocktails. The hot tub on the deck was warm and ready to use the night we arrived. We cooked at home every night. The kitchen had every gadget and the pantry was fully stocked. Lastly, Jordan is a great host/communicator. When I had a question, he replied back within minutes and always accomodated our needs.
reviews/6/response: I’m glad your family enjoyed the views and had a wonderful summer vacation at our home in beautiful Crested Butte. Come back and visit us anytime!
reviews/7/comments: This house is incredible! My wonderful but very hard to please family stayed here for Christmas and everyone absolutely loved it. The views and amenities are over the top. All of us were very happy and would definitely recommend staying here. Hopefully we will be back soon!
reviews/8/comments: 11/10. Absolutely incredible home + great hospitality and communication from the host. Lots of little details that made the stay an amazing experience. The pictures don’t do it justice. Thanks for everything, Jordon!
reviews/9/comments: Beautiful house, stunning location, great host. This is the only place you should consider when staying in Crested Butte!

name: Snowmass CO | Woodrun V Residences | 3 Bedroom Premier
Gorgeous Ski-In/Out Condo w/Free WiFi, Private W/D, Shared Outdoor Pool, Hot Tub
reviews/0/comments: Snowmass was beautiful. But this condo was very uncomfortable. They did not advertise that there was no air conditioning and it was very hot and musty inside the condo. The bedding was also extremely uncomfortable on both beds. The only positive was the view from the back patio was absolutely beautiful.
reviews/0/response: Thank you for your review, Susan. We are sorry to hear the home did not meet your expectations. Please note the listing description, virtual tour, and photos are up-to-date and accurately describe the home so guests will not be surprised upon arrival. Please know that the home is not listed as having air conditioning which is common for homes in mountain areas. We have provided your valuable feedback regarding the linens to our local manager. We apologize for the inconvenience and hope we have the chance to impress you in the future.
reviews/1/comments: Beautiful property, fantastic location.
reviews/2/comments: Excellent location. Close to Snowmass base and village.  Very clean and organized.  Beautiful view from the back patio. Highly recommended.

name: MT Crested Butte Chalet, 3 Bedroom+ loft; Hot Tub
reviews/0/comments: Everything about this place was perfect.  Very well equipped!  Kitchen was awesome.
reviews/1/comments: Great home that easily handled two large families.  We enjoyed the views and hot tub as well.  Kitchen is wonderful with everything you would need.

reviews/3/comments:
This house is better than the pictures imply. I am guessing it is a 1970s or 1980s build, but the interior has been completely updated. Really great finishes. Perfect layout for our family. Nice little touches - like a well stocked spice rack, enough paper towels and toilet paper for the entire weekend, nice towels, and even a few keurig k-cups and biscoff crackers to make sure we had a good first morning even if we didn’t make it to the grocery store.

Dave himself is super communicative and eager to help.

Great location. Great views. Can’t say enough about this place!
reviews/3/response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay!!  We appreciate that you noticed the upgrades.  It was actually built in 1990.    More upgrades coming this fall!!
reviews/4/comments: Fantastic well appointed home. The new kitchen is wonderful, grill had propane, hot tub was clean, house was clean, hard to find a bad thing to say about our stay. Everything has been thought of from blankets for sitting outside to a stocked spice cabinet. It will be hard not to come back here and make some more memories.
reviews/5/comments: Great place to stay and even better hosts!
reviews/5/response: Thanks for spending your special weekend with us!
reviews/6/comments: Beautifully situated large quiet home  in Mt. Crested Butte offering excellent views of the mountains and comfortable well-appointed amenities. A great value and offering comfortable inside and outside seating areas. Very clean and brand new kitchen along with plenty of sleeping options in a large setting.
reviews/6/response: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us.   Give us a call if you ever want to stay again.
reviews/7/comments: Beautiful house! Lots of rooms and beds. Kitchen is beautiful, appliances are new but oven was funky. When I had a question David responded quickly. Would stay again!
reviews/8/comments: Great place, recently renovated and nice natural lighting throughout the house.
reviews/9/comments: Highly recommend. Beautiful and spacious lodge. Very clean. Cannot beat the views or location. You can see butte from the hot tub and you are a 10min walk to the shuttle that takes you to ski base. What more can you ask for?

Thank you again. :)
reviews/5/comments: Great home! Great Location!  The house is beautiful and very comfortable.  An easy walk to town and the ski shuttle.  My family will be back!
reviews/6/comments: 9 Gothic was an absolutely perfect place for our annual guy's outdoor adventure weekend home base. It's super close to Elk Street where all the restaurants and shops are located (2-min walk), it's got a great indoor/outdoor feel with the large accordion doors from the living room out to the patio with the table, bbq and fire pit, the hot tub is great for winding down after a day on the trails, all the rooms have comfortable beds, the kitchen is well-appointed with everything you'll need to cook for your group and it's top-of-the-line appliances and finishes throughout the whole house. Our group fell in love with Crested Butte, so we'll definitely be back sometime in the future and we'll definitely plan to book Wendy's place when we do!
reviews/7/comments: Absolutely gorgeous home with plenty of sleeping space and more for our family of 5 and  in-law family of 4. Could not ask for a more gorgeous setting in Crested Butte, biking to trails, walking to town (2 blocks), taking the bus up the mountain. Would stay again in a heartbeat.
reviews/8/comments: Great place and very convenient location.
reviews/9/comments: Awesome house and perfect location!

name: Modern Mountain Luxury Penthouse in Beaver Creek
reviews/0/comments: We used Cristina's Airbnb as our bridal suite for our wedding weekend. My husband stayed at the Park Hyatt and this was so much better! The light was absolutely beautiful and gave us the most beautiful pictures. Everything was meticulously organized in the suite which made it really easy when we needed last minute items like scissors, etc. Cristina was one of the most helpful hosts that we have had on Airbnb. She supplied a guide that we sent to guests so they knew where to go in Beaver Creek. She allowed us to ship flowers in advance of our rehearsal dinner and the St. James is conveniently located in the village. It also came with 2 parking spots which were so helpful during the weekend! Brides/Grooms - stay here and not the hotels! It was more perfect than I could have ever imagined. And the Airbnb is beautifully decorated!
reviews/1/comments: Our family had a wonders to stay at this condo. It comfortable and well. appointed. We loved it and hope to be back next summer!
reviews/2/comments: Wonderful condo, very comfortable for a large group, and right in the heart of Beaver Creek. Everything you need is there, with restaurants within walking distance. Cristina is a great host.
reviews/3/comments: Excellent host & property!
reviews/4/comments: The condo is just beautiful, very roomy, and in a perfect location.  And spectacular views!  Christine is a fantastic host, quick and friendly response to all communications, and very accommodating.  Great stay!
reviews/5/comments: Breathtaking views, amazing housekeeping service, spotlessly clean. Our 6 year old absolutely loved the bunk beds! Cristina is a kind and very communicative host. We had a wonderful time and the Airbnb is even prettier than the photos. Highly recommend.
reviews/6/comments:
My family had the pleasure of staying in this incredible unit over spring break and we agree it was the best family vacation we have ever taken.

The walkability to skiing and restaurants can't be beat, the kitchen is full of high end appliances (the view while cooking is incredible too) and the building has a nice pool and it's own ski locker.

I highly recommend Cristina and this awesome property!!
reviews/7/comments: We had a wonderful stay at the Cristina’s unit!  We have stayed at other units in the building and this was clearly the best.  It is modern, clean, comfortable and well stocked…it was exactly as described.  Cristina was a great host and communicated well before and throughout the stay.   Would definitely stay here again!
reviews/8/comments: Great condo in a very good location.
reviews/9/comments: Excellent space and location. Easy short walk to the slopes and market is literally a minute outside the door. Right in town.

name: Darien Ranch Lodge: 7 Queen or King, 4 Singles
reviews/0/comments: Darien Lodge was the perfect place for a  New Years Ski Trip with some friends. Larry built the lodge himself, and his family has owned the surrounding ranch for decades, we really enjoyed our conversation with him when we arrived d learning more about the property. About an hour and 15 to hour and a half drive to the 4 Aspen ski resorts. Larry and the county snow plow did a great job of clearing the driveway and roads before we left each morning. Larry accommodated 16 guests and 6 dogs, and was helpful whenever we had a question. We loved snowshoeing with the dogs on the trail across the street because it helped them get their energy out after they stayed home while we went skiing. Everyone enjoyed the scenic views, the hot tub, family dinners, and having their own bathrooms and spacious sleeping quarters! Two things that I think are worth keeping in mind when booking which weren’t super obvious to me when I booked: You have a larger commercial fridge but no freezer, and Larry lives in an apartment in the basement of the Lodge. This is very helpful whenever you need help with anything, but something worth noting before you book if privacy is a priority! Thank you for a wonderful stay
reviews/1/comments: We had a wonderful time at Larry's home. The house is very beautiful and super super clean and have all our needs. If we go to Marble, Co again, we are for sure will stay at this place again. I will recommended to my friends when they have trip to here.
reviews/1/response:
Thank you for your kind review. We appreciate you all staying at the lodge and thank you for leaving the lodge so clean and nice. We will look forward to your return!

Wishing you and yours a happy new year!

Larry
reviews/2/comments:
I dont think I can put into words how beautiful Larry's place is. We had a large group and 3 dogs. The place accommodated 16 people easily without feeling cramped.
They responded quickly and were so helpful and accommodating. The pictures do not do this place justice. It is a place you have to see and experience for yourself. The place is very well thought out. Everything we needed was available! We will definitely be planning on going back soon! Thank you guys for making our stay so special for us!
reviews/3/comments: awesome place - great location - very clean - would return for another stay!
reviews/4/comments: Larry and Leslie are phenomenal hosts who made us feel welcome and at home, the ranch is stunning and we had an unforgettable trip - would highly recommend and hope to go back soon.
reviews/5/comments: This is an absolutely beautiful place. Larry lives in an apartment below so he is almost always available.  There is a lawn area for games and a deck below the house right on the river.  The rooms are clean and (in my eyes) large and have their own bathrooms.  This is a great place to get away from it all. Highly recommended.
reviews/5/response:
Hi Ross,
Thank you for your kind words and recommendation. We enjoyed meeting you and your family and having you stay at the lodge.

We hope you and yours will return for more family gatherings.

All the best,
Larry and Leslie
reviews/6/comments: Great cabin, beautiful location, peaceful location. Best vacation in a while!
reviews/7/comments: True mountain hospitality. Experience unparalleled views and unbelievable riverfront access.

name: Snowmass Ski-In/Ski-Out Home w/Shared Pool/Hot Tub/WiFi/Lovely Views/Private W/D
reviews/0/comments: Great place and location
reviews/1/comments: Great stay

name: Fasching Haus Unit 9
reviews/0/comments: The location is wonderful. We were able to walk to the gondola, bars, and shops. It was nice having a full sized kitchen with an large square island for our family to sit at and play games. The furnishings are high quality and the ensuite bathrooms were perfect. We had a great time and highly recommend staying here.
reviews/1/comments: A great place to stay! Awesome location, spacious condo ... enjoyed our stay thoroughly

name: Top of the Village Trails 307
reviews/0/comments: Can't review this unit, as we agreed to stay in another unit due to owner of original unit extending stay. The comparable unit was very well appointed, stocked and clean. Very private and quiet. Walking distance to restaurants.
reviews/1/comments: Great location
reviews/2/comments: Great spot, we went in the summer, so it was very nice and quiet. You can get really anywhere with free shuttles. We saw a fox which was a neat surprise. I am sure in ski season it is a different look and you are so close you can ski out.  Would definitely go again.
reviews/2/response: Thank you for the nice words. And - the fox family have been here for years. Our winter guests are so excited when they come back and foxes are still around!
reviews/3/comments:
This review is for the Trails 202 unit. There was a mixup with our reservation, bumping us from this unit, but Marie was able to get us booked for another unit in the building.
While I can’t comment on the specific unit linked with this review, I can comment on the beautiful complex and free shuttle service. The complex is very quiet and beautiful. The free shuttle service provided as timely and flawless. We rarely waited more than 5 min. The views surrounding the complex are unsurpassable.
reviews/4/comments: We really enjoyed our stay.
reviews/5/comments: Great place! No hiccups at all and lots of room. Very nice view.
reviews/6/comments: A most wonderful space to take in the beauty of this area!
reviews/7/comments: great location, spacious and well equipped
reviews/8/comments: Great condo, location and communication from the host/front desk. Needed maintenance to come fix something and it was taken care of within the hour. The massage chair in the living room was a bonus!
reviews/9/comments: Great condo. Perfect access to the slopes ski in ski out. Well appointed had everything we needed  for a ski vacation. Condo  was cleaned perfectly and exactly as advertised. Great communication from the host. I would highly recommend this rental.

name: 866 Bachelor Ridge
ASPEN CORE CONDO, 2BEDROOM, 2 BATH, PATIO-DECK!
reviews/0/comments: Mary and her place were both fantastic! The location can’t be beat and the apartment had everything we needed. Mary was a fantastic host and very communicative. I would certainly recommend her Airbnb
reviews/1/comments: Great host a great location. Aspen can be a little tricky with rentals, but the experience was amazing! The apartments is located in the center of downtown walking distance to everything.
reviews/2/comments: This place is AWESOME!!  Location is right in town and close to the Gondola.  Spacious living area, clean and GREAT host.    Mary even got us tickets for a sold out concert.

name: Hyatt Condominium #5 - Three Bedroom
reviews/0/comments: Amazing place with gorgeous on-mountain views! Very warm and beautifully decorated with great amenities. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone staying in Beaver Creek!
reviews/1/comments: Great condo.  Wonderful location.

name: Large 3B+ condo near Buttermilk Mtn.
reviews/0/comments: This condo was really nice, clean, spacious and the kitchen/bathrooms were well-stocked. It had more than enough space for my group of 6. We only spent one night here, but we all wished we could have stayed longer to take advantage of the place. The only reason I didn't give this 5 stars is because one of the twin beds was broken/collapsed, and I had to sleep in a sunken-in bed. It was very uncomfortable, and I couldn't fall asleep. If this isn't fixed soon, just keep that in mind when planning for your party size, as this bed is unusable.
reviews/1/comments: Diane’s house was perfect for what I needed! Clean, spacious and great location
reviews/2/comments: Amazing home

name: LUXURY~Ski-in/out ~ Top of the Village Trails 109
Exclusive and Private Roaring Fork Riverfront Town Home - Walk to restaurants and shops
Fasching Haus Unit 8
reviews/0/comments: Great location.  Easy walking distance to all restaurants.  Some small issues with cleaning...beer bottle left behind.  Host responsive and helpful.  Sent someone to pick it up immediately.  Wish they have some salt, sugar, coffee, etc.
reviews/1/comments:
This is the perfect spot for a winter or summer getaway: you are feet from the slopes and a few miles from the Maroon Bells. The condo itself is fully equipped with Wifi, two TVs, a smart microwave, and AC/heating. The Fasching Haus condos are also located far enough away from the town that there is no traffic noise.

I highly recommend this condo!

Christina

name: Slopeside Condo! Hot Tub Access! ~ Terracehouse
reviews/0/comments: awesome location for skiing/riding at Snowmass > easy access to the mall and plenty of parking for inexpensive per day rate.

name: Ski-In/Ski-Out Condo in Snowmass w/Shared Pool & Hot Tub/Free WiFi/Private W/D!
reviews/0/comments: We enjoyed our 2 night stay here, very comfortable beds!  Amazing shower off main bedroom.  Beautiful views off private deck.  Nice and quiet area with a hot tub nearby.  Great location as well, thank you!
reviews/1/comments: Great condo on the mountain.
reviews/2/comments: This place was perfect for our family, although it could have slept many more comfortably! Great view of the mountains from living and balcony. The kitchen had everything we needed. We would stay there again.
reviews/3/comments: Wonderful stay.  Very nice, clean unit and great location.
reviews/4/comments: Fine stay in Snowmass. Great location, quiet and spacious. Very clean and the guys at reception were great. There is no A/C which I missed while booking and it does get quite warm during the afternoon. A box fan was provided which was essential. I would stay again.
reviews/5/comments: Everything about this condo was amazing. the location, the front desk attendants, the condo itself was beautiful. Located right outside the Vista trail and a trail leading to "basecamp" and very easy access to Aspen via the free city bus. You won't regret this stay.
reviews/6/comments: Our stay at Vacasa Colorado was about what we expected. There were a couple set-backs worth noting, one is that we reached out to the host via message, phone, and email, and never once heard back from them. The check-in office is also tricky to find, and once we did find it we were given a faulty key not once but twice, and had 2 small children in tow going back and forth from the office to our room. The TV  didn't work, because the AppleTV remote was broken and therefor we couldn't log-in to the internet to connect. Finally, on our final night, the upstairs neighbors arrived just after we put our kids to bed and they was impossibly loud, waking our kids up. On the plus side, the beds were comfortable, we enjoyed the hot tub, and the condo had the basic amenities that we needed.
reviews/6/response: Thank you for staying with us, Kelly! We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, and we are so sorry for the difficulty of getting in touch with us. The battery for the Apple TV remote has been replaced, thank you for bringing this to our attention. We hope to have another opportunity to host you.
reviews/7/comments: The guy who checked us in was extremely friendly and knowledgeable. The room was nice, the beds were comfortable. Everything was great.

name: The English Victorian (#1)
reviews/0/comments:
We had a wonderful stay! The location is fantastic, practically on the base of the slopes and in the heart of town. It was such a pleasure coming home every day and night to our own little apartment, cozy , clean and decorated like a period piece.
Your host Terry makes sure you have everything you expect and more! She even made sure the Aspen's we're golden yellow :-)
We will be back!
reviews/1/comments: Our experience at the Aspen Residence Hotel was great.  The room was gorgeous and we felt extremely welcome.  Terry and her pup were very kind and we enjoyed speaking with them for the brief time we saw them.  Overall it was a great experience.

name: Aspen Highlands CO | Ritz Carlton Residence Club | 2 Bedroom
Ski-In/Ski-Out Winter Retreat with Pool, Hot Tub, Free WiFi, & Airport Shuttle
reviews/0/comments: Loved it. Exceeded expectations. Wonderful place to stay, will be saving it in my favorites for next time.
reviews/1/comments: Don't want to publish
reviews/1/response: Thanks for taking the time to leave a comment, Anne. We welcome your comments to improve our services and accommodation. We hope to have the opportunity to impress you in the future!
reviews/2/comments: This place is a mixed bag with the downfalls largely due to it being run by a management company vs. an individual. The photos are accurate. The condo is large and had plenty of room for two families including an infant, toddler, and a dog. For the most part, the condo was clean when we arrived but we had an issue with flies (both dead and alive) in the master bedroom. We raised this to TurnKey but nothing was done about it. As others have mentioned check-in is a little clunky - the wifi password is not correct and everything is very policy-driven because it is a management company (we could not even park our car on the property before our check-in due to policy. Before you can confirm your reservation you have to register for their guest portal and I was not entirely comfortable with having to reconfirm my identity by sharing more personal data off of the AirBnb platform. Late check-out was offered to us at the cost of $40 which was a bit of a turn-off and felt pretty silly to charge us $20/hr to check out late? Overall, I don't think I would stay at another TurnKey property. Very corporate, a lot of managing the reservation happens off of the AirBnb platform, and all of it takes away from the charm and appeal of renting an AirBnb.
reviews/3/comments: Great location in Snowmass.
reviews/3/response:
Hi Colleen,
Thank you so much for your review and kind words about our property! We’re so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. You were the perfect guests, and we look forward to the next time! -The TurnKey Team
reviews/4/comments: This place is amazing! Fantastic views from every window and super close to the gondola and base village shops, restaurants, and great trails.
reviews/5/comments: The new management (TurnKey) doesn't have its act together on this unit (we were given the wrong door code, the wrong internet, and were told we needed an elevator key card (which we didn't) for which the management folks who are actually located on the property had no knowledge.  Made for a bumpy check in and wasted time on a simple weekend getaway.  Importantly, this unit does NOT sleep 8 as advertized, unless you include a sleeping sofa in the lobby OUTSIDE the unit, next to the elevator!
reviews/5/response:
Hi Kathleen,

Thank you for taking the time to leave this review. We are sorry to hear about the door code not working upon check in and the incorrect WIFI information given to you and for any inconvenience this caused as well. At TurnKey, it’s our highest priority to make sure our guests have the best experience possible, but if problems do arise, we try our very best to make things right in any way we can, and we are so glad you called our 24/7 guest hotline to let us know about it, and that we were able to get the issues resolved quickly for you. We will also be reaching out to the local team to make sure the listing is correct on occupancy for the property. Thanks again for your patience and for being absolutely perfect guests. We look forward to you staying with us again! -The TurnKey Team
reviews/6/comments:
O apartamento é extraordinário!
Tudo perfeito, não tivemos falta de nada.
A localização e a vista são excelentes.
Eu e minha família tivemos um tempo incrível, maravilhoso.
Tivemos limpeza diária.
Atendimento impecável!
Queremos voltar em breve e aproveitar mais desse lugar.
reviews/6/localizedReview/comments:
The apartment is extraordinary!
Perfect, we didn't miss anything.
The location and the view are great.
Me and my family had an amazing, wonderful time.
We had daily cleaning.
Spotless service!
We want to come back soon and enjoy more of this place.

name: Aspen Highlands CO | Ritz Carlton Residence Club | 3 Bedroom
Mountain Modern Downtown Core
★  Snowmass Club Access ★ Villas ★  Unit 1511
reviews/0/comments: Great unit, directly across the street from the main clubhouse!  Would definitely go back
reviews/1/comments: Great location. Access to Snowmass Club is a great benefit.
reviews/2/comments: Adorable condo. Very convenient. Very attractive. Nice and comfortable
reviews/3/comments: Amazing, we will be back!
reviews/4/comments: The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
reviews/5/comments: Morgan’s place was perfect for our family trip with the in-laws and kids. We loved the spacious condo and amenities at the snowmass club
reviews/6/comments: This condo is fantastic!! It is an easy shuttle ride to the mountain from right out front, the club with pool/hot tub/gym etc amenities was right across the street, and we had the happy surprise of finding the condo to be even larger than it appeared in the pictures! All rooms were very comfortable and the view out the back door was stunning. We can’t wait to come back!
reviews/7/comments: Wonderful place to stay!
reviews/8/comments: The condo is stylish, clean and comfortable. The health club is across the street and  is awesome.  Beautiful pools, large extremely well equipped workout room, good classes, and nice locker room.
reviews/9/comments: Lovely condo and great location! Place was also super clean and had awesome views. We enjoyed our stay very much.

name: Snowbunny Lane Ski Retreat
Mountain Gem Walking Distance From Slopes w/Shared Pool & Hot Tubs, Free WiFi
reviews/0/comments:
Great location for what we needed.
Clean and comfortable.
reviews/1/comments: Great condo in the heart of Snowmass Village!  Condo was clean although the living room was a smaller than it appears in the pictures.  That said, each of the rooms was nicely furnished.  It was a quick walk to the gondola that brings you up to the stores and restaurants.  Oddly, there were only 4 coffee cups for our group of six.  Also, there were no beer mugs/glasses; just some tall plastic glasses. We ate meals out in the village so didn't really use the kitchen other than the refrigerator. The heated pool and hot tubs were very nice and directly across from our front door!  We used them two of the three days we were there.  All in all, a nice condo in a great location!
reviews/1/response: Thank you for your review, Stephen. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our home's location. We are sorry that the living room seemed to be smaller than anticipated but hope it had everything you needed! Regarding the kitchen equipment, we will do an inventory and make sure that our home is well stocked for future arrivals. We appreciate the feedback and look forward to hosting you again!
reviews/2/comments: Nice place, great location quick walking distance to everything in snow mass, 20ish minutes from aspen. The shower in the master had a sauna 🧖‍♂️ option which was a nice surprise.
reviews/3/comments: Great property in a great location.  Host was very easy to communicate with and responded quickly.  Easy check in at the property.  Property as described and very clean.
reviews/4/comments: Great location and very nice place
reviews/5/comments: The facility’s location, set up and cleanliness were superb. I feel like I got great value for the money.
reviews/6/comments: We thoroughly enjoyed the unit. It is represented well in the photos - very clean and spacious. The unit is very close to the pool and the hot tub which was a bonus. We had some issues with locating the parking permit upon check-in but the management company was very responsive.  Overall, we were very pleased with our stay here.
reviews/6/response:
Hi Mike,

We’re so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We agree that this home is the perfect place to get restful relaxation away from the world. Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review and share your experience. You were perfect guests, and we look forward to next time! -The TurnKey VR Team
reviews/7/comments:
The unit is just as pictured but the support from next door is poor at best.....

The kitchen sink broke while we were there. We contacted next door first thing in the morning and identified that the sink was not working and we were in the middle of breakfast. We told them they could enter without us being present. We got home at 4pm from skiing and the sink still didn’t work. Called next door again and they had someone there within an hour. The tech told us next door didn’t contact them until 30 mins before....the unit was only stocked with 1 toilet paper per bathroom, one roll of paper towels, one box of tissues, etc. We have a 4 day stay and had similar issues trying to get more paper products through next door. The unit was fine but dealing with next door sucked
reviews/7/response:
Hi Brody,
Thank you for taking the time to leave this review and we are happy to hear that you enjoyed the location and our home. We are so sorry for the delay in getting someone out to fix the sink for you. Here at TurnKey, your feedback is highly valued, and although we do try our best to offer the most impeccable service possible, there are times when we fall short of that. We appreciate your understanding as our call volume was higher than normal during your stay. Regarding supplies provided at the home, we stock each home with what is called a "starter supply" of basic items. It is not designed to be an unlimited supply but, rather, to get folks started so that they can enjoy their arrival days, take inventory, and pick up whatever else is needed to get them through their trip. Prior to each stay, we stock dish soap, laundry detergent, a roll of paper towels, toilet paper, a dish brush to wash dishes, a few trash bags, dishwasher detergent, bar soap, and the standard bathroom amenities you might find in a hotel. Please know that we have addressed the importance of communication with the team and this should not be an issue moving forward. If there is anything else that we can do to assist you, please do not hesitate to reach out on our 24/7 guest support line to let us know. – The TurnKey VR Team
reviews/8/comments: Sparkling clean, great location, fabulous amenities.  We had a wonderful weekend!
reviews/8/response:
Hi Kristin,
Thank you for the compliments, and we love hearing how much you enjoyed your stay with us! We agree the amenities are fabulous and the location is perfect for exploring everything Snowmass and Aspen have to offer. You were the perfect guests, and we appreciate you taking care of our place as if it were your own. Please come and stay again at any time! -The TurnKey VR Team

name: Renovated Condo Close to Aspen Snowmass Ski Resort w/WiFi + Shared Pool/Hot Tubs
reviews/0/comments: Sparkling clean and very comfortable beds!!!
reviews/1/comments: We had so much fun! Amazing place close walk to the village and a nice view of pool and hot tub! Although the beds are very uncomfortable!
reviews/1/response:
Hi Exzandra,

Thank you for taking the time to leave this review. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us. We appreciate you giving your feedback on the beds, we will absolutely take a look into this with the local team. Please come and stay with us again in the future! -The TurnKey Team
reviews/2/comments: Great location and very comfortable. Just remember to bring your own toiletries - including your own TP!  That would have been a challenge if we had not had a car.
reviews/2/response:
Hi Kelly,

Thank you for your review, and we’re happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at our place! That being said, we’re so sorry for the lack of toilet paper and for any inconvenience this caused as well. We stock each of our homes with a "starter supply" of basic items, such as dish soap, laundry detergent, a roll of paper towels, toilet paper, a dish brush to wash dishes, a few trash bags, dishwasher detergent, bar soap, and the standard bathroom amenities you might find in a hotel. Please know that we are following up with our Housekeeping Team to address this concern and ensure they are adequately stocking the home during their cleans. Next time you stay with us, remember our 24/7 guest hotline is always available to call with any issues that may come up. We want to make sure you’re as comfortable as you can be during your stay. You were perfect guests, and we look forward to next time! -The TurnKey VR Team

name: Fasching Haus Unit 210
Ski-In/Ski-Out Condo in Snowmass w/Shared Pool/Hot Tub/WiFi/Private Washer/Dryer
★★★★★Million DollarCastle.Walktodowntwn.Hotspring⛷
reviews/0/comments: Our family loved this house! It was gorgeous! I would buy it! So many sleeping arrangements, lots of games, we wanted to just stay indoors! However, the trails were right outside our door where we could run or hike and bike! The hosts hospitality was incredible as they did little things that made our stay over the top! Would come back anytime!
reviews/1/comments: We loved staying at the Castle! It was in perfect proximity to Glenwood and was clean, spacious, and unique! Meera was a great host who was very easy to communicate with and answered any question I had. She even left us a bottle of wine and a card. Would 10/10 recommend
reviews/2/comments:
My large group of 16 people people had the absolute best time at the Million Dollar Castle,
We were impressed with the size of the house and the remote wonderland location while still having the ability to walk to downtown Glenwood and the hot-springs. The house is located right in the heart of Glenwood springs.
The Mountain View’s were breathtaking and (Website hidden by Airbnb) definitely set us up for an excellent trip. The host was top notch and great with communication including an excellent guidebook once you get to the property. The house was sparkling clean and well stocked. We had enough room to park 4 cars and had street parking which is exceptional for the proximity to downtown. We felt like it was the perfect house as we had so many gathering spots and flexibility with sleeping spots for a group of 16. I usually fly into Aspen and stay there but wow the value for money and authenticity here cannot be beat. The layout was original with the house being fully renovated with many custom pieces. I am renting this house for my sisters wedding in the Winter as this would be the perfect spot to have for the bridal party. We will be back soon!
reviews/3/comments: Amazing place! Beautiful location , amazing house, Meerschaum was really kind and made us feel so welcomed to her home !
reviews/4/comments: House was unique, clean, and bright. It was within walking distance to town and yet still had a private location feel to it. There is no covered parking or garage and there are a lot of stairs to enter and throughout the home.
reviews/5/comments: Stayed with my family,  lots of things to do for kids of all ages, including the 30+ year kids.
reviews/6/comments: Great stay. Easy communication.
reviews/7/comments: House is really unique and clean. There are a lot of stairs so be ready if any elderly stay. The view is really nice. The host is very kind.
reviews/8/comments: Booked this house and I’ll absolutely book it again. Had a large group (11) and everyone of us was comfortable. The communication with Meera was easy and friendly. Everything was easily found around the house. Great space. Great location. Beautiful beautiful views.
reviews/9/comments: Great home in a beautiful location! Communication was timely and accommodations were comfortable.

name: Contemporary Smuggler Hideaway with Aspen Views
reviews/0/comments: The house was perfect for our family. Easy and beautiful walk into town. Simple access to the buses for skiing. The space was gorgeous. Seamless check in and out. Can’t say enough good things about our experience.
reviews/1/comments: Beautiful space! Clean and easy to navigate.
reviews/2/comments: great location. good house for a group needing several beds. Loved the heated floors.
reviews/3/comments: This house was perfect for us. The view from the living room was amazing, the layout of the home was perfect and we really enjoyed our stay.
reviews/4/comments: Wonderful home.
reviews/5/comments: Great Aspen house close to the Rio Grande Trail! Kristina’s house is beautiful and well appointed for a family with young kids + a babysitter. We loved the proximity to hiking and biking trails, 2 grocery stores and downtown Aspen. We’d absolutely stay here again!
reviews/6/comments: A truly wonderful, comfortable  home perfectly situated for any kind of Aspen vacation. Terrific communication with Kristina and the house spotless and not wanting for a thing. Looking forward to returning whenever possible!
reviews/7/comments: Perfect house for a stay in Aspen. House is very clean and well equipped. The view near the gas fireplace is spectacular - makes it hard to leave. The house's proximity to one of the many walking trails that stem from downtown is a huge bonus!
reviews/8/comments: This home is such an incredibly special place ! Amazing location- walking distance to town! Gorgeous high ceilings in the large common space with a great chefs kitchen including every tool or pan you could ask for ! Comfortable, clean, efficient, spacious... it’s perfect ! We would stay here again in a heartbeat and highly recommend to anyone looking for a great comfortable, clean, chic and cozy house in Aspen.
reviews/9/comments: Great spot, close to downtown, beautiful home.

name: Downtown Aspen | 2 Bedroom Condo | Walk to Lift
Fasching Haus Unit 5
reviews/0/comments: Check in process could be improved, not efficient. You have to check in at an office about a 15-20 minute walk from the actual unit. The unit is very nice and in a good location. The best way to communicate with the owner is by calling the Realestate office, messaging through AirBnb was not replied to in a timely manner.

name: 762 Holden Road
The Kebler Home: Walk to Elk Ave! Dog Friendly!
reviews/0/comments: Great house on the edge of town. Perfect to stay with our broader family. Enjoyed walking and biking everywhere. Would definitely stay here again!
reviews/1/comments: Great home base for a family trip to Crested Butte!  Well stocked with everything we needed.
reviews/2/comments: Great place - right next to town, very comfortable and spacious. Definitely would go back
reviews/3/comments: The house was very nice and comfortable. Had everything you would need. Kitchen stocked very good. Can't beat the view and location to town. Walking distance to all the shops and restaurant. Communication was extremely good. I highly recommend staying here and will rent again next time I come for a visit.
reviews/4/comments: Great house. Perfect location. Private, but still close to town. Owner and management were wonderful.
reviews/5/comments: Location is amazing!! A short walk to downtown. Tons of parking available in the driveway and on the street close by. Supplies in the home are comprehensive if you want to cook there. Common area couch was comfy and lots of deck chairs available to enjoy the amazing view of the mountains and the river that runs in the backyard. They could step their game up in cleanliness and quality of beds/furniture in the house.
reviews/6/comments: The house is very comfortable and has a great view from the deck.  It also has a nice side yard to walk dogs at night.  Perfect location at the edge of town.
reviews/7/comments: Ideal location, a quiet spot in nature on the edge of  a busy tourist town. A great spot for our extended family gathering.
reviews/8/comments: Great place!
reviews/9/comments: We had a great time and would definitely stay here again!

name: Innsbruck Aspen 2 Bedroom Suite 02
Ski In/Ski Out Snowmass Village 1BR/1BA
reviews/0/comments: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION....we had a fantastic stay at Dana's place. It is idyllically situated...walk out door basically to gondola or lift, restaurants, shops...Condo had all we needed, very comfortable and clean. Truly a great place and well kept if you are planning on visiting Snowmass! Dana was also on top of everything, easy and prompt communication! We'll be back!
reviews/1/comments: Was a great place to stay! Super convenient to the Snowmass Gondola and ski rentals. Would highly recommend.
reviews/2/comments: Great place to stay in Snowmass Village. Close to everything- ski rentals right out the door, steps to ski school and lifts. Skating rink, playground and food right out the door. Great for a family of 4. Nice amenities and modern.
reviews/3/comments: Very nice modern condo in a great location. 2 mins from lift and in the middle of base village. Great stay!
reviews/4/comments: Great location, prompt communication.  Gondola and ski rental right out the front door. Short walk to a decent market and the free shuttle to Aspen.  Balcony overlooks the hot tubs which makes it convenient to pick the perfect time for a soak after skiing. What more could you ask for?  Taylor was quick to answer my questions via text msg which was much appreciated.
reviews/5/comments: Great place in a great location. Host was very responsive.

name: Mountain Lodge! Stonebridge Inn - Deluxe King Room
reviews/0/comments: Wonderful escape to the mountains! Front desk service caring and attentive. Pool and restaurant very enjoyable. Easy access to snowmass village. Will be returning!
reviews/1/comments: Sam's spot was perfect! Spacious, clean room in a great location. Thanks for hosting us and we'll be back soon.
reviews/2/comments: Stonebridge Inn is the perfect slopeside experience for snowmass!! Couldn’t recommend highly enough, can’t wait to come back again next season!
reviews/3/comments: Great experience in Snowmass! Ski in/out was close and east and the room was great. Check in at the front desk at Stonebridge Inn was very easy and everyone was friendly and helpful.  Parking was right across from the entrance and easy to access. Highly recommend and will try to book again in the future.
reviews/4/comments: Good ski-in ski-out. Great location near restaurants & shopping
reviews/5/comments: Great location. Friendly staff. Restaurant was very good. Rooms outdated and very small.
reviews/6/comments: Very comfortable stay--part of a hotel. They have everything you need and very convenient for skiing Snowmass!
reviews/7/comments: Very communicative and friendly
reviews/8/comments: This is a great location in Snowmass! They were responsive and it was a great place to stay. The place was clean and comfortable!
reviews/9/comments: Loved this place

reviews/0/comments: We loved this place.  Will definitely be back.
reviews/1/comments: The Enclave's location is fabulous.  Truly ski-in/out.  The apartment was very clean and the bedding/linen set up was great.  Housekeeping coming through on a daily basis was also appreciated.  The pool and hot tub were used on a daily basis and we have very few complaints.  There's a ski locker downstairs to store your stuff which also helps since you dont need to lug it upstairs/downstairs every day.  All good!

reviews/3/comments: Great place, fit the whole Family!
reviews/4/comments: Great place and convenient location. Highly recommend it for families.
reviews/5/comments: Great location and great hot tub ;)
reviews/6/comments: Perfect for a weekend (or more) on Snowmass!
reviews/7/comments: Very nice location and worth the price!
reviews/8/comments: The photos do not do justice to the place. We really enjoyed our stay. It’s proximity to the ski resort and the amenities in the house are some things worth mentioning. Would definitely recommend this place.
reviews/9/comments: Awesome place!  HUGE, with lots of beds.  Very clean and quiet.  Really enjoyed the pool and hot tub.  In a great complex, with helpful check in process.  Very accurate listing, pictures were identical to the space.

reviews/1/comments: I would highly recommend this property for anyone traveling to Aspen. It exceeded our expectations and is so well located in the city. You can walk almost everywhere.

name: Aspen Highlands CO | Ritz Carlton Residence Club | 2 Bedroom
Ritz Carlton Club 2BR
reviews/0/comments: Best Apt and Best Host!Gareth is really a super host, very responsive and happy to share all his knowledge of Aspen, he is also a really great ski guide, so make sure to check early because Gareth’s schedule fills up. In terms of the apartment at the Ritz Carlton in Aspen Highland it is perfect in every way. The 2 bedroom apt is very large and comfortable with a lovely living room and dining area; fully set up kitchen; beautiful bathroom; service at property is perfect from concierge support booking restaurants etc to the ski team’s help in organizing and setting up ski’s. The pools, hottub and spa are also so great at the end of each day. This is 100% ski in-out which we really loved. We will certainly be returning!
reviews/0/response: Thank you. Lovely to meet you. I look forward to skiing with you again!

name: Ski-In/Ski-Out Mountain Home with WiFi, Private Hot Tub, Wood Fireplace - Dogs OK
reviews/0/comments: Great place!
reviews/1/comments: Rustic cabin
reviews/2/comments: Great location. House needs work.
reviews/3/comments: Cozy home in a great location
reviews/4/comments: We loved our stay here. Beautiful spacious home surrounded by nature. Plenty of room to spread out and beds are cozy! Hi them is perfect for cooking and the hot tub is a nice bonus for the end of day relaxation! Would highly recommend!
reviews/5/comments: Great location for a family trip
reviews/6/comments:
This property could have been an excellent choice for our boys ski weekend. It is reasonably well located and is able to comfortably accommodate up to 8 people without putting someone in a bunk bed.
However, the condition of the house upon arrival almost ruined the trip for all concerned. It started with a "hidden" lock box holding the entry key (and no instructions on how to find it) and then continued with finding no running water in the kitchen, minimal toilet paper in the bathrooms, light bulbs not working, a TV not working & a hot tub that had been turned off and took 6 hours to heat up.
All these issues were ultimately resolved but it took multiple calls to get attention to these issues. The property manager needs to do better to make sure the house is functioning at the standard it promises.
reviews/6/response:
Hi Steve,

Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review and for providing us this feedback. We are very sorry to hear about the maintenance issues you experienced and for any trouble this caused. At TurnKey, it’s our highest priority to make sure our guests have the best experience possible, but if problems do arise, we try our very best to make things right in any way we can. Our records show that our local Field Operations Team assisted you right away on Feb 7th when you contacted us regarding the issues you were experiencing. We appreciate your patience and for taking care of our place. Please know that we perform regularly scheduled inspections on the home to ensure it receives the proper upkeep and care for future guests, this includes making sure that the home is well-appointed and properly stocked. Thanks again for your patience and if there is anything else we can do for you, reach out to our 24/7 guest hotline and let us know! -The TurnKey VR Team
reviews/7/comments: Nice place good value
reviews/8/comments: Nice house in wonderful place with wildlife
reviews/9/comments: Very clean and comfortable! Excellent service.

name: Durant Condominiums Unit D3
reviews/0/comments: Great location. You can walk to everything.

name: NEW! Custom Luxury Villa w/ Hot Tub & Walk to Lift
reviews/0/comments: Daniel (host) was very responsive and easy to communicate with. Check-in was simple with keyless entry and the house was beautiful and perfect for our group of 14 people. Everyone had comfortable sleeping and good access to bathrooms. The hot tub was an added bonus and our overall stay was extremely positive. Wouldn’t change a thing with how the trip went.
reviews/1/comments: Beautiful house and extremely clean. Our group had a wonderful stay!
reviews/2/comments: Amazing house in a great location. It was perfect for our group.
reviews/3/comments:
Great place for our 5-family ski trip. It’s not ski-in, ski-out, but the nearest lift (Lumberjack) is only a 3-minute walk away. In the morning, we usually put all the ski gears in the car and drop the skiers off at the lift access which is only less than a minute drive.

The villa has 5 ½ bath. The three suites (one queen size bed on the 1st floor and two king size bed on the 2nd floor) has their own bathrooms. The two king-size bedrooms in the basement share one bathroom. The two bunk-bed rooms share another full bathroom. There is plenty of room for our group (21 people including 3 teenagers and 8 kids).

We love the private hot tub with the mountain view, as well as the backyard for sledging and snow play. Pool table in the basement game room is also one of the favorites.

Parking: 4 parking spots are identified in the listing. But you can actually park two cars on the driveway. That way you can park up to 5 cars onsite!

Our host, Daniel, is very welcoming and responsive. Many a time we found something missing or need more information and he is always one text away to resolve the issues.

The only small imperfection is about some house supply (missing or not enough for a big group) and the cleanliness in some parts of the house. We believe that was more a function of the cleaning crew than the host. And once we reached out to Daniel, he was always quick to respond and react!
reviews/4/comments:
Beautifully-updated house with plenty of room for 16 adults in our party. Kitchen was well stocked and had everything we needed for preparing large meals. Plenty of seating for group meals between the island, kitchen table and family room. We loved the decor and upscale renovations throughout.
Host was very responsive to questions I had upon check-in.
reviews/5/comments: Great place, I will stay here again
reviews/6/comments: Great house for our large group.
reviews/7/comments:
The Good :
The house is in good condition with lot of upgrades. Well firnished and looks clean. The house is great overall.

The bad:
-- Description of the property is not correct. This property has 5.5 bath and not 6 bath. We were six families and we needed 6 full bath.
-- We called multiple times and texted for service call to the number provided in the email. Never received call back in the four days.
-- Cound't adjust the heaters in the basement. It was too hot. Didn't get any help to fix heater during our stay.

I could have given higher rating but due the above issues, I am gving only three star.
reviews/7/response:
Hi Kripal, we want to make vacation rental easy for everyone, and we're sorry if you felt caught off guard. We followed up with the homeowner after reading your feedback, and they wanted to share the following:
- The listing photos accurately reflect the bathroom configurations but we're sorry if these didn't match your group's needs.
- The Guest Contact and Evolve never received any outreach from you during your stay. We provide the Guest Contact's information in the Welcome Letter, and a personal email from the owner with the number to call and entry codes was also sent to you before your check-in.
- The house is equipped with radiant heat and a thermostat, and instructions for how to use these amenities are included in the House Manual as well as in the email attachment from the owner.
Thanks for letting us know about your stay, we're glad that you loved the house and all of its well-appointed features and upgrades!
reviews/8/comments: The house was fabulous & Copper Mountain is a really neat place to stay. It was so close to restaurants, outdoor cafes, hiking, biking, shopping and many activities for children & families. We visited Breckenridge, Vail Village & the town of Frisco but we found the Village of Copper Mountain to be a hidden gem!!
reviews/9/comments: Great place and very responsive hosts. The accommodations were perfect for our group of seven adults. We had room to spare. I highly recommend this place both for the quality of the home and of the hosts.

name: Contemporary Condo Close to it All!
Mountain Lodge! Stonebridge Inn - Deluxe 2 Queens
reviews/0/comments: Couldn’t recommend this Airbnb enough. Sam was great with her communication and the hospitality provided was top notch.
reviews/1/comments: Great location.
reviews/2/comments: This place is in a perfect location for visitors to the Snowmass and Aspen areas. The facility has everything that you need.
reviews/3/comments: Good location.  Room is quite warm for a summer visit because there is no cross ventilation -- even though only in high 70s outside.  Difficult time communicating with front desk -- on hold for a long time, then transferred, then finally dumped into VM that was never returned.  In room coffee service consisted of single k-cup pod for 2 people with 2 night stay.
reviews/4/comments: Very positive experience from booking the property to our actual stay. Lovely property with all the amenities you will need for a pleasant stay. The rooms are appointed nicely and very clean. The staff is friendly, helpful and respectful. The on-premises restaurant is excellent.  And the property is located in Snownass Village  and so convenient to walking and biking trails, restaurants, shopping, entertainment, grocery stores and all the beauty of Snowmass you could ask for!
reviews/5/comments: Really enjoyed being here! Check in and communication were excellent. I was worried about not having A/C but the windows open pretty wide and it gets cold in Aspen at night, so it was the perfect temperature in the room! The host also provided fans in case we needed them. It’s in a great location in Snowmass and close to plenty of places to eat!
reviews/6/comments: Excellent location, great pool and hot tub, friendly and helpful. I would definitely go back.
reviews/7/comments: Comfortable and clean. The property is a little more outdated than it looks in photos. But it’s nothing to be too upset about.
reviews/8/comments: It is a best place for the sightseeing and vacation in Snowmass and because of the pandemic most service were canceled for the sake of security.
reviews/9/comments: Great place to stay! I highly recommend. Location is awesome, but do be alert.

name: Ritz carlton apen highlands home
reviews/0/comments: Excellent location in front of the chairlift. 3br unit was perfect with large kitchen, balcony overlooking the mountain, latge dining table, spacious bedrooms and bathrooms. Joan was great host, very efficient communication.
reviews/1/comments: Joan was an amazing host. We really enjoyed our stay- everything was as described, in fact it was better. Staff were kind and amazing. We are definitely looking to stay with Joan in the future!
reviews/2/comments: Fantastic place to stay!  Joan is very responsive and will answer any questions you have immediately.  Extremely clean and has everything you need and more.  Staff is extremely helpful and friendly.  Quick 10 min ride into town.  Can wait to come back again!
reviews/3/comments: Great experience, would use again. No issues whatsoever (which is rare).

name: Aspen’s Spring Chalet
reviews/0/comments:
This was an amazing find and special place for a long weekend. Charming beyond words. Very private, comfortable, and cozy. A truly unique find and I can’t wait to come back.

Patrick was an awesome host who was attentive and accommodating. Genuinely felt like a very welcomed guest in his own personal home.
reviews/1/comments: Such charm! Conveniently located between Aspen and Snowmass Village. Snowshoeing on nearby trails was a real treat! Patrick and Nicole were very helpful and responsive.
reviews/2/comments: An amazing house and a very attentive host!
reviews/3/comments: Best host ever
reviews/4/comments: Amazing cabin conveniently located 15-20 mins from Aspen and ski areas just as the ad notes. Patrick and Nicole were amazing hosts and very responsive. The cabin is much bigger than pics show, with super cozy living room and fireplace, nice modern kitchen, and  cool little side bedroom that is great for reading or napping. There were only two of us for our stay, but could comfortably sleep more in that side room and the loft bed. Bathrooms very clean and well appointed  Highly recommend for anyone looking to stay outside town or the resorts. We visited during a huge snowstorm, and the driveway and road were plowed regularly making it easy to get in and out.
reviews/5/comments: Lovely place to stay up in the mountains. Chalet has everything you will need, and Patrick and Nicole are wonderful hosts.
reviews/6/comments: We loved staying in this cabin. The setting is up in the mountains yet close to Aspen/Snowmass. The cabin has a rustic feel and it is comfortable. There is a modern kitchen with everything you would need. Our 8 year old son loved staying in the loft. We enjoyed cozy nighttime fires after skiing and watching the sunrise from the deck.  Our hosts were responsive to questions and quickly responded if we had a question. We would absolutely stay here again!
reviews/7/comments: I can't say enough good things about our stay at Patrick's cabin. The views were stunning, the fireplace was cozy, and the cabin itself was super clean and comfortable. I would definitely stay here again next time in Aspen.
reviews/8/comments: Beautiful home and the outdoor space is so peaceful and magical. Great place to escape your busy life and nestle in one of the many cozy spots and read a book and drink your coffee.
reviews/9/comments:
This Chalet is so unique and cozy we didn't want to leave. The design, layout and modern appliances make it a great home base for all your mountain adventures.

The views from the back deck are well worth the price of admission.

name: Ski-In/Ski-Out Snowmass Condo w/Shared Hot Tub/Pool/Private Washer/Dryer/WiFi!
reviews/0/comments: I can not say enough great things about this property.   The service is top notch and it is central located amongst restaurants,  skiing, and shops. The shuttle service is available to take you anywhere within Snowmass Village. I left an item in the villa and phenomenal staff tool provisions to mail it to my home. I would definitely stay here again.  The views are amazing and the villa is comfortable with a wood burning fireplace.
reviews/1/comments: I cannot say enough good things about this accommodation! I stayed with a group of five and we had more than enough room. Each of the three rooms have their own bathroom, and plenty of hangers in the closet and dresser space. Extra pillows and blankets are also available in each bedroom. The beds were SO comfortable. A few of us were saying we regretted not looking at the mattress tags before we left (and same goes for pillows). Bathrooms with Aveda products when we stayed. Blow dryer was also available in at least one bathroom. There is a washer and dryer with detergent provided, and iron/ironing board. The daily cleaning service was so perfect- with a group of five, its not always easy to stay tidy, especially when skiing is on the agenda! The cleaning service ensured we came home to a spotless house with no dishes in the sink. When we booked this place, it was listed as our “ugly” option, but we were pleasantly surprised when we arrive. The condo is beautiful; the pictures on airBnB do not do it justice! Location is also absolutely amazing. It is at the midpoint of the Elk Gondola which is the main chair lift on Snowmass. For the avid skiers and snowboarders, it is extremely easy access to and from the condo. It is also easy access for those who are able to go on green runs. Two people in our group were beginners and had no issue walking down Wood road for a quick 3 minute walk to get to Snowmass village and their ski school. The pool and hot tub are not the best in the village, but were more than sufficient and a welcome stop after a long day on the slopes. There are also indoor lockers available for each unit by the pool which had room for all of our gear and kept our boots warm overnight. Possibly the best part (besides the location and views) was the fireplace. There is wood provided in the garage (accessed on ground level of elevator) and provided many cozy evenings during our stay. Last but not least, I should mention our host Jason was excellent! He made sure to check in via text on day one, mid way through, and at the end. He was so friendly and a reflection of what we experienced every day on the slopes in Aspen. I highly recommend this Condo and hope we can one day come back. Thank you, Jason!
reviews/2/comments: Wonderful value in the Roaring Fork Valley. The space felt like home and was incredibly roomy. I loved the layout. The kitchen had plenty of dishes and cookware. The hot tub was wonderful. Location was unbeatable!

name: One Snowmass East 506
Chateau Roaring Fork Unit 14
reviews/0/comments: Great place and host! Location was phenomenal and the gym was pretty good too. Would definitely stay there again.
reviews/1/comments: We love Aspen and had a nice stay at Claire's place.
reviews/2/comments: This place was perfect for the 8 of us. Thanks for a great experience.

name: Old Hundred Unit 107
reviews/0/comments: Great location 2 mins walk from town, good for group of 6 — the home is well-equipped and has great windows and high ceilings.  Be aware that all of the mattresses except for the downstairs Master (full King) are twin-sized, with two side-by-side in the two larger bedrooms.  Pricey for the quality of the finishes of the unit (photos don’t quite show the detail), but that is Aspen.  Also, the management company was thorough / communicative and provided for free rides to and from the airport.
reviews/1/comments: This is a ramshackle style student housing vibe. Kitchen, living areas and bathrooms are absolutely TINY with way too much furniture shoved in which makes it hard to walk through and access. Kitchen is not really a kitchen more of a very narrow walkway. The place is pretty run down with lots of holes and dodgy patch jobs in walls. Baths are damaged and don’t work, bathroom doors covered in makeup. Some rooms do not even have overhead lights and rely on one tiny beaten up bedside lamp to light a whole room. No blinds in one bedroom looking straight onto car park and generally all bedrooms very exposed to walkway and not private at all. Very cheap furniture throughout which would be fine but it doesn’t really fit the place and the photos are very misleading. Especially fireplace which didn’t work and when maintenance guy came to fix and turned on it had a shocking smell of burning rubber so we could never use it.
reviews/2/comments: Really nice place and the pictures are representative of the unit. Easy check in, even after hours. We will look to stay here again when we return. Thanks again!
reviews/3/comments: As advertised, in an excellent location.
reviews/4/comments: Great location, walking distance to everything downtown. The place was clean with lots of kitchen amenities. Plenty of room for large groups. There are lots of steps to be navigated so I wouldn’t recommend it if you have difficulty in going up and down stairs.
reviews/5/comments: Really enjoyed the personal touches like fresh linens and coffee/tea. This was an amazing place and I would definitely rent again! Great location. We walked everywhere.
reviews/6/comments: Wonderful setup! Excellent communication and service, very well stocked kitchen and clean condo in great shape, and in a great location.

name: Mountain-view retreat with gas fireplace, high-speed WiFi, deck & fire pit
reviews/0/comments: Wonderful place to stay. We hope to return soon!
reviews/1/comments: Was a Great Stay,just not long enough.Awesome place to relax with Family and young ones will enjoy it too.
reviews/2/comments: This place is beautiful and the setting is even better. Stay here for to experience the best of the western slope.
reviews/3/comments: The house was perfect for a family reunion.
reviews/4/comments:
This home is really very beautiful and clean. It had everything you need and more. Ready to entertain quite a number of guests. Bedrooms are big and have private bathrooms. House feels pleasant and beds are very comfortable. Our guests loved the house. We stayed there for our daughter’s wedding which was in Aspen.

We loved how the house was surrounded by nature and it has its own creek. There were deers walking around with their little once. So sweet!

Patio all around the house with nice jacuzzi. Nature nature surrounds you. Beautiful home! Strongly recommend!

Ps. If you are coming in the summer when it’s hot note that only master bedroom has air conditioning.
Lower level usually don’t need air conditioning. We had one day temperatures in 90’s and on that day first floor was on a warmer side. Although in the evening it’s gets much better bc of of many trees that are around the house.

Thank you!
reviews/5/comments: We had a wonderful and relaxing stay. The house and location are beautiful. It is a secluded location (with little to no cell service). We had an issue with the hot water heater while we were there and the host took care of it immediately. We would definitely recommend this place.
reviews/6/comments: Simply amazing - location was to die for - every detail in this house was perfect.  In fact they undersell it on the site - place came with a traeger and had a ton of wildlife around.  The kids loved it and we plan to be back.  If you are thinking about whether to stay here - do it - you will not be sorry.
reviews/7/comments: awesome place to host our team retreat this year. the hosts were very easy to work with and the property is really nice. hot tub was great and so was the river! nice to be far away from everything yet close enough to aspen for ski trips and fun
reviews/8/comments: Excellent house. Vacasa has obviously spent a lot of time and money making this place great. Highly recommend.
reviews/9/comments: great place to hold 10ppl group. highly recommended

reviews/1/comments: Clean, comfortable, and cozy with plenty of space. Our stay was wonderful and we plan on going back.

Comfortable home! Would recommend.
Quality mattress and pillows.

Felt very at home and it was the perfect place to stay during such a fun weekend at the jazz aspen festival. The staff here at Chamonix were beyond amazing and so kind.
