reviews/7/comments: The unit was very nice. Definitely feels like a mountain resort.  Large space with some private outdoor space as well.

name: Chateau Roaring Fork Unit 22
reviews/0/comments: An absolutely perfect location.  It accommodated 3 couples and our single friend ( so 7 of us ) excellently.  It’s spotless with a great fireplace in the living room and master bedroom.  You literally can walk everywhere in downtown Aspen - the Silver Queen lift is 5 minutes max if your strolling casually.   We all agreed we stay there again.  Thank you Claire !
reviews/1/comments: Chateau Roaring Fork was perfect for our 7 person group, staying in mid September. Beds were comfortable, kitchen was well-supplied with utensils, dishes, pans, etc. Housekeeping was offered daily. Location is four blocks from mountain base services and three blocks from City Market for groceries. Very walkable. Also unexpectedly quiet during our stay - we slept with windows open. Lack of AC  was not an issue at all in mid Sept.
reviews/2/comments: Great place.  We will be back next year!
reviews/3/comments: Fun place to stay. Short walk to ski lifts and down town.  Fire place and nice outdoor pool and spas were an excellent addition.

name: Fasching Haus Unit 6
reviews/0/comments: Nice place near lifts, recently remodeled kitchen & living area. Very easy to downtown Aspen. Smaller than anticipated and tight entrance / stairway. Not recommended for anyone with ADA needs and/or avoiding stairs. The pool & hottub were both out of service when we visited (without warning), so check before booking.

name: Durant Condominiums Unit C6
reviews/0/comments: Great location, clean, and exactly as advertised. Definitely would recommend this condo!
reviews/1/comments: Amazing location . Beautiful condo
reviews/2/comments:
The pictures don’t do justice!!
This place is amazing.
We can’t wait to come back again.
reviews/3/comments: Ok
reviews/4/comments: Amazing space, very close to the mountain, amenities are great and we can’t wait to come back again!

name: Aspen Highlands CO | Ritz Carlton Residence Club | 3 Bedroom Premier
Ritz Carlton Club 8/27 - 9/10/22. Aspen Highlands.
Silverglo Condominiums Unit 209
Woodrun Place ~ Ski-In/Ski-Out ~ 4 Bedroom Condo
Comfortable Snowmass Village Home with Hot Tub
reviews/0/comments: Such a cute home in the mountains!! Our host was wonderful and provided great suggestions and communication throughout our stay. I can’t wait to come back and stay at this home. Beautiful!!

name: One Snowmass East 303
Ski-in/out Snowmass condo with pool, hot tub, gym, WiFi & washer/dryer
reviews/0/comments: Incredible staff! The place was just as advertised and clean. Would definitely come back and recommend to others
reviews/1/comments: We’ve stayed at a few different spots in snowmass but this one has got to be our favorite! The views, the spacious rooms, the location. We loved it!
reviews/2/comments: This condo is an amazing place to stay. It was spotless. The view is beautiful and the location can’t be beaten. We walked to restaurants and the gondola. Property is very spacious, comfortable, and well stocked. Beds are comfortable and so were the couches. Bathrooms were sparkling clean and the showers had the perfect water pressure.
reviews/3/comments: This was an outstanding condo. the decor and amenities were top notch. this is a true ski-in/ski-out location.
reviews/4/comments: We will 100% be looking to rent this condo every time we are back in Snowmass.  Very comfortable and convenient.
reviews/5/comments:
This place is very good. The front-desk is kind and helpful. The unit is equipped with high-quality appliances. Dishes, kettles, coffee makers, cooking pots, washer, dryer etc, they got everything we needed. Check-in and -out were very smooth. The view of the unit we stayed is very good and relaxing. Highly recommend this place.

After a bad experience in Vacasa's Telluride property, their property in Snowmass won us back.
reviews/6/comments: nicely decorated and kept condo
reviews/7/comments: Such a beautiful spot! Would definitely come back!
reviews/8/comments: Great place to stay in snowmass. The staff was amazing.
reviews/9/comments:
We booked another condo, but were notified 48 hours before check-in that it was not available and that we can be re-placed into this one. This condo was not comparable to what we had originally booked (newly renovated/modern), but we felt like we didn't have a choice, so we gave it a shot.

PROS:
* Great location for Snowmass Elk Camp Gondola (hiking/biking/skiing)
* Master bed was pretty good.
* Kitchen for meal prep
* Steam shower in master
* Washer/Dryer
* Pool/hot tub/very basic gym

CONS:
* Guest bed caved in the middle.
* ALL bedding needs to be cleaned & updated/replaced.
* The kitchen had dull unusable knives
* Marginal/limited pots/pans need to be updated/replaced
* Only coffee for one day to get you started (i.e. no salt/pepper/cooking oil/bottled water/etc.)
* Noise on level above us was loud the last couple nights

It was not what we were planning on, but all in all, we had a good stay and we made the most of it. If they made the suggested changes, we would consider staying again in the near future.

name: Delightful home with mountain views, fireplaces, and private hot tub & sauna
reviews/0/comments: Great house for a large group. We had 3 couples and 3 kids in our group. There was another pull out couch  that could of accommodated another couple that we did not know about. The house exceeded our expectations. Clean, comfortable, beautifully decorated and stocked with needed supplies . You must have a car to go skiing. Shuttle is far away. But you can comfortably park for free at the Two Creeks lift and ski Snowmass. Otherwise public parking is affordable at Snowmass village $30 a day, Buttermilk is free parking and Aspen depends where you park. We enjoyed our home away from home and will be back.
reviews/1/comments: The house was absolutely amazing.  We had an incredible trip and the house lived up to all of it - great family room for both kids and adults, ton of sleeping capacity, huge rooms, fully stocked (towels, robes for hot tub, great kitchenware, etc) across the board, great amenities. The views are nothing short of amazing. Location is very good. 7 min drive to Snowmass. It’s a bit of a walk to the bus stop (15 mins) but a beautiful walk. In short, we loved the house and would come back in a heartbeat.
reviews/2/comments: Great pad with tons of space and lots of amenities.

name: Endless views Mountain Modern w private hot tub
Mountain Sanctuary
reviews/0/comments: My friends and I had a great stay! Beautiful  and unique property in a great location! Whenever I needed help, communication was thorough and quick. Thanks so much for sharing your beautiful home
reviews/1/comments: Lovely home, and a lovely owner/management team.  We found ourselves sufficiently reset after a week at this property.  Situated off Buttermilk, just close enough to downtown to make supply missions and dinners not a chore, and just far enough that we felt isolated from that energy when we wanted it.  We’d come back in another season and enjoy it all over again.
reviews/2/comments: Wonderful home in an absolutely beautiful and convenient location! Host was super responsive and proactive. Would definitely stay here again!
reviews/3/comments: It’s been a wonderful time here. So much expansion and areas to witness Mother Nature at her finest…
reviews/4/comments: We stayed for 10 days this summer and had a wonderful time. The location is easy for getting into Aspen or Snowmass. The house is wonderful for entertaining especially outdoors where you have multiple deck options.
reviews/5/comments: Julian and Molly’s home is the perfect Aspen escape. Located near buttermilk you are perfectly hidden yet just 10 minutes from town. The house is spacious, filled with sun and very comfortable. Highly recommend.
reviews/6/comments: Great outdoor spaces ie patios great open space in living room and dining room great workout space
reviews/7/comments: Great, family home with everything you need!  Beautiful views and just a few minutes away from downtown Aspen!
reviews/8/comments: We stayed for two weeks, bringing together 6 of us in a family reunion.  We loved it.  The outside deck spaces are very beautiful, amazing countryside and wildlife, and the inside of the house is really substantial.  The kitchen dining room area is great and I loved the piano in the big basement cinema games area !  Being ten minutes up a hill away from the town centre is also great, a bit cooler, a peaceful place to come back to.  Our host Julian is exceptionally kind and considerate.  We would strongly recommend this place to anyone.
reviews/9/comments: Great mountain home with lots of space for entertaining or just relaxing with books or games.  Great outdoor deck space and easily accessible location.  Owners are terrific hosts.

name: BEST: VIEWS, LOCATION, PRICE.3BR 3 BA
reviews/0/comments: This place has a great layout.  The patio is just as restful as it looks in photos and the kitchen is well stocked.  Easy to access the trails and walk around town.  Lovely place, easy check in  / check out.  Finally, the view from the master bedroom is simply stunning!
reviews/1/comments:
By far the best US Airbnb we have rented. Reasons (1) Location. It is near the main town but still just far enough to be outside the touristy area (2) Location. Within walking distance to children’s park, John Denver Sanctuary, and Rio Grande path (3) Location. Across from several hiking trails, including Smugglers and (4) Location. Best views of sunsets over the mountains from the living and master bedroom.
Also, Lynne is easy to communicate with, the condo space is efficiently utilized, the kitchen is well stocked, and the place is clean and well lit.
reviews/1/response:
Raj,
I’m glad everything worked out for you. Thank you for the wonderful review - and your suggestions are very well taken - . I totally agree! We are always looking to upgrade here and there, just takes a little time.
Warm regards to you and your family, Lynne
reviews/2/comments: Our stay in this townhome was wonderful. The views pictured in the listing are exactly as they appear the the pictures (actually even better). We were right on the trails heading to town or along the river - and it’s only a 5-minute walk to the grocery store or the John Denver sanctuary. We highly recommend!
reviews/3/comments: We had a great stay at Lynne’s property. The views are amazing and it’s just a short walk into downtown. We also enjoyed taking the bus, which had a stop right out front and is free. The house was well stocked and it was easy to be in touch if we needed anything during our stay.
reviews/4/comments: Beautiful townhome.  Loved the patio with beautiful flowers, mountains, chipmunks and deer!  Kitchen was well equipped and always love when staples such as coffee, sugar, condiments, spices, laundry detergent, etc are already there.  Great location!  Right down the street from grocery and main street with lots of shops and restaurants.  Also walk path along the river just out the back.  Only surprise was there was AC in the master only.  Luckily at night it was cold enough to be pleasant in the other bedrooms and main living area with the door and windows open.
reviews/5/comments: Lots of charm and stunning views at this 3/3 townhouse. Beautiful patio. Excellent communication. Great location - perfect hub to see Aspen! Literally on multiple hiking trails. Would definitely recommend and come back
reviews/6/comments: Lynne's place was absolutely perfect for our group stay in Aspen. All three bedrooms have ensuites/bathrooms and there is plenty of space in the living room and kitchen for nice breakfast/dinners. The view from the master bedroom and the living space is amazing! Fireplaces were cosy and warm, bedrooms comfortable and kitchen was well-stocked. The walk into town is about 10mins and very easy to do (even in a snowstorm at night). Check in and out with Emily was easy and friendly. I would highly recommend staying here to family and friends, thanks for having us!
reviews/7/comments: Our stay here was fantastic. The house is cosy, well decorated, and has an amazing view of the mountain. The kitchen had everything we needed and the beds were very comfortable. It's a 9 min walk from downtown which is really helpful because there are not many taxes or ubers in aspen. We will definitely return the next time we're in town.
reviews/8/comments: The condo was fantastic - the views are incredible and the location is proximate to town. Nice and clean and plenty of space. Appreciate the hospitality with a greeting at check-in. Would 100% stay here again.
reviews/9/comments: This condo is stunning! Amazing views of Aspen mountain that cannot be beat! Walking distance from downtown and on roads that were plowed constantly. We highly recommend staying here!
reviews/9/response:
Thanks Morgan, I'm glad it all worked out for you and that you had a nice visit.
Yes please come again!

name: Aspen Townhouse Gem
reviews/0/comments: The care that the owners take is very obvious. Very clean and great service.
reviews/1/comments: Echoing other reviewers. Perfect location, in easy walking distance to everything you would care to walk to in Aspen proper. Great communication too from the hosts. Pretty much instant response time and beyond helpful. Great trip.
reviews/2/comments: Great place, amazing location right down town. Will be back!
reviews/3/comments: My adult sons and I were just there for Christmas week and I’m not even sure where to start with this review because everything was so perfect. I guess the first thing people want to know about is the place itself, which if possible is even better than the photos show. The photos are absolutely accurate but don’t even really capture how chic and cozy it is.  And having never been to Aspen before, I didn’t realize just how perfect the location is. You can walk a few blocks to the main mountain base or jump on the bus to Highlands literally just outside the door. And every downtown restaurant and bar and shop are within a ten minute or less walk. Beyond that, the place is immaculate, the beds were very comfortable and the kitchen is well stocked. But honestly the very best part was the hosts, who could not have been more generous or easier to deal with - we had some real trouble getting out due to snow storms and they were incredibly helpful and flexible. I’ve stayed in a lot of places over the years but can’t say I’ve ever encountered such great hosts. They really do make you feel at home and I can’t recommend it more highly!
reviews/4/comments: Great place, perfect location, amazing Host! Love it, thank you!
reviews/5/comments: Excellent location, great layout. Walkable to everything including shops, restaurants and hiking. Very attentive host.
reviews/6/comments: Annie’s place is perfect in every way—cozy, comfortable and well-located! We definitely want to return!
reviews/7/comments: This townhouse truly is a gem! We are a family of 6 adults and we all loved this place. The 2 sofas are easy to set up and there are plenty of linens and pillows for them. The kitchen was fully stocked and the living room was comfortable for all of us. The location is easy access to town, Lift 1 and all busses to other mountains. Annie and Piper were excellent with communication. We really loved our stay here and would like to return next year.
reviews/8/comments: You gotta stay here when you come to town
reviews/9/comments: This is a great place to stay in Aspen, very well equipped and clean, excellent location also

name: Snowmass Ski-In/Ski-Out Villa with WiFi, Washer/Dryer, Shared Pool, & Hot Tub!
reviews/0/comments: Such a beautiful place to stay. Amazing views, great amenities & absolutely peaceful setting.
reviews/1/comments: Great place! Bigger than expected and a really convenient location.
reviews/2/comments: Definitely getting your steps in here. Shower has a steamer, very nice. Bed is comfy, frame is squeaky.
reviews/3/comments: Great place in snowmass village. They have drop facility within snowmass village. Nice interiors and homely place. As others said you need to walk 2 stairs up after getting down the lift which is bit annoying after long day.
reviews/4/comments: Great stylish place on the mountain! SO COZY!
reviews/5/comments: Nice location, be aware there are 3 flights of stairs to unit after getting off the elevator.
reviews/6/comments: Great views and excellent bathrooms. Daily maid service in a condo is both unusual and very nice.

name: Fantastic Aspen Gem Near Downtown w/ Free WiFi, Large Deck & Skiing Nearby!
reviews/0/comments: My least favorite & most impersonal airbnb experience to date. Businesses taking over for Airbnb host's defeats the entire purpose of this app and what it was founded on. A wonderful home without a soul. For the price paid we were in communication with what felt like random strangers over email that were completely disconnected from the actual home, expect ridiculous added fees for leaving an item behind, reached back while still in the area for a possible easy pick-up and the remote response was to have you pay a fee to even begin looking for the item first, then add shipping costs to it.. This business will take any opportunity to charge you more.
reviews/0/response: Ricardo, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review following your stay.  We are sorry to hear that you did not feel that the customer service you received was as personable as it could have been.  Please know that our agents are available at all times to assist our guests via phone or through chat in their Airbnb Dashboard.  All of our fees, rent and taxes are disclosed at the time of booking. As mentioned in the Rental Agreement there is a Lost and Found fee that will be charged should the guests leave an item behind. We appreciate your feedback and we hope to have an opportunity in the future to better impress you.
reviews/1/comments: We would not recommend this property to anyone. We just left there on August 4, 2022 and had multiple problems of significance. First the property has no air-conditioning and the windows would not open to provide ventilation. The hot water heater failed to work and also we had roof leaks during three nights of our seven day stay because of the rain coming in which caused the floor to get wet that created high humidity because of pour ventilation. There is a hot tub in the house but it has not worked for sometime with standing water inside it that is so old that create mold problem and we had to block off that part of the house. I could go on but this is definitely not something that should be represented by Airbnb to anyone to fall into the same situation that we did.
reviews/1/response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, Inna. We apologize for the experience you had with us during your stay. We strive for all guests to have a great stay from booking to check-out. We strongly encourage guests to review the listing and amenities to ensure that the home has everything they are searching for. This home does not have AC and is not advertised as having it. We are sorry for the roof and hot water not functioning properly. Our local staff was quickly dispatched to review these issues and while they have been repaired following your stay, we hope that the compensation you received helped relieve some of the stress that came along with the situation. We hope to have an opportunity to better serve and impress you in the future.
reviews/2/comments: Good location in Aspen that needs some serious updating. This is a very dark house (inside), and many of the shutters won't stay open. I'm guessing we were the first guests of the season, as the outside balcony and chairs were very dirty. In general, this place is not very well maintained, and needs massive updating to be anything approaching a luxury property. On the positive side, it is very close to town, and in a private, quiet location. The master bedroom bed was very comfortable, but I heard complaints from others about the smaller beds (4 twins, 2 full).
reviews/3/comments: Spa was nonfunctional and gross, stains on the carpet‘s.. needs a serious deep clean. Doors would not lock
reviews/3/response: Hi, Ruth! We would like to sincerely apologize for the issues that prevented you from fully enjoying your visit - as we never wish for our guests to experience anything less than an exceptional vacation. Upon receiving your review, we followed up with our local manager for feedback on your concerns. They reported that the home has undergone a deep cleaning and confirmed they will be checking all doors and locks to ensure everything is in working order. Additionally, we are very sorry for any confusion or disappointment regarding the spa, as this is not an offered amenity at this property. Please know we greatly appreciate your feedback and will work diligently with our local team to ensure our standards are being met entirely. We hope for the opportunity to host you for a wonderful stay in the future.
reviews/4/comments: Great location right in Aspen, sleeps quite a few, very affordable.
reviews/5/comments: Great place
reviews/6/comments: Perfect house for our ski trip! Great location 5 minutes from town
reviews/7/comments:
Nice location right outside of Aspen. It's about a 5 minute drive to downtown.

This is a classic older mountain house that can hold a couple of families or a larger group. The social area is on the 2nd floor, with 3 extra bedrooms on the ground floor. It has a 2 car garage.

The property could use a little maintenance - it's OK to have that "70s vibe mountain house" that isn't even trying to be up to date, but it could be cleaner and more taken care of. I would probably look around for other options if you can, but it's also a decent stay if inventory in Aspen is low.

name: One Snowmass West 603
reviews/0/comments:
Beautiful place!!
So amazing~~
reviews/0/response: Thank YOU Sunghye for staying with us! We so appreciate you choosing East West Hospitality & hope to have an opportunity to host you again soon.

name: AC ~Woodrun Place~Ski-In/Ski-Out~4 Bedroom
reviews/0/comments: Beautiful place to stay, everything was perfect! and Morgan was awesome with responding quickly!
reviews/1/comments:
Beautiful 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom condo.Meticulous clean. Gourmet kitchen with supplies and dishes.
Very close to Snowmass Village restaurants and ski lifts.

name: ASPEN LUX CONDO! STEPS FROM GONDOLA. 2 FLRS-SLPS 5
reviews/0/comments: MJ was a great host and we really enjoyed her spot in Aspen! Would stay again/recommend!
reviews/1/comments: Our stay at the house was great. It was clean and well furnished, MJ was very speedy and helpful in her communication, and it was right by the slopes!
reviews/2/comments: This location is within walking distance to almost everything. Skiing and lifts were a short walk as well as shopping and restaurants. The condominium was clean and updated with plenty of room. MJ is an outstanding host with lots of communication and helpful suggestions.
reviews/2/response: We loved having you and hope you come back again!! New Years in Aspen is Amazing and I'm glad you guys were there - My only regret is I didn not get to meet you guys!!  Happy healthy NY!  Til the next time!! :)
reviews/3/comments: Great location, nicely equipped kitchen, living area is comfortable with great views. Master bedroom and bath are spacious with nice seating area to work or read. Second bedroom works great for kids.
reviews/4/comments: MJ’s place was perfect for our family of four. The location was great, super close to Ajax and the shuttle that serves the other mountains. MJ even called a couple days before our arrival to give us some tips that were tailored for our family with young kids. Midway through our trip she checked in to make sure we were doing ok! Overall we had an awesome time and the place was an integral part of keeping us happy! Thanks MJ!
reviews/4/response: I am so glad you had a good time- It was a pleasure getting to know you over the phone!! I hope your kids enjoyed the trip!  I still need to hear how the last brunch place was!?  Come visit again!!  MJ
reviews/5/comments: Quick walk to downtown. Nice place overall
reviews/6/comments: Great place and location. Couldn’t be closer to Ajax gondola. Nice to be in town, location very quiet.
reviews/7/comments: Easy checkin/checkout. Great location and clean!
reviews/8/comments: Great location, and MJ was very responsive to all questions.
reviews/9/comments: MJ is an excellent host and the location is prime, within walking distance to the slopes, entertainment and grocery store.

name: Dolomite Villas Unit 4
reviews/0/comments: Great place! Awesome location.
reviews/1/comments: This is a great space! Walking distance from everything in Aspen, tons of common space, a full attached bath for all rooms, and really well equipped for anything you need.
reviews/2/comments: This is the perfect location. Walk to town in 5 minutes, to life in 5 minutes. It was perfect!

name: OntheRiver, HotTub, MovieRm, Lawn Games
reviews/0/comments: An amazing house in a great location!
reviews/1/comments: Our family enjoyed the Glenwood home so much. Kendra was a gracious and amazing host. The views are amazing and it’s an awesome place to drop a line for fishing in the Roaring Rapids River. Beds were were perfect as well, couldn’t ask for anything else. It was the perfect getaway! 10/10
reviews/2/comments:
You know the pictures that drew your interest in this home? Well they are completely accurate! The view is peacefully stunning; the yard spacious and fun for games and running your toes through the soft grass; the evening sun is hot for happy hour on the porch but moving over to the Adirondack chairs in the shady yard makes for comfortable fun and laughter. Steps from the porch lead to the rocky river bank where our son-in-law enjoyed easy access to fly fishing. We enjoyed having our windows open in the upstairs bedroom (view of the river) for night sounds from the river and birds in the early morning - Canada geese, hummingbirds, Western robin, yellow warblers, and watching the osprey soar at eye level was a treat. One morning we enjoyed watching a black bear lumber along the bank across the river, climb a tree and settle in for an hour nap on one of the limbs before getting on his way again.
Logistically, the house was spotless, the beds comfortable, and the kitchen is perfectly stocked with just the right cooking equipment and storage containers for those who prefer to eat at home every night (we do). And if you are a coffee lover, there is any option of brewing available as well as a coffee grinder.
Kendall extends gracious hospitality - promptly responding to inquiries and providing plenty of suggestions / guidance for things to do in the area.
reviews/3/comments: If I could leave more stars, I would. Do not hesitate to book this home. This house is beautiful and was more than enough room to accommodate our family. The amenities were wonderful, they had a net up for badminton, horse shoes, a yard big enough to play soccer or football. It’s right on the river and it was a joy to sit outside in the morning with a cup of coffee or sit outside at night with a glass of wine. Kendall was responsive and helpful in every way. The house itself was clean and spacious, the rooms were 5 star hotel quality. The media room was fun to watch a good movie in, the surround sound was great. I can’t say enough good things about my stay this past week. Consider yourself lucky if you’ve booked this home! I’m excited for you!! You will love it!!
reviews/4/comments: Excellent vacation spot right on the river. Everythign was in working order. The house was clean and spacious. The hottub was very nice after a long day of hiking. Kendall was kind enough to provide us with bikes and suggestions for restaurants in the area. Not too far from Aspen. Wholefoods is about a 15 min drive. Will definitely book again if I am in the area.
reviews/5/comments: Kendall’s home was the perfect getaway for our family vacation. The bright, airy spaces welcomed us immediately, and we felt right at home from the start. The river access off the back patio made for great fishing, the quick jog to the Rio Grande Trail  made exercise a part of our daily routine, and the clean hot tub or shaded hammock were welcome retreats after a day spent outdoors. We would recommend to anyone looking for a peaceful getaway close to everything.
reviews/6/comments:
Aspenwood house is one of the best homes we have ever rented. Loved the outdoor deck which has beautiful views of the Roaring Fork River and turned out to be a great place for bird watching. The partially shaded deck had lots of seating, an outdoor dining table. and a gas fire pit table, which was fun to sit around in the evenings. Just off the deck is a hot tub and a fire pit, both with views of the river.

Lots of nice touches in the home, including robes, snacks for the kids, and coffee and tea facilities, including a kettle and Keurig single serve coffee maker in the master bedroom. All the rooms had nice touches, and we so wanted to try out the home theater but ran out of time.

Kendall is a great and attentive host who offered lots of helpful suggestions on things to do in the area. She always responded within minutes, and even arranged a backup contact person when she had another commitment in case we couldn't reach her.

A great vacation rental for a family.
reviews/7/comments: Literally the BEST vacation rental host I’ve ever had the pleasure to interact with. The communication, recommendations and flexibility were unmatched. The house was perfect! So many amazing surprises - tons of bikes, complementary snacks and coffee, heated floors, steam shower. Views, amazing deck, gorgeous landscaping. Just top notch in every way. A little pricey but worth it. The only less than ideal part about our trip was the weather ha!
reviews/7/response: Wow, thank YOU so much for this review! We'll promise to deliver the sunshine Memorial Day wknd 2023 ;-)
reviews/8/comments: wonderful location and property. feels very luxurious. we had wonderful stay. will be back.
reviews/9/comments:
The house is awesome!

Even better than the pictures.

There’s plenty of room for a large group, beds are confortable, the place is very clean, the kitchen is very well equipped and there is a nice hot tub outside (perfect for winter days).

Would love to stay there again.

name: Snowmass Home w/Shared Hot Tub/Pool/Ski-In/Ski-Out Access/Free WiFi/Private W/D!
reviews/0/comments:
Beautiful top floor condo with ski in ski out access to the Elk Camp Gondola and Village Express. The friendly full service building staff helped us carry our luggage up and down and stored it in their office for our afternoon departure. They have a courtesy van service for taking you around Snowmass and to the airport that always responded quickly to our calls. Great all around experience.

Only note is the kitchen wasn’t stocked with staples like salt and pepper and a sponge, so make sure to pick those up if you go grocery shopping before arrival.
reviews/0/response: Sam, we are delighted to hear that you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay including our service. To assist in maintaining safety and cleanliness, we do not stock pantry items and other perishables in the home. We provide a starter supply of essential home items for convenience upon arrival, as outlined in our check-in details. Guests are encouraged to review this information and to plan accordingly for outside needs. We look forward to welcoming you back during your next stay in the area!
reviews/1/comments: Beautiful condo in an amazing location in Snowmass. Perfect for families or anyone interested in easy access to the mountain and village.
reviews/2/comments: Stay was great. Clean, spacious and just what we wanted. Only issue is the stairs. The listing states there is an elevator (which there is) but once out of the elevator you had an additional 4 flights of stairs. Hard with bags, ski gear etc.  some of the handrails were not secure on the stairs also. Good place to ski In and out of. Thanks again!!
reviews/3/comments: This home is more than we expected, beautiful views. Everything you need and much more. Very close to the sky slopes, and restaurants we definitely recommend this place and we hope to come back soon.
reviews/4/comments: Great stay in Snowmass! The condo was just as described. We had everything we needed. Clean and comfortable. We loved having a washer and dryer when traveling with small children. The grocery store is a very quick drive down the hill. If you don’t mind a few hills you can walk to shops and restaurants. Nothing but positive things to say about the apartment itself... I was a bit confused that you take an elevator up and then have to walk up  quite a bit of stars. So if you have mobility issues this might not be your place. The hot tub and pool were the cherry on top, very nice!
reviews/5/comments: Nice spot
reviews/6/comments: Leah and Jason are very good at checking in and communicating with you. Fantastic location and property! Overlooks the gondola and ski trails and is close to the base camp. Huge refrigerator and nice deck off of the master bedroom. Loved having the grill available for cooking!  On site maintenance and daily maid service is great. Biggest hot tub I’ve ever seen and a great pool area are on the premises. There is plenty of information about activities in the office where you check in. The people who run the office are friendly and helpful too.
reviews/7/comments: Excellent space with incredible views and very comfortable home. Great value and coordination/communication by the hosts. 3 spacious bathrooms as well. Sparkling clean with all the necessities. Hoping to come back for a winter ski (went for a spring wedding).
reviews/8/comments:
Wonderful ski in/ski out condo at Snow Mass. Very responsive hosts answered all questions promptly. Location provides rides throughout the area free of charge. Be sure to ask for the elevator that doesn't require as many steps to climb with your luggage.

Beautiful location and wonderful views of gondola and mountain out your windows!
reviews/9/comments:
Great location
Older unit could use some new decor
Jason and Leah very helpful and attentive.

name: Village Walk 59
reviews/0/comments: Excellent
reviews/1/comments: Beautiful, comfortable and great location!  Great for families.
reviews/2/comments: This was a beautiful home and met all of our expectations. I will definitely use Luxury Retreats again.
reviews/3/comments: Incredible House ... Incredible Location ... Provided for a perfect family vacation!!!
reviews/4/comments: Loved the place we stayed (Village Walk 59). It was perfect for our intentions, as we had no real agenda for the time we were in Beaver Creek. We had little interest in going out for meals, so the spacious kitchen was what we hoped for. The location, right on the creek, was nothing short of stunning. The family areas were large and spacious (dining and living) and allowed for plenty of interaction. Really enjoyed the fact that we could use the amenities of the health club in the Hyatt, about half a mile walk away. The Beaver Creek village experience was remarkable, especially on Memorial Day weekend when a festival occurred, bringing the sleepy village to life. All in all, a great experience.
reviews/5/comments: Wonderful experience.

name: Innsbruck Aspen 2 Bedroom Suite 01
West End Jewel- Steps to ski shuttle(486072)
reviews/0/comments: Amazing location and space was perfect for our family. We will definitely come back

name: Large 5BR Snowmass Village Get Away with Great Fam
reviews/0/comments: Enjoyed this house, plenty of room for our family
reviews/1/comments: Awesome place and super close to Snowmass.
reviews/2/comments: Beautiful home with plenty of bedrooms!
reviews/3/comments: The house was perfect for our group’s ski trip, great location and the house had every amenity to make it an easy and memorable trip!
reviews/4/comments:
Beautiful home
Well managed
We had a great time
reviews/5/comments: Great holiday weekend trip!  Communication with manager well done and amenities galore!  Great for families that want to be together but also have privacy.  We will be back.
reviews/6/comments: This rental was amazing and is literally catered to hosting events. The views were impeccable, especially seeing the scenery with snow. If you want to cook, the kitchen had all the kitchen supplies that you would need, and I loved that everyone could be a group but still have their own separate spaces. I would definitely stay here again, when I come back with a large group in Aspen.
reviews/7/comments: They can expect all the amenities of home. It is a great place.
reviews/8/comments: Incredible stay,  just a wonderful mountain ski chateau with a kind and responsive host. It had everything we needed and more.
reviews/9/comments: A great place to stay with a warm cozy feeling

name: Snowmass Ski-In/Ski-Out Condo w/Shared Pool/Hot Tub/Private Washer/Dryer/WiFi!
reviews/0/comments: Beautiful location! Great location to check out the leaf changes. Set up of place was great and lots of space for everyone.
reviews/1/comments: Really nice unit with spacious bedrooms,  modern appliances and great views. In addition, unit comes with convenient parking and useful services such as the complimentary shuttle to the village. Would absolutely come back and stay again.
reviews/2/comments: What a great location and home. Very comfortable for multiple families and we couldn't have asked for a better stay!
reviews/3/comments: Fabulous home. Couldn’t have asked for a better experience. Thanks for making our stay such a great one!
reviews/4/comments: Great rental! Accommodated everyone well. bedrooms were spacious and kitchen had everything we needed!
reviews/5/comments: Great place ... organized, easy and close to everything. We'll stay again.
reviews/6/comments: Great place to stay...ample room for a large family to lounge around anywhere.  Highly recommend!
reviews/7/comments: The view and the location are excellent. This is a very nice ski in/out location. We would stay here again. The condo exceeded out expectations.
reviews/8/comments: Great views, tastefully decorated condo with lots of space for everyone to spread out. Note, many of the restaurants are closed between the summer and winter seasons, but theres a great market down the hill.
reviews/9/comments: Our stay was very comfortable. Beautiful views from the unit, and the location is great too. Even though we checked in very late at night, the check in process was very easy.

name: Ski-In/Ski-Out Villa w/Shared Hot Tub & Pool/Gym/Free WiFi/Private Washer/Dryer!
reviews/0/comments: Great stay, ski in and out in Snowmass. Accurate description!
reviews/1/comments: Absolutely fantastic condo, right beneath Elk Camp Gondola. Truly ski in, ski out, with all the amenities you could want. Excellent service from Vacasa, to include a personal shuttle at your beckoned call. Would certainly stay again!
reviews/2/comments: We loved our stay and would definitely come back! The location was perfect easy access to Snowmass and made it easy to get to Aspen too. We loved it!
reviews/3/comments: Amazing ski in ski out with excellent and friendly staff. The shuttle service was fantastic and made getting around easy.
reviews/4/comments: Great condo for our group! We were 2 families with kids and loved the location and the condo! Its very nicely updated! Everything you need to get a meal ready!
reviews/5/comments: Excellent locations!  extremely clean, walked right out onto the trails. Perfect location to explore the Fall colors.
reviews/6/comments:
Great place in a great location! Comfortable beds and bedding! The unit is set up nicely for two families and kids. Short walk to the base, with lots of fun activities.
The kitchen doesn’t have oil, salt, pepper, foil, etc so plan accordingly.
The pool and hot tub are really nice and well maintained.
You can really only plan on one parking spot, which was tricky for two families.
reviews/7/comments: Great place to stay. Tucked away a bit, which I appreciated.
reviews/8/comments: Beautiful and clean condo!! Location was beautiful and convenient. There are MANY steps to get up to where the elevator was which was really problematic and frustrating as we had a handicapped person in our party. It was a hike to the condo which was also frustrating when you have to take a bunch of trips from the car with luggage. The description was misleading as it suggests that there is a pull out couch in the 3rd bedroom with bunk beds. This is not the case. Only bunks in there. Was also a bit disappointed with how minimal things were- no salt or pepper or any seasoning etc. Plenty of cookware though! Hot tub was nice, pool are was beautiful. We had a nice stay overall!
reviews/8/response: Hi, Kate & Nick. Thank you for staying with us. It is a pleasure to hear you had a nice stay overall. However, we sincerely apologize for any frustration caused by the accessibility of the condo, and we are sorry for the misunderstanding regarding the location of the sofa bed. Our listing does include a detailed description of the bed layout, and it is mentioned the sofa bed is located in the living room. We truly appreciate the feedback you have provided, and we will pass it along to the appropriate parties for review. We hope to host you for a relaxing getaway in the future.
reviews/9/comments: This was a very nice unit but it was not accessible for anyone with limitations physically as there are a lot of stairs to go up if you are carrying strollers or have elderly parents with you. The staff was lovely and very helpful during the entire stay. Loved the location as we could walk to the gondola or village but found it easier to drive with kids or older people. Easy location for hiking! Great pool as well, very clean and excellent landscaping. No A/C but fans were given and it was just fine on the lower floor in August. Overall very good experience and the staff all were the best part .
reviews/9/response: Carolyn, thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are delighted to hear you had a wonderful vacation overall! We sincerely apologize for any difficulties your party experienced with navigating the home due to the stairs. We make every effort to be transparent with our listings, including the photos and descriptions provided, to allow guests to make informed booking choices. We encourage guests to reach out prior to booking should they have any questions, as we are happy to help. We appreciate your feedback and hope to host you again soon.

name: Fasching Haus Unit 260
reviews/0/comments: Fabulous location within easy walking distance of the town. Well appointed and very courteous folks at the on-site office. Note that there is no elevator, and the unit is on the second and third floors, connected by a metal spiral staircase that requires care.
reviews/1/comments: The location can't be beat, and the house had everything you needed for a weekend getaway. However, we brought our toddler and between the steep spiral staircase and cool (but sharp-edged) furniture, I wouldn't recommend it when traveling with little ones. I'd stay there again though if it was just couples or ladies.
reviews/2/comments: Great stay for a few days! Awesome hot tub space
reviews/3/comments: Great location but has no A/C. They do not disclose this. Would not recommend for the Summer as it gets very hot.
reviews/4/comments: Great location near Aspen lifts

name: Private Butte Views, Perfect Proximity to CB & Mtn
reviews/0/comments: Beautiful property - amazing house with a killer view!  We loved the total experience.
reviews/1/comments: This is an amazing mountain cabin with a stunning panoramic view from the deck and hot tub. The kitchen is well-stocked as well as the bedrooms and bathrooms. It is spacious for a larger group with room to spread out for privacy and large dining room table to allow for everyone to eat together. It is within 2 to 3 minutes drive from downtown Crested Butte as well as 2 to 3 minutes drive to the base of the mountain making it a very convenient location. We highly recommend!
reviews/1/response: Thank you so very much for the kind and gracious review and for the info on the bath! We can't seem to find the source, we originally thought it was septic and have found water leaks and just about everything else to fix but no luck yet.
reviews/2/comments: This house was perfect for our family vacation! The views are incomparable. We didn’t want to leave! Beds and bedding were very comfortable. Kitchen was fully stocked. Hot tub was the nightly highlight. It worked great. The location is so convenient to town and the mountain. Owners were always available for questions and help.
reviews/3/comments:
Great house! Close to town, mountains & rec path.
There was 7 of us staying at the house & there was more than enough room. The beds were comfortable, kitchen was stocked and the views from the deck are amazing. We would definitely stay here again!
reviews/4/comments: Outstanding place with amazing views.
reviews/5/comments: We had a wonderful trip to CB and stay in Sherrie's beautiful home.  It is very spacious, comfortable and laid out to capture the incredible view from every room.  The deck is perfect to enjoy the beautiful landscape.  The location is ideal to town, hikes and quick trips back to drop off or pick up anything.   Sherrie was very quick in responding and helpful.  We hope to return to again!
reviews/6/comments: The house had a beautiful view from the deck and every bedroom! Also had a very nice and well-maintained hot tub, and the house was very well-stocked. The host was extremely nice and accommodating! Definitely would recommend.
reviews/7/comments: Great place, with everything you should need for a vacation home. Close enough to town and the mountain. And the view…nothing like it! BEAUTIFUL!
reviews/8/comments: This Airbnb is incredible! We are so grateful to have stayed in such a beautiful home with such incredible amenities (fire place, fully stocked kitchen, huge master bedroom). The views were amazing and the hot tub was perfect. Thank you thank you! Sherrie and Jason were also very responsive. We hope to be back again!
reviews/8/response: Thank you for your gracious review!  The best part of the house we can't take credit for...the view!
reviews/9/comments:
Beautiful home with beautiful views!
Everything you need is there! Owners very kind and respond to questions quickly with great advice. Would stay here again!

If you have pets, be mindful that the property is not entirely fenced in, so dogs can roam off property.

name: Luxury Aspen Ritz Carlton;  2 Bed / 2.5 Bath Condo
reviews/0/comments: Staying at the Ritz was fabulous! Lots of amenities and right at base of Aspen Highlands. The staff treated us great. Nice setup with the bedrooms at each end. Shuttles meant no car was needed.

name: Spacious Mountain Lodge-Style Home with Free WiFi - Nearby Ski Access
reviews/0/comments: A good location to Aspen center. Very convenient.
reviews/1/comments: Good house - right next to bus, easy transportation into town, parking is tough if you have more than 2 cars - the lot is massive but there is a '2 car max' rule (might want to update this). All supplies for cooking are provided, lots of extra blankets and sheets. Some lights didn't work, and there is no overhead lighting throughout the entire home.
reviews/1/response: Juliet, we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed this spacious mountain getaway and its location and we appreciate you letting us know how we can improve. As advertised in the listing description, there is a two-car maximum allowed. We will follow up with our maintenance team to check for any lightbulbs that need replacement, and we look forward to hosting you again!
reviews/2/comments: Was very nice!
reviews/3/comments: Quirky and fun getaway. Thank you for the hospitality!
reviews/4/comments:
Place is fine. It's large and very convenient for groups. It's very dated in the bedrooms, but it's fine for a stay. It's right on the shuttle line for Aspen mountain and that's very convenient - stop is right outside the house.
(Hidden by Airbnb) Maps struggled a bit to find the place.
reviews/5/comments: Great place and location!
reviews/6/comments: Think maybe the dishwasher was not working properly as all cooking utensils were dirty with bits of old food on them. The house size and location were great - but house was in need of a good clean.
reviews/6/response:
Thank you for your review, Darren! We're sorry to hear that the utensils were not fully cleaned. Please know that our local team is available to assist with any cleanliness issues you encounter while in the home.
They have been made aware and will check the utensils thoroughly going forward. We hope to host you again soon!
reviews/7/comments: With the shuttle it is not hard to commute to town, but would definitely recommend still getting a car. Comfortable for 5 of us.
reviews/8/comments: Perfect for families
reviews/9/comments: place was nice and quiet

name: Ski-In/Ski-Out Condo w/Views/Shared Pool/Hot Tub/Private Washer/Dryer/Free WiFi!
reviews/0/comments: Beautiful place in a great location.🍻
reviews/1/comments: Wonderful condo with every amenitie you could think of. Very clean. Leah & Jason kept us updated with check in info other info. Great hosts.

name: Clarendon Unit 2
reviews/0/comments: Great Condo. Great Location. Thanks

name: Aspen Core East Remodeled 2 Bed - Pet Friendly
reviews/0/comments: Great place in very convenient location
reviews/1/comments: Hana's place was amazing and perfectly located. Was a pleasure to stay there! We'll be back!
reviews/2/comments: walk to town.  Quiet and clean.  Very cute.
reviews/3/comments: A buddy and I stayed for 5 nights at Hana's place. It was absolutely amazing, we had the trip of a lifetime. The air bnb exceeded our expectations. It is located two blocks from downtown and has everything you would want for a ski week in aspen. Also, there is an oxygen machine that pumps pure oxygen through the house which helped with adjusting to the altitude. I don't know if there is anywhere I would rather stay in Aspen and this will be the first place I check next time I come back! Thanks for everything Hana!
reviews/4/comments: Brand new, very central 2 BR condo in Aspen. We walked everywhere and truly enjoyed our long weekend at Hana’s place! No need for a car. We will def come back!
reviews/5/comments: Better than described and expected. Recently renovated, beautifully appointed, great style, walking distance to the gondola. Immaculately clean, great beds and linens, well equipped kitchen, comfortable common space. 5 stars!
reviews/6/comments: Definitely exceeded our expectations, sparkling clean, modern, spacious, cozy, comfortable, fully equipped (more than you can imagine)... we can only say THANK YOU Hanna .. we slept so nice, everything was so close, the place was simply amazing.... we did not want to leave!!! Love when you book something on AirBnb and get equal or more than shown/offered on the page...  GRACIAS and see you soon.. we are definitely coming back!!!!

name: New Modern, Luxurious, Zen. Steps to Gondola.
reviews/0/comments: This airbnb if filled with beautiful appliances and some of the most comfortable beds I’ve ever laid in. Host was great at communication & supportive in getting us checked in. Would stay here again in a heartbeat
reviews/1/comments:
Perfect
Location in Aspen. Lovely cozy two bedroom ! Laurin is a great host who cares !
reviews/2/comments:
Given my short stay it was amazing that this beautiful apartment was just steps away from the mountain! It was such a convenient location! Most comfortable couch and bed ever! I slept really well. The place was super clean and the kitchen was fully stocked for my needs. There was even a vitamin for my smoothie.
I loved curling up with a book by the fireplace at night, and it was a really amazing surprise to have a Dyson hairdryer I could use! Mega perk in my book! I highly recommend staying here!
reviews/3/comments: This is a dream space! Elegance, amazing energy, everything is provided and the host is aumazing! I’ll be returning! 🥰👏🏻🙏🏻
reviews/4/comments: Laurin was an amazing host. She was attentive to all of our needs and went above and beyond recommending restaurants and her favorite places in Aspen. We  had stayed at her place a few years ago and always planned to come back because it was so comfortable and convenient to everything. We didn’t even need a car since it is right in the middle of town next to The little Nell and less than a 5 minute walk to Aspen mountain gondola. I highly recommend staying at here and can’t wait to come back again soon.
reviews/5/comments: This might be the beat Airbnb we have ever stayed, the aspen mountain was steps away, cafes and restaurants was also walking distance, we have to come back for a longer stay for sure. Thank you Laurin for hosting us.
reviews/6/comments: Laurin is a great attentive host - incredibly responsive!  You cannot have a better location in Aspen. Can’t wait to come back!
reviews/7/comments: Laurin is an amazing host, we had great communication before and during our trip. The apartment is sparkling clean, very comfortable beds and the best is the warm floor in the bathrooms... The place is fully equipped and we felt like home! ... Highly recommended.
reviews/8/comments:
Thanks Laurin for a great stay!
Loved your place and location!
reviews/9/comments: Amazing location and stylish decor!  Laurin’s a great host.  You won’t be disappointed.

name: Updated Townhome in Downtown Aspen w/Fireplaces, Patio - Walk to Ski Resort!
reviews/0/comments: Great location. Super comfortable. Everything you could possibly need.
reviews/1/comments: Well fitted out, quiet, and comfortable - located in a great location for accessing the snow and the aprez.
reviews/2/comments: Amazing location! Walking distance to pretty much everything in town. Updated and very comfortable for everyone. Would stay again
reviews/3/comments: Perfect all around
reviews/4/comments: Clean. Updated. Well appointed kitchen. Comfortable beds. Great gas fireplaces. Nice TVs. Great location. Somewhat confined.
reviews/5/comments: Great location and beautiful condo! Will stay again!
reviews/6/comments: Fantastic in all respects! Incredibly comfortable, and lovely home. Wonderful location. Had everything we could have possibly wanted.
reviews/7/comments: Excellent
reviews/8/comments: No public review
reviews/9/comments: This condo is beautifully redone for renters and very great use of the small space. The location is a 10 but  the unit is on a very busy intersection so it is tough to sleep at night in the summer when you have to keep the windows open because there is no AC and cars are driving by untill late. As far as our stay, it was very pleasant until the last day there was a full tear down of the fence surrounding the unit and workers were maskless during Covid-19 Pandemic,  smoking cigarettes, and tearing down the wooden fence. The cleaning crew also was very rude and not very attentive did not knock before entering unit with masks not properly worn ( nose exposed ) again during a Pandemic in a 1500 square foot unit. I do not think theese things are an every day occurance but better communication with owner of the unit or building, and the cleaning staff could prevent theese things in the future.
reviews/9/response:
Hi Pollyanna,

Thank you so much for sharing your experience and taking the time to post this review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our Colorado retreat perfectly located in the heart of Aspen. You are correct in assuming that the noise disturbances are not an everyday occurrence. With that being said, we would like to sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you experienced. Here at TurnKey, your feedback is highly valued, and we want to assure you that everything you have mentioned is being followed up on. Guest satisfaction is our main priority and we try our best to remedy any problems that may arise. Rest assured this issue will be discussed with our housekeeping team, as we take the health and safety of our guests and employees very seriously. Regarding the work on the wooden fence, this was unfortunately out of our control. We are so sorry that the noise disturbed your stay. Thank you for bringing these important issues to our attention so we may continue to improve our guest experience moving forward. By the way, you were perfect guests, and we are looking forward to hosting you again!

name: Aspen Mountain Residences (Formerly Hyatt) 2 BR
reviews/0/comments:
If you are looking for a place in the core, this is it…best location hands down. East walk to restaurants, shops and the trails!

Tami was very helpful and responsive.

A+
reviews/1/comments: Whoa! How nice, comfortable, convenient can a resort rental be? Book the Hyatt Residence through Tami and you'll find out. We found everything to be just as advertised, very clean, well kept and the staff was fantastic.... ask and you receive. The location supported every dining and skiing need. We are grateful for the opportunity and hope to come back again some day.
reviews/2/comments: Fantastic place. Close to the slopes and all of the beautiful shops of Aspen. It was a pleasure staying here with my family. We would love to visit again. Thanks Tami.
reviews/3/comments: Great host. Great place. Great location. Great value. Thank you Tami.
reviews/4/comments: Perfect location. Great for two couples. Plenty of common areas to relax together and large bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms. Interior was well kept. The front desk staff could not have been nicer. The shuttle to and from the Aspen airport and Snowmass was a huge plus.
reviews/4/response: Thank you for the very nice review Wesley.  I'm so glad you all enjoyed your experience at the Hyatt, and were able to enjoy Aspen when all the restaurants were open.  I sincerely hope to have the pleasure of working with you again.  Tami
reviews/5/comments: Great!
reviews/6/comments: Very nice spot in the middle of Aspen city central. Food and drink all around, bike stand just in front next to bus stop....Nice low key set up, housekeeping was amazing and the entire building was very clean and neat.  Hot tub was nice after the conference I attended. Dave the valet was very nice in an odd way, front desk was very detached and never offered me (Website hidden by Airbnb) points or concern about my stay...Young Dave the bellman was very kind...The morning breakie was a bit dodgy, boxed cereal and frozen bagels... but brewed coffee was nice.  Not the Ritz, or the St. Regis, but overall a very nice stay.

name: Snowmass Chalet w/Shared Pool/Hot Tub/Ski-In/Ski-Out Access/Private W/D + WiFi!
reviews/0/comments: This place was so perfect and clean the pictures are so accurate. My family of 5 really enjoyed this spot and the staffing was super helpful and nice anything we needed they provided and not to mention they will drive you anywhere in the snow mass area. I would definitely be booking this spot again.
reviews/1/comments: Perfect location and wonderful settings for a holiday ski trip!
reviews/2/comments: Perfect location! Enjoyed the hot tub and fireplace. Comfortable rooms and nice kitchen! Next time we will grab a few basics for cooking like salt, pepper and oil.
reviews/3/comments: Pictures are accurate.  Great TV in the living room, good open spaces, and plenty of room for a family.  I wish there was more than one pan to cook with along with a couple of other important utensils.  The climb up with luggage and groceries was a little much from our parking spot - and we're in shape.  Finally, the ski-in ski-out was not ideal, but we made it work.  All-in-all, good if you get a good rate.
reviews/4/comments: The unit number is NOT what is listed on the description. We walked into a occupied home and we were extremely lucky that that homeowner was understanding. To make matters worse the host blew us off and never even checked to see if we got it. Thankfully the on site manager figured out what was wrong and did their best to help. The unit is as described but lacking in any basics such as an adequate amount of towels for 4 people for 5 days.
reviews/4/response: Thank you for staying with us, Elizabeth. We apologize for the service and communication issues impacting your visit. While we have been experiencing an unprecedented volume due to increased rental demand, we are continuing to adapt and adjust our efforts to best meet the needs of our guests. We hope to host you for a great vacation in the future.
reviews/5/comments: Amazing time.  Everyone is very friendly and willing to help all the time. Very central to everything and shuttle service is amazing.   The home itself was very clean, had everything needed and great view of the slopes.
reviews/6/comments: We very much enjoyed our stay at this condo! We take a yearly trip to Snowmass and this is the most spacious and reasonably priced condo we’ve stayed in yet and we did not have to sacrifice any convenience or amenities. The location is perfect, the condo was sparkling clean, and the kitchen had everything we needed. We were so pleased. In fact, my friend stated on our drive home “I almost wish I would have spent more time just hanging out in the condo.”
reviews/7/comments:
This unit is an awesome spot to stay in the Aspen/Snowmass area. Inside, the unit itself offers a ton of amenities. We cooked every night we were there and had all the basic things we needed. All appliances are pretty new and well maintained. Best surprises were the humidifier in the bedroom and heated floors in the bathroom. The unit is on the top floor with vaulted ceilings, which made it feel very spacious.

In terms of activities, the property is truly ski-in/ski-out - you can ski down to the Assay Hill lift or Snowmass Base Village directly from the property via beginner runs. There's also a large outdoor pool and hot tub in the middle of the property. We didn't use it, but it looked nice and was never crowded.

Things to keep in mind - there are lots of stairs and elevators required to get from the slopes or parking area to the unit. Wasn't an issue for us, but something to be aware of. We were shooting for a late check-out, but weren't granted one due to COVID cleaning protocols in place - totally fair, but something to be aware of in case that's your expectation.

General COVID protocols were strong - property was very clean. The service we received was great overall. Check-in and check-out was super easy and the staff was very responsive via Airbnb messaging. Overall we really really enjoyed our stay here and hope to be back soon!
reviews/8/comments: I highly recommend this place! It was very clean and cute decor. It was a perfect size for 4 ppl. Gave off a cabin vibe , which i loved the most. Cozy & comfortable. It was near everything

name: Newly Remodeled  Chateau in the Heart of Aspen
reviews/0/comments: Great listing with everything you need close to town! Would stay again
reviews/1/comments: Great location, updated condo and comfortable beds. Perfect for a quick trip for work with two colleagues to stay together but have their own space.
reviews/2/comments: Clean, renovated and centrally located made a perfect stay for my family!!!  Property manager was fantastic!
reviews/3/comments: The condo is very up to date -- light, bright, modern.  It was very clean, very well stocked.  Beds were super comfortable.  Location is fantastic -- close to the shops/restaurants and walking trails.
reviews/4/comments: Great place & location
reviews/5/comments: Great place great location very seamless experience
reviews/6/comments:
NIce spacious clean rooms with nice beds.
very close to the ski area or town.
there is everythinwe need.
reviews/7/comments: We had a wonderful stay at Lina’s townhouse in Aspen. The location was perfect - just a few minute walk to the base of the gondola. The apartment is clean, modern and has everything you would need for a short or long stay. Would definitely be back!
reviews/8/comments: Best location and greatest host! So easy to get to town and ski
reviews/9/comments: Overall great stay.   Excellent location just 2 blocks to gondola.   Very clean and comfortable.   Accurate photos.   Remodeled.

name: Snowmass Condo w/Ski-In/Ski-Out Access/Shared Pool & Hot Tub/Washer/Dryer/WiFi!
Mountain Lodge! Stonebridge Inn - Deluxe Room
reviews/0/comments: Wonderful location, check in was super efficient! Not far from some of Aspens beautiful hikes.
reviews/1/comments: The room was very nice and the beds were comfortable.  We had everything we needed for our short stay.  The location is perfect as it is close to Aspen without the high prices.  The scenery around the location is lovely in October :)
reviews/2/comments: Great location. It was a little self-contained hotel room.
reviews/3/comments: Great place with good value. Would definitely book again!
reviews/4/comments: Very nice and reasonably priced
reviews/5/comments: amazing location
reviews/6/comments: A very quiet peaceful stay, clean , staff was very helpful and friendly.
reviews/7/comments: Nice place! Beautiful setting. Fall color was awesome!
reviews/8/comments: Super clean. Staff were very nice. Slept well here for two nights. Short drive to all of the hikes and activities we wanted to do in fall. Located between a mall and a shopping center so very convenient for food etc.
reviews/9/comments: Comfortable and spacious room, good location, lots of parking.  We also appreciated the gift bag. We asked for a slightly delayed check out and it was promptly granted.

name: 700 ft to lift - creek & mtn views, WiFi, 3 decks
reviews/0/comments: Lexi was a great host . She communicated with us throughout the whole process, and make sure we had everything we needed. The place was great, clean, and in a perfect location!
reviews/1/comments: The apartment is beautifully renovated.  Everything was as advertised.  Right across from Aspen highlands.  Terrific view of the river and back of Buttermilk!
reviews/1/response: We really enjoyed hosting Avi and his beautiful family.  Avi communicates well, was respectful of the condo and left everything clean.  We would have to have you stay again!
reviews/2/comments:
Our host, Lexi, was amazing. There was never a moments delay in her replying to any question or request before, during and even after our stay. Her condo was absolutely perfect. It was in pristine condition when we arrived and surpassed all expectations we may have had before arrival. The location is great. Layout of the condo was perfect- especially the great media/game room on the lower level. It provided an additional area for our kids to hang out without having to be in the main living and kitchen area.
After spending the past 20 summers and many other visits during the year, we will absolutely be back in her condo again!
reviews/3/comments: Great location and owner, well appointed inside as well. Would highly recommend!
reviews/4/comments: This home is an amazing place and can’t ask for a better location. My family and I had an amazing experience and look forward to coming back to this home.
reviews/4/response: We really enjoyed having Victor and his family at our home in Aspen.  Victor is a respectful guest.  We would absolutely love to have Victor and his growing family come stay again and make more memories in Aspen!

name: Sunny home w/panoramic views (entire 4/3)
reviews/0/comments: Was impressed with this house!
reviews/1/comments: We had a lovely stay at Alexis’s house. Like mentioned before, the house is perfect for a family gathering and has everything you need for a relaxing stay. Having meals on the deck while enjoying the view was a highlight for our family. Thanks, Alexis!
reviews/2/comments: Fantastic place to stay for a family vacation. Alexis has great communication skills and was very helpful. The house is well equipped with extra supplies (towels, toiletries, cleaners) to accommodate your stay. The views from this house are amazing! Will definitely book again.
reviews/3/comments: We had a group travel to Aspen for a ski trip and were extremely happy with our stay; everything is as advertised and the living/dining space is perfect for a larger get-together. Such a great view!
reviews/4/comments: Thank you again, Alexis! I look forward to staying with you again. Please come visit Denver some time and I will give you the same great host experience!
reviews/5/comments: My wife, our two adult children and their partners had a most wonderful week at this spectacular Snowmass house.  A great base for skiing and also for hiking -- a trail up the mountain behind us was a regular trek w/ our chocolate lab with miles of trails and beautiful views.  The house is unique, unbelievable views, plenty of space, warm radiant-heated floors, and very well stocked. It was a perfect gathering place for dinners, and also provided multiple work areas, as all of us were working remotely on and off, and places to exercise or do yoga.  Also fun to watch the mule deer walk by in the evening and even bobcats one morning.   A magical place, we hope to return next year.
reviews/6/comments: Excellent place to stay for a large group. Tons of space and well equipped/stocked. Good proximity to Snowmass and Aspen at around 25-30 mins to each. I’d encourage renting an all-wheel/four-wheel vehicle if traveling here in the winter as the road leading to the house is winding and steep (we had no issue with AWD). Hot water was spotty at times but we did have a large group. I’d definitely recommend overall.
reviews/7/comments: Great place to stay. AMAZING views of the mountains. Alexis was really helpful. Will definitely book again.
reviews/8/comments: We love the house!  Alexis is the best host that she's always available when you need.  We experienced a historical snow storm during our stay and Alexis made sure we were all safe and comfortable.  The house has everything that you need, I mean literally everything from extra beddings, towels, toiletries,  board games to all kinds of spices, coffees and teas. We all enjoyed the gorgeous views and had lots of fun in the house.  Will definitely come back again!  Just one tip, the house is on top of the hill when it snows it would be helpful to have snow chains handy (even for a 4x4) so you wouldn't worry about the winding mountain road.
reviews/9/comments: Incredible view. Huge indoor gate is perfect for keeping little guys and dogs from going down the stairs. I would happily stay here again.

name: 3BR/4.5BA spectacularly designed Aspen townhouse
reviews/0/comments: Perfect location for easy access to town and all mountains. Clean and convenient in every way. Perfect for two families!
reviews/1/comments: Such a wonderful home and experience!   We will definitely be back!
reviews/2/comments: Great location close to Highlands, Ajax and Buttermilk. Easy to pop into downtown for dinner ( less than 5 minute drive) Very quiet group of townhomes. Garage parking was nice. Basement of townhouse was especially great and well appointed. Kitchen is nice too.
reviews/3/comments: The property is cozy and clean with a lovely master suite, close to town and all the mountains. We had a lovely stay!
reviews/3/response: Thanks for taking the time to give us a review Shannon.  We appreciate it!
reviews/4/comments: This is an excellent base of operations for skiing all of the Aspen resorts.  Less than 10 minutes from Aspen Highlands / Mountain, 20 to Snowmass.  This is a very large townhome with excellent furnishings.  There is plenty of space for 6-8 people.  Main floor and downstairs seating areas give people plenty of options.  There was a over 2 ft of snow in the week we were there; but, the roads were clear any time we ventured out.  Highly recommended for a family ski vacation.
reviews/5/comments: Great place.  Well furnished. Comfortable
reviews/6/comments: We had an incredible family vacation at this home in Aspen. The condo was absolutely perfect and had all the amenities you need. It was more spacious than expected and was extremely clean and well kept-up. The fireplace in the middle of the room is amazing and sets the perfect tone for a mountain house. The location is also great, close to town and seconds from beautiful nature walks. The host has quick responses and it was an overall  seamless experience. Would recommend this airbnb to anyone!
reviews/7/comments: This is a truly lovely home that exceeded our expectations and accommodated our family perfectly.  The kitchen was well appointed, the design comfortable and warm, and the beds extra comfortable.  This neighborhood is one of our favorites with very easy access to town and all mountains.  High ceilings and a great media room we’re much appreciated bonuses! We hope to return to this wonderful property!
reviews/7/response: Thanks so much for your very nice review Kathleen.  I love when the guest puts a lot of details to give others more information about our place.
reviews/8/comments: Wonderful townhome! Patti response to any issue was immediate and the pictures almost doesn't do it justice! perfect location and spectacular!
reviews/9/comments: Beautiful, comfortable, clean, immaculately kept home with all the amenities that you want and expect.   Kitchen and living areas were great gathering places for our family.    Felt like we were staying at a friends home.

name: Pinyon Point Ranch ~ Main House
reviews/0/comments: One of the best houses I've ever visited. The view is breathtaking, everything was just perfect.
reviews/0/response: Hi Dmitry, Thank you for choosing to stay at the Main House at Pinyon Point Ranch!  We are so happy to hear that this is one of the best houses you have ever visited!
reviews/1/comments: the house is beautiful, located in an excellent place to relax, the views are amazing, we will surely return in the future.
reviews/1/response: Hi Eric, Thank you for choosing to stay at the Main House at Pinyon Point Ranch!  It sounds like you had a lovely visit, and you are welcome back any time!
reviews/2/comments: This is the first house I’ve stayed at where the pictures can’t come close to the gorgeous views you get in person. This is a stunning place, loaded with plenty of perks that provide fun and relaxation in a luxurious setting. The host is very communicative and will help answer any questions you may have. I highly recommend staying here and look forward to one day being able to return.

reviews/3/comments: Best of the best
reviews/3/response: Hi Brandy, Thank you for your fantastic compliment of the Main House at Pinyon Point Ranch!  We appreciate it!
reviews/4/comments: Get ready to enjoy some breathtaking views soaking in the hot tub ,
reviews/4/response: Hi Sadia, Thank you for choosing to stay at the Main House at Pinyon Point Ranch!  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the breathtaking views while soaking the home's hot tub!

name: Luxury downtown 1 bedrm/ 1.5 bath Aspen core condo
reviews/0/comments: A wonderful stay—highly recommend!
reviews/1/comments: This beautiful modern apartment worked out perfectly for our Aspen Food and Wine trip. Its all about location, location, location and this unit is in the heart of Aspen! We definitely look forward to renting this unit in the years to come!
reviews/2/comments: We had a great stay and Wendy was very accessible and helpful. Her unit is very clean and modern. Great location within easy walking distance of all the restaurants and stores in Aspen.
reviews/3/comments: We had such a great stay at this location! Wendy was so hospitable and gave us great recommendations for places to go in aspen. She was very responsive to our questions as well. The condo is new, beautiful and super clean. We loved lounging by the fireplace after snowboarding all day. The location couldn’t have been more ideal literally a block or 2 from town. Wish we could’ve stayed longer and hope to stay again in the future.
reviews/4/comments: Fabulous host! Super easy to work with.

name: Little Nell Condominiums Unit 11
reviews/0/comments: Awesome place to stay in downtown Aspen!
reviews/1/comments: great place, loved the balcony and the ease of access to downtown.
reviews/2/comments: everything was great and we enjoyed our stay. We would definitely come back
reviews/3/comments: The host is wonderful and this place is luxurious, comfortable, and perfect for our families on a ski trip. Amenities and built quality are exquisite. Daily cleaning service is nice. It is pricey and we splurged, but we enjoyed staying here and visiting beautiful Aspen!

name: Lovely Townhouse  Premium Location  A/C  Parking
reviews/0/comments: Stayed  five nights for my daughter's wedding at The Little Nell. It's a beautiful and comfortable townhome in the heart of Aspen! Walking distance to restaurants, bars, supermarket and gondola. Equipped with everything needed for a short or long stay. Owner was easy to communicate all the time. We would love to come back in the future.
reviews/1/comments: Excellent location and easy walk to all shops, restaurants and Aspen Mtn ski lift. Will stay again when we return to Aspen. We had two small children with us, and the space is a little tight for them to play. But you’re 3 blocks from the park and 2 from ice rink. Our 2 year old had a blast.
reviews/2/comments: Great location for a week long family ski trip in Aspen!
reviews/3/comments: We rented Shari’s place to visit Aspen for a long weekend with friends. We could not have been more happy with our choice to book this condo!  It is spacious, luxurious, and in a great location! Shari was a fabulous host. We hope we have the opportunity to stay again next year!
reviews/4/comments: We loved Shari's place. It is in great location, close to everything in the town. Shari has been very responsive. Highly recommended.

name: Modern 3 Bedroom Condo in the Core
reviews/0/comments: We had a great (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was super easy and quick. Clay's home is super comfortable and well stocked. It also looks exactly like it does in his pictures. The neighborhood is quiet and conveniently located in town. It is an easy walk to some great hiking trails, restaurants, shopping...everything! Would absolutely recommend to stay there!
reviews/1/comments: This is a very nice apartment conveniently located in the heart of Aspen. It is walking distance to the park, shops and restaurants. Accommodations are excellent and the apartment is very comfortable and well stocked. Will definitely stay there again.
reviews/2/comments: Beautiful home in a great location. House was clean, well-equipped and central location to all Aspen has to offer. Clay was very responsive and easy to communicate with. Would definitely stay here again!

reviews/3/comments: Great location and very clean. Would stay here again!
reviews/4/comments: Very nice, clean and cozy unit. Everything was great and Dave is very kind and helpful. Thank you!

reviews/6/comments: It’s a beautiful place that’s immaculate and I highly recommend.

reviews/8/comments: Very responsive, great host

name: Luxury remodeled condo, Location

reviews/1/comments: The property was great and very cozy.
