reviews/0/comments: The residence was as exactly as described.  Directly at the base of Aspen Highlands and great for ski in/out access.  Thank you, Danny!

name: Durant Condominiums Unit C2

reviews/1/comments: wonderful location with plenty of space for our group of 5 adults
reviews/2/comments: Beautiful condo and perfect location. A little noisy with some dogs barking at night and the people above our condo could be heard walking around, which woke us up early in the morning, but other than that, I would say it’s a great place to stay for the price and location.
reviews/3/comments: Great place very clean and it’s located in a great area

name: The Divide View at Lime Creek Canyon Ranch
reviews/0/comments: What a great remote location with views and windows galore! Thanks for such a cozy experience! So close to hikes and the reudi reservoir! Cullen was a great communicator as well. The place was comfortable and had everything we needed. Loved the big furniture for hanging with the family 😃
reviews/1/comments: Beautiful cabin! & Mountain View! We rented it out for our wedding weekend and we had the best time! Kitchen had everything you could possibly need and the bathrooms stocked up. They even had extra tooth brushes! Also, the beds were comfortable. I would definitely come back with my husband!

name: Gondola Plaza Penthouse
reviews/0/comments: Clean, bright, updated.  Best location in Aspen, in our opinion, after coming to this town for 20 years.  In the price range, this place is tops.
reviews/1/comments:
This is the perfect location for any season in Aspen. For winter you go downstairs then out the door and up the stairs to the gondola. Couldn’t be easier. As such the condo is centrally located with the town as well and it’s a walk-everywhere kind of place. Nothing beats this building, it’s my favorite place to stay in Aspen. The place is clean and modern with comfy beds. It is well taken care of and you can get daily housekeeping for a price, just ask the host. No issues here, you will 100% be happy with this listing. (washer and dryer across the hall was no big deal at all. it’s steps from the front door and very clean. there is always a washer available and i never saw anyone else doing laundry so it’s low traffic. it’s almost like it’s inside the condo). very clean, easy check in/out, parking v easy
it’s great have fun!
reviews/1/response: Thank you so much for this awesome review Angela. I love how much detail you put in it. I’m thrilled that you love the condo and will be back!
reviews/2/comments: We had a great time in this property. The spaces are comfortable , well distributed and equipped. The location is excellent for skiing, going out to the town or shopping. The communication with Michel was very fluid and she made sure that everything was in order.
reviews/2/response: Thank you very much Carlos. I appreciate your nice review.
reviews/3/comments: Terrific updated space with wonderful views, and the location can’t be beat.  Very unassuming location in the middle of town.. LOVE the space
reviews/4/comments: What a great condo and experience.  Michele was easy and fast to work with from start to finish.  Terrific communication, beautiful unit and luxury experience.  Looking forward to renting again.  Thank you.
reviews/5/comments: Unbeatable location for skiing, dining and shopping. Very clean and modern condo. Easy check in. The underground parking was a very nice amenity. Gondola for Aspen Mountain was literally right outside the door. Michele was excellent to work with.
reviews/5/response: Thanks for the nice review Craig. I’m so glad you enjoyed your stay.
reviews/6/comments: Great location, apartment, and overall experience.
reviews/6/response: Thank you Sam
reviews/7/comments: Great location within Aspen. Spacious and secure apartment within the complex. Nice views overlooking town.
reviews/7/response: Thank you for the nice review Andrew.  There is already a new guest at the condo so I don't have access to the TV to sign out of the accounts and the owner is out of town.  So sorry! Hopefully you can sign out remotely.
reviews/8/comments:
Perfect location, especially if you plan on having a car. The elevator from garage to 4th floor was very convenient. The building is nice and private. The unit is perfect for a family. If your skiing aspen its steps from gondola. Belly Up music is across the street.
Very professionally managed and our expectations were exceeded.
Would stay again.
reviews/9/response: Thanks for giving us a 5-star rating in all areas. I’m so glad you enjoyed your stay.

name: Amazing Ski-In Ski-Out Dual Master @ Ritz-Carlton
reviews/0/comments: Can’t ask for more.  We did a summer stay and can’t wait to go back in winter too…
reviews/1/comments: Beautiful place.  (2) masters can not be beat for comfort and luxury!  Our host went out of his way to make sure all details were handled for us.  Would definitely visit again!
reviews/2/comments: A first class Aspen experience. Perfect location, fantastic condo, amazing amenities. Will be back.

name: Fasching Haus Unit 390
4 Bedroom 6 Bed Fasching Haus Penthouse
reviews/0/comments:
Great place, great location!
The kitchen had everything you need to prepare meals.
The bedroom lay out is great with each having ensuite baths.
James was very responsive and helpful
reviews/1/comments: Very well appointed with everything you could need.  All the bedrooms are downstairs and living area upstairs, which is nice for gathering. Great location and our host was very easy to communicate with.
reviews/2/comments: Incredible place with a fantastic location and host. Had a wonderful week there, would absolutely book again.

We had a blast!
Our entire family, children and grandchildren, enjoyed the penthouse, pool and hot tub.
We loved the close proximity to Ajax mountain for snowboarding and skiing.
We were thrilled with the great location for bus transportation to Buttermilk, Highlands and Snowmass resorts.
The family had wonderful times in town shopping and eating at local restaurants.
reviews/4/comments: We really enjoyed our stay. The location was great, the rooms were nice and clean. The common space worked very well. We had a few challenges with the fan (always going) but eventually figured it out. I would recommend this place to others. Thanks!
reviews/5/comments: Jame’s place is super convenient. It’s basically in town. We walked to dinner every night. We didn’t ski Aspen Mountain but it is right next to his place and an easy walk. We really enjoyed hanging out in the family room - the views of the mountains are amazing!
reviews/5/response: I'm glad you enjoyed your stay! Would love to have you all again.
reviews/6/comments: James was very helpful throughout the booking process and during our stay — place is unbeatable location
reviews/7/comments: Cute suite! I like the open kitchen layout; we cooked while socializing and watching TV. James was also fast in responding to my inquiries.
reviews/8/comments: We were 5 adults and 2 kids and fit comfortably.  The apt is spacious and clean and stylish.   The kitchen was well supplied and spacious. The beds are comfortable.  The amenities are thorough and thoughtful.  We loved our stay.  The instructions from the hosts were beyond detail and super helpful.  Highly recommend this apt for group ski vacations.
reviews/9/comments: Beautiful place! Great location! Plenty of room for our 8 guests. Would highly recommend his place!!

name: Lumin 2

reviews/1/response: Wonderful, Kristina, your review totally made our day! Thanks for staying with us & have a great week.

name: Central Aspen Core Condo
Luxe Mountain Modern Core Condo Next to St. Regis
reviews/0/comments: This was a fabulous stay! The location was amazing - literally steps from the St Regis, the park, and the central area of Aspen with all the shops and restaurants. The actual condo was comfortable for our family of 4 (two teenage boys and two parents) and had every possible amenity you could dream of and more. The hosts were extremely timely in their communications/responses. The check in/check out was easy breezy. Highly recommend this gem of a spot!
reviews/1/comments: Beautiful property
reviews/1/response: We hope your Aspen trip was amazing! Thank you for  respecting our condo and enjoying 😊
reviews/2/comments: I’ve visited Aspen regularly for the past 20 years and alternate between hotels (usually St Regis but have also stayed at The Limelight ) and condos or homes.   I generally prefer a condo/home for more space as well as having a washer/dryer and kitchen.    I’ve yet to stay at the same place twice but that will change.  We absolutely loved Brian’s place.   The inside was so well appointed, thoughtful touch after thoughtful touch starting with champagne and incredible chocolates at arrival.   The refrigerator was stocked with water, condiments and even some beer.  I could have thrown a dinner party as the kitchen was so well stocked.   Japanese toilets in both bathrooms, steam shower and heated floors.   The condo was stocked to perfection.   Location was awesome (next door to St Regis).  There was not one thing I’d change.   It was perfection!   I can’t wait to come back.   Brian is an awesome host too!  Very charming and responsive.
reviews/3/comments: Brian was an amazing host. Wonderful place in a wonderful place. Clean. Wonderful amenities. Close to everything. Feels like home. Thanks for the amazing hospitality!
reviews/4/comments: Modern, clean place in excellent location. Highly recommended
reviews/5/comments: This home was amazing. So many amenities and fun extras! It is walking distance to Ajax, downtown restaurants and shopping, and the bus transportation center that takes you to all other ski resorts.  Ultra modern with great technology and stocked with everything. We loved staying here!
reviews/6/comments: The endless comfortable details, the beautiful design and furnishings, and the perfect location make this place worth visiting over and over.  We loved our stay and can’t wait to come back!
reviews/7/comments: We had an amazing time in Aspen at this condo. Every detail was dialed in to live comfortably and luxuriously. The design from the finishes to the lighting were dialed in and perfectly on point. I felt so excited to get ready to go out in this space! The beds were very comfortable which is so necessary at this price point. I dont even want to share all the amazing little surprises youll appreciate about this  place because i want you to be delighted and surprised by the experience yourself. The location was great. This place is everything and more. We were super impressed!
reviews/8/comments: What a cute place! Great location, super clean, well - decorated condo! The host Brian was also very nice and accomodating. Would love to come back!!!
reviews/9/comments: Thanks for everything Brian - You're the best!

reviews/0/comments: Beautiful condo, perfect location and great service!!  Our family had a fabulous experience in your home , Krista!  Thank you!

reviews/0/response: Thank you for your review. We are happy you enjoyed your recent stay with us and hope to welcome you again whenever your travels bring you back to Aspen!

reviews/0/comments: Great location ! Close to everything downtown. Shops , restaurants, hiking , biking. Mark is a great host ! Great prompt communication. The condo is cozy and well stocked. He even provided bath products, kitchen products and paper products which was above and beyond.   We stayed for the month of Sept. It truly was a home away from home. We will definitely stay again.
reviews/1/comments: Perfect, convenient location for our needs!
reviews/2/comments: Great location in town - walking distance to just about everything. I wish there were extra stars for communication- they reached out to make sure everything was going well and responded so fast to questions.  Great find.
reviews/3/comments: You would be lucky to stay here.  Mark, the host, is amazing.  The condo and location is amazing.  We had a great time.
reviews/4/comments: Great condo in a fabulous location. One block from the City Market and only a few blocks from the Aspen mountain gondola. The condo had everything we needed. Would love to stay there again.

name: MLK at the Ritz Aspen!! 3bed/3bath ski on ski off
The Aspen Mountain Residence
reviews/0/comments: For skiers who want easy access to Ajax Mountain the Grand Hyatt is the best option in Aspen.

name: Galliwest~ Snowmass/Aspen, Colorado
reviews/0/comments:
Galliwest exceeded our own personal very high expectations. The location and environment was truly the best we’ve ever experienced. The house was PERFECT! We had four generations of family celebrating a wonderful wedding and Galliwest provided the most beautiful and comfortable setting you can imagine. The elevator was a life saver for our 90 year old mom and the occasional wild-life / deer roaming behind the home provided an amazing experience for our almost two year old granddaughter.

The scenery from the front of the house was breathtaking and we took advantage of the multiple porches each and every morning.

Simply put, Galliwest is truly a gem. Chuck & Tina were extremely delightful and knowledgeable. I highly recommend Galliwest for anyone looking for a home to provide lodging for multiple people in the most beautiful of settings. I’m not sure there are enough stars available to give out.

Thank you so much to Chuck and Tina!!!
reviews/1/comments: To say this home is incredible is an understatement. We stayed here for our wedding weekend and we enjoyed every minute. The home is well stocked, and every last detail is immaculately thought out. Plus, the amount of wildlife was also incredible! Foxes, deer, and more! Our family who stayed with us were blown away by the views. We enjoyed so much of our time on the amazing upper deck. We can’t wait to be back here sometime soon!
reviews/2/comments: Wow!  We just got back from a seven day stay and this house was perfect for our large family group of nine adults.  We appreciated all the many amenities of the house (the kitchen amenities are like none I've ever seen) as well as the very comfortable indoor and outdoor spaces to spread out, the amazing views, the close proximity to Snowmass Village (we walked there many times) and the caretakers, Tina and Chuck, who were always available to answer any questions.  Rent it and don't look back - you'll love it!
reviews/3/comments: Our vacation at Galliwest was absolutely perfect!  Chuck and Tina were very responsive and helpful prior to our arrival and throughout our stay; the house was beautiful, well-appointed, and spacious for the eight adults and baby in our family; and the view was truly breathtaking.  Without a doubt or any reservations, I would highly recommend this home to anyone who wants to relax and enjoy a long-awaited vacation without any angst or worries!  I sure hope to return one day!
reviews/4/comments: This gorgeous home was perfect for a vacation with our grown children and our grandchildren. The location was wonderful and the house was huge, clean and well stocked. Chuck and Tina were wonderful hosts. Well worth every penny!
reviews/5/comments: Awesome location, huge house for a large group. Chuck and Tina went out of their way to make our stay special and seamless
reviews/6/comments:
Chuck & Tina are incredibly helpful and hospitable.

The property is beautiful, the check in, check out process incredibly easy, and you have access to everything.
reviews/7/comments: Everything worked exactly like expected.  Elevator sounded like an extravagance but it was really useful.
reviews/8/comments: Place was incredible. Everything we could ask for and more. Couldn’t have had a better stay.
reviews/9/comments: We had an amazing group ski trip at Galliwest. The place was perfectly setup for couples / friends, and a lot of great thoughtful details made it so enjoyable. 10/10 - would recommend

name: Luxury Aspen Ranch (35 acres with private pond)
reviews/0/comments: An idyllic setting, perfect for our family of 5.  We were looking for a relaxing, authentic Aspen location and this place hit the mark!
reviews/1/comments: Fantastic place. We have a place a few miles away but couldn’t accommodate all 23 family members- three generation family reunion. The kids, all under 10 loved the ranch- the zip line, the hot tub, the cats, dogs, goats, peacocks and horses. The ranch house is beautiful, we’d come back in a heart beat!!! Not one negative word from any of us. Loved every minute
reviews/2/comments: The ranch was incredibly beautiful! It's just a short drive to Aspen, but far enough away to escape the crowds who flock to this wonderful area.  We rode bikes right from the ranch each of the three days we were there.  The Rio Grande Bike trail is right next to the ranch, so we were able to go on wonderful rides without worrying about traffic.  It's a very scenic, easy bike ride to Aspen from the ranch and from there you can ride to Maroon Bells or Ashcroft Ghost Town or other lovely sites. The house is great for couples or for families with kids and the beds were comfortable.  The scenery from the house is fantastic.  You'll enjoy sitting in the rocking chairs on the porch and enjoying the views.
reviews/3/comments: Amazing house and amazing people!
reviews/4/comments: We really enjoyed our stay and the location.
reviews/5/comments: Pictures don’t do this property justice! Absolutely beautiful views. We didn’t go into town much since there was so much to do around the property. Kids loved the tree house, zip line, pond, and all the animals. We hope to return soon!
reviews/6/comments:
Amazing place to stay! Definitely recommended!
Wish we could have stayed longer!
Calm, private and peaceful home. Very clean and a great host!
reviews/7/comments: My second stay and I enjoyed the ranch more than ever. Oliver is a great host. The house is comfortable and spotless.  Watching the elk come down the hill in the evening is a bonus!
reviews/8/comments: A wonderful property. Everything was great. Couldn’t be better.
reviews/9/comments: Great!

name: Durant Condominiums Unit D5
reviews/0/comments: The condo was beautiful. Excellent location. Heated pool and jacuzzi. Steam shower. Communication was a little tough but it was Memorial Day weekend. Great stay overall
reviews/1/comments:
Everything in the unit was exactly as advertised and the location was great for our party that was in town for a wedding and needed to quickly get to various venues across Aspen.

We had a few minor inconveniences related to check-in, parking and HVAC, but these were all very promptly and professionally taken care of by the concierge team once we reported it.

Complimentary transfer to the airport was a huge plus as well as coordination with our grocery delivery service so that all the groceries were pre-stocked prior to our arrival.
reviews/2/comments: Amazing location and was just how represented   Bunk room was really nice and spacious as compared to most places - great huge windows!   Very very comfortable
reviews/3/comments: Great location! Walkable to all restaurant and shuttle to other mountains. The only thing I don’t remember being listed was this condo is on the 4th floor and no elevator. I think it specifies “top” floor and i just assumed that was a 2nd floor. So lots of stairs to climb while carrying equipment. Host was very responsive. They even allowed an early check in. Would stay again!
reviews/4/comments: Great location, cozy and well equipped.  Love the steam shower in the master bedroom.  Access to pool and hot tub.  A short walk to the gondola.
reviews/5/comments: Loved the location of this condo!  The sleeping arrangements were also awesome for us.  Held our family of 8 perfectly.
reviews/6/comments: We enjoyed are stay very much ! The condo was beautiful & in a great location .
reviews/7/comments: As advertised, a great property in a great location.
reviews/8/comments: GREAT PLACE TO STAY
reviews/9/comments: Very nice apartment and perfect location

name: Modern Mountain Retreat
reviews/0/comments: House is fantastic.  Very large and we had a enough room for everyone.  The house was well appointed and the River behind the house is beautiful.  The house is actually not in Snowmass it’s in Meredith.  The drive, however, to the ski mountain took about 20 mins.  It wasn’t bad.  Would stay here again.
reviews/1/comments: Sara’s home was absolutely perfect for a group of people! Very spacious and clean. Only a 20 minute easy drive into the city to the mountains for skiing/snowboarding and restaurants. Sara even checked in on us during our stay. Would definitely recommend and book again without a doubt!
reviews/2/comments: Sara is the most wonderful host—very timely with her communication and went above and beyond to accommodate everything we needed for our stay. Her home was absolutely beautiful and had everything we needed. It was extremely clean and well stocked with necessities like towels, toiletries, and kitchen / cooking utensils. It's also in the perfect location and a 15 - 20 minute drive to everything within Aspen from the mountains, to grocery stores, to downtown. We had the most wonderful time staying in her beautiful home and felt very safe and comfortable the entire time. Thank you again, Sara!
reviews/3/comments: Sara has a beautiful home! She is responsive and  answers any questions you may have. A very cooperative host!
reviews/4/comments: Sara was a very responsive and accommodating host.  The house was clean and great for large groups.  The photos actually do not do the house justice as it is much more spacious and beautiful than even the photos show.
reviews/5/comments: Our stay was great. Sara's communication throughout the whole stay was phenomenal. The whole house is lovely. Our family truly enjoyed our vacation.
reviews/6/comments: Sara's house was the perfect weekend getaway for our group of friends. Enough space for everyone to spread out and not feel crowded, beautiful nature and views, and easy to get into Aspen. Sara was super responsive and accommodating. Such a wonderful weekend away! Thank you!
reviews/7/comments: The home was gorgeous, the host, Sara, was incredibly responsive to our request / needs.  We are looking at booking again in the future if it's still available!  This is the perfect multiple couples / girls or guys weekend / multiple families home near aspen and snowmass.  There are hiking trails out of the front door and it sits on an incredibly peaceful river out of the back doors.  we would've stayed forever if we could.  Highly recommend.
reviews/8/comments: Sara was amazing! Super responsive and the house was beautiful. Loved the location and the river behind the house.
reviews/9/comments:
Sara's home is absolutely gorgeous and was the perfect home base for our weekend getaway in Aspen/Snowmass. The home is large, spacious, and with plenty of room for our group of 9 men. There are so many amenities to appreciate, but the best by far is the stunning river that flows behind the home. The sound of the rushing water, and the wildlife surrounding it made us feel like we were even more remote than we were. We absolutely loved it!

Sara is also super communicative and accommodating with our requests and questions. She is an amazing host!

We can't wait to return to Aspen and would likely book Sara's home again for our large group.

name: Glasshouse Basalt
reviews/0/comments: Modern elegant home on a mountainside - as advertised in terms of decorations and style.  Great views of aspen tree-lined ridges and a lake below.  Owner was very responsive to any issues.
reviews/1/comments: This place does not disappoint!!  Views are stunning of mountains and reservoir!  The home is ultra modern and comfortable.  Gorgeous decor and super functional open floor plan.  Well worth the gorgeous drive out of Basalt downtown.  We loved it & will go back!!!
reviews/2/comments:
My wife and I got married at the Glasshouse. It was a truly unique and special experience. The views make for a phenomenal setting, and of course the pictures came out great.

Other than the obviously great views, we also loved the overall location. Far enough into the mountains that you're really out there, but you can get down to town in a reasonable amount of time if you need some groceries.

Jack is very responsive, and a flexible and accommodating host.
reviews/3/comments: We looooved staying at Glasshouse so much. It was a BEAUTIFUL lovely place. Great taste, so serene, surrounded by beautiful nature around and views! Modern and comfortable and lovely. Without those glass windows we would’ve never seen the deer and elk go by. We had such a good time. Also great communication with Jack. He’s an excellent host and so helpful. We can’t wait to come back!
reviews/4/comments:
After spending a week at the Glasshouse my adult daughter, son and I all agreed "Jack must be a really cool dude." The house is absolutely spectacular and Jack is the ideal host. From initially reserving the house, to check in, to departure, everything was flawless.

We had an incredible week. Fly fishing, daily hikes and just hanging out with the garage doors open watching the afternoon thunder storms roll in. There are numerous deer that roam around the area, including a 1-2 week old fawn hopping around trying to keep up with her mother priceless. The glasshouse gives you a 360 degree of the weather, the mountains, the stars and the wildlife.

We hit the Whole Foods and the wine shop on our way up and cooked most meals "at home". We did grab dinner in Basalt a couple of nights. The Thai restaurant was our favorite. Extraordinary week.
reviews/5/comments: This place was AMAZING ! Jack was a great host and very attentive. Trust me guys book it. You will not be disappointed. The view is so breath taking. Right out of a movie. Beautiful!
reviews/6/comments: The Glasshouse was a such a beautiful home. The pictures do it no justice! The views are spectacular and it was a cozy stay during the snowstorm. Loved it and would definitely return in the future!
reviews/7/comments: If privacy is a concern when considering a glass house? Consider the property’s higher elevation. It was something that crossed my mind at first but I was surprised with how private it ended up being.
reviews/8/comments: We loved the place. It was clean and well put together. It is a modern style home in a open area that provides great views for pictures and videos. Jack responded quickly to any and every question we had. We had a great time and plan to return to place again! Thanks again Jack!
reviews/9/comments: We had a great time at Jack’s place. The communication was super easy, the host is very responsive as well - the glasshouse is incredibly beautiful, equipped with everything we needed. The place, and the view looks exactly like it does on the pictures. Very worth it. 👌🏽

name: 4BR Magnificent Aspen home 2 minutes from downtown
reviews/0/comments: Wonderful.
reviews/1/comments: The house is fabulous! The kitchen, outdoor living area and back yard make it hard to leave the house! Michelle was great to communicate with and loved everything about our stay in the house!
reviews/2/comments: We really enjoyed our stay. The home is beautiful, exactly as pictured and location was ideal. Would highly recommend it.
reviews/3/comments: This is the perfect spot for downtown Aspen. My family and I had such a great time at Michele’s house. All the rooms were spacious and that master bedroom was TO DIE FOR — you will have people fighting over it so claim it before you get there 😁. Communication with Michele was amazing! My family and I got lost driving around and she was so quick with my texts to help us out. I hope you enjoy your stay here as much as we did.
reviews/4/comments: Great house!  Great location to town…easy check in and out.
reviews/5/comments: Great house for a big group. Clean, bright and super comfy beds.  Michele was super communicative and easy to reach.
reviews/6/comments: Previous reviews aren’t wrong. Michelle and the house was perfect!
reviews/6/response: Thanks so much Stewart!
reviews/7/comments: Michele was a fantastic host who made our experience extremely smooth and enjoyable! The home itself is in a great location and was a perfect set up for our large family with easy access to town and the slopes. Will stay again for future trips to Aspen!
reviews/7/response: Thank you so much for your feedback Kevin. I really appreciate the heads up on the toilet paper situation and I have asked the housekeeper to keep an eye on the inventory. Also will work on the heat instructions.  So glad that you enjoyed your stay.
reviews/8/comments: My group of 10 loved this stay! The house is beautiful and the location can’t be beat the shuttle would pick us us right in front of the house and bring us 5 minutes into town. Communication with our host was great and she was flexible to our needs! Thank you we would definitely recommend this house
reviews/8/response: Thanks for your nice review Sabrina and I really appreciate your feedback regarding the phone number for the shuttle.
reviews/9/comments: Absolutely loved our stay in Aspen at this gorgeous house! Perfect spot for a group of friends to get together!

name: Sunny corner house, walk everywhere, 2022 remodel!
reviews/0/comments: This is my second time staying in this home, and I have been an aspen regular for years now, if you want to have a walkable destination, for a beyond reasonable price with walking distance to town, there is no better place! Spring or Summertime. Mark is very communicative, and accommodating.
reviews/1/comments: Beautiful home in close proximity to downtown. Owners were very responsive and made our stay super easy and seamless. Would definitely return!
reviews/2/comments: This home and the team behind it are among the best in Aspen. Don’t make the mistake of not staying here!
reviews/3/comments: A lovely home in the heart of town managed and owned by kind hearted people who clearly care about the quality of experiences the renters have while staying in this special home at an awesome destination!
reviews/3/response: Thank you Jason! We hope to see you and your family again in Aspen soon!
reviews/4/comments: This bright, spacious, quiet, well appointed and very clean home is in one of the best locations in Aspen. We had a great stay and will happily rent this house again. Mark was an excellent host. The check-in experience was flawless.
reviews/4/response: Thank you Fabio!  Hope to host you again soon.
reviews/5/comments: La casa bien ubicada, cómoda, muy limpia,  todos los muebles son nuevos!
reviews/5/localizedReview/comments: The house is well located, comfortable, very clean,  all furniture is new!

name: NEW 6Mil  Lux Condo Ski n Ski Out Aspen Mtn (AJAX)
reviews/0/comments: Great home and location! We had a fun time and Jilliene was responsive to any questions/concerns. We would definitely stay here again!
reviews/1/comments: This is a pet friendly modern condo, close to town with three bedrooms. It was perfect for us and our son's family. They provide a pack and play for the baby.
reviews/2/comments: Appreciate Aspen was a wonderful place to stay! It is in an excellent location at the heart of town. The home is very private and offers the feeling of living like a local. I would definitely recommend this property to anyone looking to travel to Aspen!
reviews/3/comments: We had an amazing time in Aspen! The condo was perfect.
reviews/4/comments:
Fantastic location with a wonderful host.
We had 3 couples total staying there and it couldn't have been better.
reviews/5/comments: Great location and beautiful views! The host was quick to respond with anything we needed.
reviews/6/comments:
Great condo and location. Easy walking distance to gondola and town. The condo was nicely appointed and comfortable for our party of six plus a toddler. Jilliene was a great host and took care of all our questions and requests.

Would gladly return for another stay!
reviews/7/comments: Very well located spot in Aspen with an eye for style. Extremely comfortable place to stay for our crew of 6 and easy walk to town.
reviews/8/comments: We stayed over the holidays and had a wonderful time. The unit is newly remodeled and the location is exceptional. Jilliene was amazing to work with when we encountered travel delays. Highly recommend this property and host!!
reviews/9/comments: Great location for the town, shops, restaurants as well as skiing. Very comfortable, light and clean. Tastefully furnished and well looked after. Host was very accessible, helpful and friendly. Housekeeper available to help us. We had a lovely stay and hope to return!

name: Pinyon Point Ranch ~ Luxury Estate Near Aspen
reviews/0/comments: We absolutely loved our stay at this ranch! When you walk in the doors and enter the living room kitchen…. It is the best views I have seen in that valley…. Breathtaking…. We didn’t want to leave the house because of how amazing they were. It was the perfect amount of space for our entire family and extended family. There were constantly deer and wildlife walking by and it was so peaceful to sit on the porches and watch them. We had a private chef come one night and did a more formal dinner and the kitchen and dining room were perfect for what we needed! Tina was great and very responsive. We would definitely stay here again, highly recommend this piece or heaven!
reviews/1/comments: Wow! What an amazing home, view, and responsive host! This was the perfect home for out-of-town family attending my daughter's wedding. Plenty of room to be social, but not right on top of each other. You might fill up your phone's camera storage taking non-stop photos of the views! Truly a spectacular location and well maintained property.
reviews/1/response: Hi Peggy, Thank you for your fantastic review of Pinyon Point Ranch!  It was such a pleasure to host your stay!  The property photos that you shared from your daughter's wedding day are absolutely stunning!
reviews/2/comments: This house was incredible. The views are breathtaking! I would truly recommend this home. We had a party of 10 (3 couples and 4 singles) and it worked perfectly because everyone had their own room and private bathroom to use (the powder room counts!).  The owners put thought into every aspect of the design in the home, beautiful layout and beautifully designed.
reviews/2/response: Hi LaTonia, Thank you for your fantastic review and recommendation of Pinyon Point Ranch!  We are glad the home was a perfect fit for your larger group!
reviews/3/comments: The house is amazing the views are remarkable the pictures dose this house no justice a must see in person
reviews/3/response: Hi Bryan, Thank you for choosing to stay at Pinyon Point Ranch!  We are so glad that you found it to be an amazing home with remarkable views!
reviews/4/comments: This property might be the Best Airbnb I’ve stayed in, from beginning to end Tina was very easy to get in touch with and accommodating. The property is so huge and gorgeous, the pictures don’t do it justice in comparison to real life visuals, let’s start with how informative the welcome book is! Any time I had a question and was about to contact Tina I went to the book first and the answers were there! The welcome basket! So surprised , I didn’t even know that it was for me my cousin had to tell me to open the basket it was for us. When I tell you all bases we’re covered I would recommend anybody to come here for a great time. Just be prepared for the drive up the mountain but thr view is worth it
reviews/4/response: Hi Williams, We are so happy to hear how much you enjoyed Pinyon Point Ranch!  It was a pleasure to host your stay!
reviews/5/comments:
I had the chance to stay at Tina's beautiful home over the weekend, and let me just say: WOW. The view of the entire valley was spectacular. The clubhouse was perfect for an evening cocktail, billiards, and watching the game.
Tina, herself, was very easy to communicate with and answered any questions I had instantly.
If you are considering this property, I highly recommend you treat yourself. You will not regret it!
reviews/5/response: Hi Jack, Thank you for your fantastic review and recommendation of Pinyon Point Ranch!  It was such a pleasure to host your stay!  It sounds like you had a wonderful visit!
reviews/6/comments: Unbelievable! As advertised. Truly incredible. Best view in the world!
reviews/6/response: Hi Collin, Thank you for your fantasic review of Pinyon Point Ranch!  We have to agree that the view from this home is phenomenal!  We are so happy to hear how much you enjoyed it!
reviews/7/comments: Tina was absolutely amazing! She gave recommendations on certain things we were needing in the area. She was very prompt with her support and ensured that our group had a great time. The place was beautiful, clean and soo luxurious!
reviews/7/response: Hi Chandra, It was such a pleasure to host your group's stay at Pinyon Point Ranch!  We are so glad they had a great time!
reviews/8/comments: This house was absolutely amazing! It was everything we ever wanted and I couldn't have asked for a better place to stay. I would absolutely recommend this to others and wish to visit again sometime.
reviews/8/response: Hi Dystany, Thank you for your terrific review and recommendation of Pinyon Point Ranch!  We are so happy to hear that it was everything you ever wanted and hope that you will be able to visit again some day!
reviews/9/comments: Amazing place 7 days were not enough to enjoy this house to the fullest , Tina is an amazing host , the house is amazing the view is breathtaking overall an amazing experience for me and my family ! We will be back !!!
reviews/9/response: Hi Manny, Thank you for your fantastic review of Pinyon Point Ranch!  It was such a pleasure to host your stay!  We are so happy to hear that you and your family had an amazing experience at this property, and we look forward to your return visit!

name: Designer retreat in Aspen downtown.Walk everywhere
reviews/0/comments: Beautiful quiet unit. Well appointed. Effortless stay in a central location. All thumbs up.
reviews/1/comments:
Not to be missed! Karin’s location is clean, well designed, conveniently located and perfectly comfortable for a family with small children.
Karin was super easy to communicate with, fast and clear. The apartment was spotless and well stocked. We will come again! Don’t miss this Aspen gem!
reviews/2/comments: Perfect location, great modern updates, comfy beds and east parking. Karin was a fantastic & communicative host. Can’t wait to be back!
reviews/3/comments: Beautiful place! Close to everything. Great host!
reviews/4/comments: We had a wonderful time at Aspen, and we loved Karin's place! Location is great, easy to walk anywhere in town and very close to the supermarket, gondola, etc. The apartment is also very charming and comfortable, we were two adults and two children. We highly recommend it and we would love to come back during the winter season!
reviews/5/comments: Amazing location and beautiful apartment!!
reviews/6/comments:
Perfect location. Just as described. Beautiful decor with a well thought out floor plan. Plenty of closet space, great kitchen.
Comfortable beds and furnishings. The owner was very responsive to questions. We will stay here again ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
reviews/7/comments: Fantastic place in Aspen! Beautiful as pictured and short walk to shuttles to hop around to all of the mountains. We didn’t ski Aspen due to small kids, but it was super easy to get to Buttermilk/Snowmass. Loved the kitchen, everything pristine and new, bathroom well stocked with nice products, and very calming environment. Kids loved charades and jenga. Awesome TV’s! Amazing kitchen!! ❤️ Close by to Little Nell, amazing restaurants (get reservations in advance depending on time of year - next time oysters at Clark’s for sure). Enjoyed Ajax Tavern, CP burger, pick up wine across street, breakfast cafe across street, short walk to Paradise Bakery (do not miss) m, grocery store and shopping. Book transportation to airport well in advance. We ended up taking the bus due to not realizing shortage of Uber/lyft/taxi services. Might have been due to spring break. We also stayed in Snowmass for ski in and ski  out. This condo was a welcome escape from the hotel proportions.
reviews/8/comments: Perfect spot.
reviews/9/comments: Beautiful home, clean and great location! Walking distance to stores, restaurants, and ski resorts. Host is responsive and accomodating. Thank you Karin for sharing your home!

name: Core Luxury Condo! Walking to everything!
reviews/0/comments: a wonderful stay in a lovely location. solid communication.
reviews/1/comments: This is our 2nd year using this home and we loved it. Location is great and modern amenities in the home. Owner and house manager are so helpful which makes the stay so easy.
reviews/2/comments: We loved eating breakfast on the patio and taking in the magnificent view! What a great start for every day! We had a fabulous stay at your place!
reviews/3/comments: Beautiful, well-appointed 2 bedroom/2 bath condo. Super easy walk into town. We really enjoyed the private outdoor space. The kitchen had everything we needed to prepare nice meals, and having the gas grill was a huge bonus. We all thoroughly enjoyed our stay here!
reviews/4/comments:
The condo is in an excellent location, located near a park on a quiet street and easily walkable to all of downtown Aspen.

The only unfortunate thing was that the outdoor area was incredibly filthy. The couch and table were caked in dirt and the floor was covered in leaves and brush from the trees. It took me an hour of wiping things down to make it livable. You would think that seeing the weather forecast (mid 70s for our whole stay) the owner would have had this cleaned prior to our arrival.

Also, there were basic things missing from the house that we had to purchase (soap for the downstairs bathroom and a sponge to wash dishes).
reviews/4/response:
Gosh, sorry your experience wasn’t as expected. I wish you would have messaged me, the drawer next to sink is full of new sponges and the bin in laundry room full of supplies (soap, shampoo etc). I could have led you in the right direction. I’m very responsive.

Unfortunately Aspen weather can be unpredictable. The spring wind can destroy outdoor spaces in a manner of minutes. Again, I would have had maintenance over immediately to clean had I known. I will defiantly bring this to my property managers attention. I pride myself on a clean unit.
reviews/5/comments: Beautiful cozy condo walking distance to everything. Julianne great host. Well appointed, we had lots of fun and hope to visit again!
reviews/6/comments: We had a wonderful stay here. Julianne was a gracious and responsive host and the set up made us feel like we were in a home away from home. Thank you!
reviews/7/comments: This is a terrific, stylish place with unobstructed views to the mountain, an amazing deck, and comfortable, high end modern furniture. Location in town is almost unbeatable. There were a couple of small maintenance issues when we were there but Julianne was very easy to reach. Would absolutely recommend.
reviews/8/comments: Great host, very responsive and flexible with bookings. A beautiful unit with a warm and inviting mood. Thanks again for the great stay.
reviews/9/comments: Perfect location with amazing view of Aspen Mountain!  I highly recommend!

name: Luxurious Oversized 1 BR - Aspen Core - Aspen Mountain Views
reviews/0/comments: Great location & beautiful accomodations with everything needed to make it comfortable for several days!  Thank you
reviews/1/comments: Exactly as described.  Roomier than the pictures.
reviews/2/comments: Amazing space in the perfect location in Aspen. Walking distance from all the best parts of town + just a block’s stroll away from a beautiful riverside park. Ali was the perfect host!
reviews/3/comments: Great spot! Excellent walkable location and clean, attractive apt. Would definitely stay again.
reviews/4/comments: Perfect spot with great value in Aspen! Very short walking distance to everywhere you will go. Modern finishes and touches of a high-end luxury hotel without the Aspen hotel prices!  Loved the amazing kitchen and dining room as well.
reviews/5/comments: Wonderful Chic spot in Aspen. Close enough to comfortably walk to everything in Aspen while also being quiet at night for restful relaxation. Host was impressively attentive in communication and answering questions we had about the town. Would recommend to anyone wanting a getaway in the heart of Aspen.
reviews/6/comments: Great spot in town! Very comfortable large one BR with lots of closet space and a wonderful view of the slopes!
reviews/7/comments: Very easy to communicate with and such a beautiful alternative to any hotel in downtown Aspen.  Amazing location and place
reviews/8/comments: Great location with all of the amenities. Very nice!
reviews/9/comments: Great apartment, really prompt reply. Enjoyed the restaurants Ali recommended!

name: Spacious & Bright Slopeside Ajax Loft
reviews/0/comments: Great trip and good option to stay in Aspen.
reviews/1/comments: We loved this place! The location was amazing for my 40th birthday trip in Aspen.
reviews/2/comments:
Overall, the stay was fine.
Easy walk to Aspen town so quite a nice location.
comfortable living area, MBR and bath was very nice.
Secondary BR was comfortable as well but not spacious.
Nice feature is there are 2 full baths and a powder room in BR 3. Very useful.
BR 3 is up a spiral staircase that prohibits mere mortals from carrying up luggage! Super tight. Good for kids but as adults staying there, not so good! Also, WIDE open to the living area so no privacy.
Ian was responsive by phone to the few questions we had upon check in. Good thing as there is no onsite management for this unit.
Note: only one parking space provided. Other cars need to get a street parking pass for $8 per day. Not a big deal as that is common but would’ve been good to know ahead of time.
Pool area was useful with a grill, table, chairs, towels provided. Well kept.
We used the kitchen quite a bit to prepare meals and found it well stocked. Grill tools did not include a spatula. Lost most hair on my knuckles when turning over burgers!
Unit was Cleaned very nicely on arrival.
Best parts of the condo is the location close to town, Master BR and living area.
Would not recommend for all adults as described above on the 3rd BR.
Would stay there again with a smaller group as we had 6 adults and BR 3 was a challenge and twin beds and open loft to living area.
reviews/3/comments:
Fantastic Condo within walking distance of just about everything!
Beds were all super comfortable! We couldn’t have asked for anything more! Would definitely book again!
reviews/4/comments: Great condo in a great location - well equipt, and Ian was super responsive.
reviews/5/comments: Excellent location but was underwhelmed by the units upkeep.
reviews/6/comments: Great location. Worked well for 5 people.
reviews/7/comments: Ian’s  was an absolutely wonderful host! This condo is in the perfect location near the ski resort and walkable to the downtown area. We had an absolutely wonderful time and wish we could have stayed longer!
reviews/8/comments: Ian was a fantastic communicator. We really enjoyed our stay and the location is top notch. High recommend!!
reviews/9/comments: All good!  Thanks Ian!

name: Walk to town! 35% off 30+ days 4/4.5 All King Beds
reviews/0/comments:
The house was very well set up. We really appreciated the thoughtful amenities provided by Rob and his wife. The location was perfect to get into the downtown and all the local shops are fairly walking distance.
We were a total of 10 people including 3 toddlers and it was a blast! Thank you for the wonderful memories.
reviews/1/comments: This trip was not for me but was for my colleagues-- Rob was a very responsive and helpful host and my colleagues really enjoyed their stay!
reviews/2/comments: This home is perfect! It is spacious and bright. Perfectly located with views of Aspen mountain. It's a 10-15 minute walk from anywhere in Aspen. Rob, the host, was extremely responsive. He helped accommodate all of our needs throughout our stay. They also left a booklet with recommendation of restaurants and shops throughout town. I would highly suggest this home for your next stay in Aspen!
reviews/3/comments: Everything was great clean place well kept very satisfied
reviews/4/comments: Lovely house in an excellent area of Aspen. Sweet neighbors, safe, and can’t beat the proximity to town. Plenty of towels and sheets, and the hosts are very quick to respond to questions and  are very accommodating to requests. My sister-in-law’s Aspen bachelorette will be a great memory for all of us!
reviews/5/comments: enjoyable
reviews/6/comments: GREAT house on the east end of town right before heading out to Independent Pass. Short walk into the center of town. They have bikes for your use, which was super helpful and helmets too. If there was anything that was wrong Rob and Jenny were on it right away. They were very responsive hosts in every way, even when there was a lot of needs when we first got there. Stayed for a month and wished I could have stayed longer.
reviews/7/comments: Great stay!
reviews/8/comments: Beautiful home with stunning views!
reviews/9/comments: We had an amazing time spending our weekend in Jenny & Rob’s home. It was spacious and clean with all the comforts one may need. Super close access into town (we walked everywhere) and the supermarket is right down the street. Highly recommend!

name: Distinctive Aspen Rental. Balcony, Wood FP. Views.
reviews/0/comments: Great apartment but FYI for those who don’t travel light… you’ll be carrying your suitcase up three flights of stairs.

reviews/0/comments: The condo was in an awesome location and was exactly as it was presented in the photos. Communication was easy and they even worked with us on extending our stay when we got snowed in and our flights were canceled. I'd book here again for sure.

name: Top of the Village Summit 305: Ski in Ski Out
Amazing Remodeled Home on the Roaring Fork River
reviews/0/comments:
Ten minutes to everywhere. Super clean. Super nice. Last minute booking was accepted enthusiastically.

Awesome view!
reviews/1/comments: Please use attachment sent to Sarah for details.
reviews/2/comments: This place is ideally located between Aspen in Snowmass. Perfect place to stay for a ski trip. Located on the roaring fork river and definitely took advantage of the Jacuzzi and fireplace
reviews/3/comments:
We rented this house for two families traveling with our adult children. It was fabulous! Large and comfortable for our group of twelve. No expense was spared in the remodel. All high end cookware, grill, bedding, furniture, Sonos speakers throughout, etc. Lots of sitting areas with plenty of chairs and benches you could move around to fit a lot of people. You could tell the owners put thought into this house. The added bonus was the finished basement with ping pong, shuffle board, basketball, fuse ball , couches, TV, bunk beds and a full bath. If you have children trust me you would never see them upstairs.
The balconies and windows offer a beautiful view of Woody Creek and the mountains. The location was ideal. A short drive to all four ski resorts, Snowmass being the closest ( my personal favorite). I can only imagine how beautiful it is in the summer.
reviews/4/comments: The home is gorgeous and the location is ideal. We had a great time with our family and friends. The kids had a ball in their own space in the lower level. The view from the hot tub is one I will never forget. Sarah was great - responsive and helpful. I couldn’t recommend this place more!
reviews/5/comments: Sarah is very responsive and helpful. The location is wonderful and so close to the bike and walking trail. Enjoying a cup of coffee by the river was the best way to start the day!
reviews/6/comments: Terrific house with lots of space and a great play room for kids (ping pong, foosball, pop-a-shot). Beautiful living room and plenty of space to eat and relax. Great location near the river and just 20 minutes to downtown. Bring your own spices if you like to cook (such as salt, pepper, sugar). The large kitchen is lovely and the outdoor grill is great. The house is truly lovely.
reviews/7/comments: This house is truly magnificent. It was by far the best ski house I've ever stayed at and I look forward to the opportunity to do it again!
reviews/8/comments: Such a beautiful home with spectacular views.  Sarah was a great host!  There were 12 of us and it was the perfect home for all of us to be together and also have our own space.  Definitely a home we hope to visit again!
reviews/9/comments: Sarah's home is a incredible place to stay for your get away to Aspen. The home is beautiful and accommodating to large parties. I would recommend her home to anyone looking for a peaceful mountain vacation.

name: Charming 3-bedroom home on Red Mountain w hot tub
reviews/0/comments: Amanda has the upmost professionalism. She was able to work with me in finding the perfect dwelling for my stay and Aspen!. She is punctual and thoughtful and was an absolute pleasure to work with. I recommend working with Amanda and or her property at any given time in the future. Thank you again and I hope to see you soon.
reviews/0/response: Please come visit us again!

name: Exquisite 3-Bedroom Condo in Aspen's Core
Woodrun Place ~ Ski-In/Ski-Out ~ 3 Bedroom Condo
Beautiful Aspen Family Home perfect whole family
reviews/0/comments: Great place. Everyone enjoyed their stay!
reviews/0/response: Thank you so much for the nice review, Karen.  We're so glad that your whole party enjoyed staying in the home, and look forward to seeing you again!
reviews/1/comments: Charles did an excellent job coordinating the return of my friend's jewelry that was left behind at the house. That was going above and beyond and I really appreciate it. Unfortunately, our whole group was really disappointed with a terrible sewer odor due to a washer clog. I raised the issue twice in the airbnb chat with Charles and he did not acknowledge it and when I reached the 'emergency' line with the management company, Bill suggested that we "open some windows and let it air out".  The strong sewer smell was a major problem for the majority of our stay and it really impacted our stay.  I would really appreciate further communication and a partial refund since the whole house had a terrible sewer smell from the plumbing backup at the washer. I don't blame Charles or the management company for a plumbing problem, but I think their lack of response or reimbursement is unfair.
reviews/1/response:
Hi Randy,
Thank you again for staying with us. It was a pleasure hosting you. Your group arrived on Wednesday and departed on Sunday morning. Our office phone line is an emergency line after 5:00 when our office closes. Bill is our maintenance supervisor, he received your message Friday evening, 2 days into your stay. Your message stated, “it was not really an emergency but there is a strong sewer smell.” Bill returned your phone call and had to leave a message because it went to voicemail. Bill’s message stated, “we’ve never had any issues with this before, not sure what is going on, open some windows and call me back if it persists.” NO one from your group called back that night to say the odor was still present. No one from your group called back the following day to say there was a sewer smell. Because there was no contact from you for almost 24 hours, we were unaware you were still experiencing issues. We did not hear back from you until right before 5:00, the night before your departure. You contacted us, through the Airbnb thread, inquiring if we spoke with Bill on the emergency line?” Your next contact was later that evening, after hours, stating, “you had spoken with Bill, and he told you to open the windows.” These were your messages. You never called our office, or Bill on the emergency line to say you were still experiencing a smell. We were unaware.
The very next day, the housekeeper cleaned the home, after your departure, and reported- no smell. The owner resides in the home when it isn’t rented. We contacted the owner first thing Monday morning to see if she smelled anything or if either one of the washers had issues. The owner reported no smell, and both washers worked fine. The owner has been in the home, since your departure, without a sewer smell. We did not respond back with our discoveries on Sunday or Monday because you had departed and it wasn’t a big enough issue for you to call the emergency line, as requested, if the smell persisted. We contacted you about the jewelry.
I do apologize for the delayed response this time. I needed to do my due diligence by researching and contacting all parties involved, on our side, before my response. Our maintenance supervisor, Bill, the housekeeper, the reservationist who worked in the office over the weekend, and the owner, all reconfirmed the above.
There will be no reimbursement or discount issued.
Thanks again.
Charles
reviews/2/comments: Super helpful hosts and a great place to stay for a large group
reviews/3/comments: This home is great for families and large groups. Wonderful neighborhood location close to downtown Aspen.
reviews/4/comments: Our family of 8 throughly enjoyed our stay. The host is very responsive and even helped us out with increasing our WiFi speed during our stay while a majority of us were working from home. It is an older home and similar to many others in the area does not have air conditioning which would have been nice during the first week of our stay in the evenings as even though the air outside was cold it was tough to get that to circulate through the home. With the 3 bedrooms downstairs you can hear quite a bit of noise even just walking from anyone that is on the second level. Even with those minor notes we enjoyed our stay so much that we wanted to extend it. The neighborhood is absolutely stunning with various parks, trails, river outlooks, and gorgeous homes all within walking distance.
reviews/5/comments:
Great house , perfect for kids .
Good location.,
reviews/6/comments: Charles place was in a great location, close to the rio grande trail which takes you right into town. It’s also steps from the public bus that’s free and runs into town in 5 minutes. The house gave us plenty of space to have some amazing quality time with our family. We especially enjoyed the outdoor space and the walking trail which leads up to the mountain for beautiful views. Definitely a great place for a big group!
reviews/7/comments: Fantastic stay! Highly recommended. The house huge and easily fits 18 people. Fully equipped kitchen. You can cook in the house. The hot tub is amazing. You can conveniently order an Uber or take the shuttle (5 min) into town. The neighborhood is very exclusive and quiet. The management company was extremely professional and very responsive.  I stayed with 18 people for 5 nights for Presidents’ Day weekend. Everyone loved it.
reviews/7/response: Thank you so much for staying with us! We are so happy all of you enjoyed your stay in Silver Kingdom. It is such a special place. We appreciate your persistence on the winter availability and your communication was exceptional. We hope you consider us again the future!

reviews/0/response: This Guest clearly didn't read the description and is the only review that seems to have not read that it's a 1BR/1 Bath unit. Bizarre. There are Co-hosts on Airbnb just so you understand how the platform works. Thanks and take care! name: Lakeside 1bd/ba, parking, kitchenette + workspace
reviews/0/comments: Chris is very accommodating and his responses are quick. It was a breeze to stay this weekend and we will try to stay with Chris again!
reviews/1/comments: awesome spot! super easy check in, great communication, and awesome location. Clean and comfortable!
reviews/2/comments: Everything was perfect! The check in was very easy, the bed was very comfortable, and it’s in a great location. I would recommend staying here!
reviews/3/comments: Was visiting my son who lives in Willits/Basalt and this was a perfect location. The room was clean and everything was as advertised. I had a couple of questions and response was very quick. I also left something  in the room and Chris worked with me so that my son could pick it up. I also needed a little early check in and Chris graciously allowed that. Chris also offered several hours late check out due to no new guest arriving that day. We were leaving at 6 AM to go to a hot air balloon launch so that allowed us to come back after the launch to gather our things and check out instead of doing it at 6 AM. I would definitely stay there again.
reviews/4/comments: I had a great stay at Chris’s place. Awesome location with super convenient access to grocery, dining, trails, etc. Chris was super hospitable and gave me recommendations on trails to ride on my mountain bike, where to eat, and really helped make my stay smooth and enjoyable. I will definitely look for this listing again whenever I return to the area. Thanks Chris!
reviews/5/comments: The place was really comfortable, clean and tidy. The wifi worked perfectly and the location was beautifull. 100% recommended
reviews/6/comments: This is a great stay within a short drive to Aspen! Also less than a 5 minute drive to some great biking trails. I had everything I needed for a comfortable visit and Chris was quick to respond with any answers or recommendations I was looking for. I enjoyed a sunset overlooking the water with the room provided picnic blanket too. Would stay again!
reviews/7/comments: Chris’s place was very clean and comfortable. Well equipped w toaster, microwave, mini fridge, coffee and tea. It had easy parking out front and easy access to restaurants and Whole Foods. Chris was very easy to communicate with before and during our stay. We really enjoyed our short stay.

reviews/6/comments: Eliza's place is a fantastic spot for ski vacations -- walk right out onto the mountain and glide down to Snowmass Village Center. The condo complex is great and the hot tubs are wonderful after a full day on the mountain.  The unit itself is well stocked with cookware and even has a grill outside. reviews/0/comments: Annie’s place was lovely- I highly recommend staying in a tiny home the next time you travel. We were cozy and comfortable and woke up to a beautiful sunrise. Location was easy to find too.
reviews/1/comments: What a view of sopris!

The stairs are as steep as they say, and both wifi and cell phone connectivity (we're t-mobile) were quite spotty, as was also noted in the description. We navigated both easily for a perfect respite, and loved every minute.
reviews/5/comments: An absolutely amazing place for every reason. The views, comfort, welcoming energy, cuteness factor, and experience.   I am an avid hiker and was enjoying the beautiful trails nearby before I checked into the cabin. I honestly just looking for a cute place to sleep for the night, and do some laundry.  My expectations we're met and exceeded!  I would visit the little bit again anytime.
reviews/6/comments: Great place, beautiful ranch. The small details were done well; our stay was nice. I would recommend not working at the place but there are a few coffee shops close that are good to work at.
reviews/7/comments: Nice place. Quiet and in a great location!
reviews/8/comments: We truly enjoyed our restful night on the ranch among the mountains and all of the stars.  We got to say good night and good morning to the cows when we unpacked and packed the car (they greeted us with moos). The house was exceptionally clean and well thought out - it didn’t feel tiny at all.  Perfect sleepover for hiking Maroon Bells…arrived there in less than an hour for the beautiful light of dawn on the maroon mountains.
reviews/9/comments: What an amazing place! This cute country cabin is perfectly located just a short drive to Aspen. Clean, peaceful and great views!

reviews/3/response: We would like to thank you for taking the time to share your review Emanuel! Please come back soon! - Snowmass Vacations
reviews/4/comments: Great vacation getaway! Super close to the village. My partner and I had a lot of space.
reviews/4/response: Thank you for your review Mahima! We are elated that you enjoyed your stay and we cannot wait for your next return! - Snowmass Vacations
reviews/5/comments: Peaceful and quiet. The studio is easy to get to in a beautiful setting. The accommodations are comfortable with everything you need for two people.
reviews/5/response: Thank you for your feedback Tamara. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the beautiful setting. We look forward to welcoming you back again. -Snowmass Vacations
reviews/6/comments: Just the right amount of space for me and my husband for a weekend in Snowmass. Cozy and clean.
reviews/6/response: Thank you for your review Wendy! It was a pleasure hosting you and we hope to welcome you back again soon. - Snowmass Vacations
reviews/7/comments: Great location. Clean and comfortable for 2 adults.
reviews/7/response: Thank you for your review Rodney! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the great location of the property. We look forward to hosting you again. - Snowmass Vacations
reviews/8/comments: Great location
reviews/8/response: Thank you for the feedback Caleb! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the location of the property. We look forward to hosting you again in the future. - Snowmass Vacations
reviews/9/comments: Great communication and location.
reviews/9/response: Thank you for your review Bobby! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our location and hope to welcome you back soon! - Snowmass Vacations

name: Colorful Cabin w/ Teepee, Fire Pits & Mtn Views!
reviews/0/comments: Great location, friendly neighbors.
reviews/1/comments: Walk from house to lake, trails and bbq!
reviews/2/comments:
This little cabin and wigwam were perfect for our little mini-moon getaway. After our wedding ceremony, we were looking to escape to the mountains and this stay in Marble was perfect. We were able to walk to trails from the cabin itself, and the BBQ down the road was fantastic!

We will certainly be returning, as this was such a peaceful and beautiful environment to be in.
reviews/3/comments: This place was what we needed. No internet,  tv or cell reception.  Nice walks, views and the place was comfortable.
reviews/4/comments: Wonderful place to stay walking distance to a fabulous bbq place.
reviews/5/comments:
Just gorgeous! A perfect place to stay. I didn’t know much about Marble, but the surrounding area was beautiful. You can enjoy nature from the porch, and there’s so many special spots nearby as well.
I visited the Thomas Lakes trail, definitely recommend. Wish I stayed longer!
reviews/6/comments: The cabin was just adorable. The murphy bed is comfortable and the bed upstairs was also very nice. Plenty of blankets and pillows to go around. Kitchen was very well stocked with everything you'd need. Very cute and comfy. The teepee was especially cool, with plenty of seating and a little firepit perfect for smores. We had a great time and the locals were very nice. There is no gas station and no store to buy groceries, but there is a popular BBQ restaurant and coffee shop-where you can get wifi if you need it. Marble is absolutely gorgeous and perfect for getting away from it all.
reviews/7/comments: We had a blast at this beautiful cabin. Marble is a delightful destination where you can fully unplug. This cabin was a great spot to relax and launch adventures nearby.
reviews/8/comments: Great place to stay. Good walk to the lake. Teepee was fun to have a fire in and the beds were comfy! We will be coming back :)
reviews/9/comments: Great spot for an unplugged getaway! Only wish we had better luck with the weather

name: 3 Minutes to Ski
reviews/0/comments: Easy going and nice to stay! Really nice hosts.
reviews/1/comments: Bryan is an incredible host and has a wonderful place!  The communication was flawless and he is truly a super host!  Highly recommend.
reviews/2/comments: Very nice place great hospitality!
reviews/3/comments:
Really very caring owner!! Cozy room, very comfortable bed, great sleep!! Recommend 100%!!!
Thank you Bryan! 👍🏻
reviews/4/comments: Bryan is a great host.  Home is clean, quiet, and artfully decorated.  Would stay again.
reviews/5/comments: A great place with a great host I highly recommend.
reviews/6/comments: Great location and friendly Host!   The unit is very cozy and very close to the base of Snowmass    Bryan was very accommodative .   Always have fun in the Aspen Snowmass area
reviews/7/comments: Bryan was quick to reply to questions, very convenient location in Snowmass Village, walkable to restaurant and market, indescribably beautiful piece of Colorado
reviews/8/comments: Bryan is an amazing host! I felt incredibly welcomed and they gave a lot of great locations for hiking when I asked. the room is well taken care of as well. I would suggest this airbnb to any one staying in the area!
reviews/9/comments: Very friendly host, nice place. Would definitely recommend

name: Private riverfront property minutes from town
reviews/0/comments:
I’m almost hesitant to write this review since it’s such a hidden gem! Jon and Carly were amazing hosts along with their little one, Brooks!

The location can’t be beat! The accommodations were very clean and the outdoor deck on the river is amazing. This exceeded our expectations and we will be back for sure!
reviews/1/comments: Carly and Jon were great hosts! We loved their spot, near everything in town
reviews/2/comments: This home was the perfect location for the 4th of July weekend. Very clean and great views from the balcony. Would definitely stay here again!
reviews/3/comments: We had such a great time at this place and would highly recommend it. The location right on the river and being able to hear the running water and walk the path along the river was great. They are great hosts, the amenities are nice and very comfortable, and they were incredibly responsive. I would highly recommend. Glenwood, it is such a great town and loved checking out Carbondale, Basalt, and spending time in Aspen.
reviews/4/comments:
Beautiful one bedroom walkout located along the Roaring Fork River.
The owners live on the property and respond very quickly to emails. Would highly recommend!
reviews/5/comments: Great location and value - very clean and spacious. Gas stove plus lots of cooking utensils, great views and easy access to river. Plus Jon was very quick to respond and help. Would stay again in a heartbeat.
reviews/6/comments: Great place
reviews/7/comments: Great and relaxing spot with an amazing deck and great access to The Roaring Fork River.
reviews/8/comments: We used Jon and Carly's place for an Aspen/ Glenwood Springs ski season base.  We enjoyed the view of the roaring fork river right outside the door, walked the trail along the river most mornings and fly fished with gear they graciously provided.  Plenty of room and great kitchen.  Close to town for easy access to restaurants, hot springs and shopping.
reviews/9/comments: Amazing place, super clean and much bigger than it appears in the photos, the owners are very kind and communicative and patient because I don't speak English very well lol …without a doubt our best vacation… and very well located.

name: 🌲Hot Tub~Pool~WiFi~Ski-in/out~Local Shuttle~Timberline Studio, Deluxe~Unit 216🌲
reviews/0/comments: Very clean and comfortable stay. The description listed two sofa beds but only one was in the room. That presented a slight problem for our group. The room was well equipped - everything you’d need for cooking a meal. We enjoyed our time there
reviews/1/comments:
This is a fantastic place to stay! The location is great, just outside of Aspen, but also where it sits in Snowmass; in the back of the village and sits up high with some good views off the back porch and great morning sunrise that hits the porch.

The room itself has every accommodation you'll need and gives off great mountain vibes that made the trip even better. There's a pool and hot tub right out back as well. There's an amazing German restaurant right there on the second floor that had fantastic food and there was a nice bar as well...added plus to walk down the hall and grab a drink!

Check-in was very easy and efficient and the people at the front desk were polite, helpful and informative.
reviews/2/comments: Great place to stay in the Aspen/Snowmass Village area. Staff is great at communication and very helpful. Room is clean, spacious and perfect for 1-3 people. Kitchen is well-equipped with toaster, mini-fridge, cups, glasses, plates, microwave, coffee machine and whatnot. Loved it!
reviews/3/comments: Staff was very friendly, helpful, and responsive.
reviews/4/comments: Cute and cozy. Staff is was very accommodating and helpful. Just what we expected.
reviews/5/comments: Cozy Cool place to stay
reviews/5/response: Like you, Luis, many guests comment on feeling "cozy" in the Timberline spaces. We're pleased you chose to stay with us.
reviews/6/comments: Incredibly convenient location and great staff.
reviews/6/response: Good to hear you enjoyed it here, Matteo. Will share your compliments with the Timberline staff.
reviews/7/comments: This place was so great! Perfect for a small group. Easy check in process with front desk. Hot tub was big and nice! The location was the best part - you're able to hop on and ski Snowmass in a matter of 30 seconds from the place. Fun view watching skiers go by. Would definitely stay again!
reviews/8/comments: 10 outta 10 recommend. Best part is no kids in the Hot Tub!

name: Beautiful Mountain Views in Iconic Building
reviews/0/comments: Nice location, cozy stay!
reviews/1/comments: This is a great place to stay in Leadville! It’s beautiful and well appointed, and I had a great experience. Loved the little private sauna! Be ready for the walk up the fire escape, but it was no big deal for me! Communication was great and everything was easy! Great location and easy parking, too!
reviews/2/comments: Great location. Very quiet, clean, comfortable place.
reviews/3/comments: This was a lovely flat with amazing views. It was a fun mix of old architecture with modern style. I would absolutely stay again. 10/10
reviews/4/comments: This place is great! Would highly recommend staying with Alex & Nadim!
reviews/5/comments: Beautiful space with high ceilings and great views. Good location and interesting history.
reviews/6/comments: Excellent place. We have stayed at Alex and Nadim’s other place in Leadville several times. They always have quality places that don’t disappoint ! We will be back! Thank you!
reviews/7/comments: Beautiful historic building with tons of charm. The hosts were very responsive and great communicators. Great location in town.
reviews/8/comments: This space was perfect for what we needed and was in the perfect location, as we were guests for a wedding at Freight! Alex & Nadim were super communicative and accommodating! The space was very clean and true to the listing! A perfect mountain getaway!!
reviews/9/comments:
Alex and Nadim’s Leadville condo is the perfect getaway for outdoor enthusiasts. Close to the mineral belt trail for cycling on the fly and easy access to numerous other hiking and biking trails. Easy walk into town for coffee, eateries and provisions.
Really enjoyed my stay. Hosts very responsive. Decor in this 19th century building made for an all around great stay! Thanks so much!

name: Hus Eventur- Jetted Tub, Dog Friendly, in Town
reviews/0/comments: Very cute and inviting Victorian accommodation. Clean, orderly, and charming!  Beautiful private little garden area out front with fountain and seating area.  Easy to find, even in the dark b/c of tasteful lighting out front. Very nice, thoughtful host.
reviews/1/comments: Absolutely enjoyed our stay here! The garden is so peaceful and dreamy. Great location with a quick walk to the downtown center. Cozy, quiet, and quaint. Loved this place!
reviews/2/comments: Loved this place! It was so cozy and quiet.
reviews/3/comments: Excellent location, near downtown and mineral trail
reviews/4/comments: Brandy’s place is a beautiful, unique place that we enjoyed while staying in Leadville. It was super close to downtown. Everything was clean. Brandy also provided some snacks. The garden area was amazing with all the different flowers and plants. The jacuzzi tub was wonderful as well. We will definitely stay again in the future and recommend everyone to stay here while in Leadville.
reviews/5/comments: This was such a charming old home. There are a few rules posted throughout the house, but once you realize it's because the home is almost 200 years old, it's very easy to see why. We found it to be perfect for two, especially at the price point. We walked downtown to grab food every night, it was very close to everything! 5 stars, Brandy was an excellent host.
reviews/6/comments: This is a great place for a couple traveling needing a quaint and comfortable space to relax.  Very nice decor, beautiful garden space and comfortable bed.  Much better than a hotel room
reviews/7/comments:
Great location. Situated at 10000+ feet elevation close to trail heads for Mt Elbert and not too far from Vail or Aspen, this airbnb is great for those continuing to these places, and also for those acclimatizing to the altitude. The stay is very comfortable, with a modern TV (with Prime, etc) and a comfy jetted tub. It was much needed after a long hike.

If there were to be any downsides, we would say that the immediate neighborhood does not look ideal. However, it is just 2-3 blocks away from the downtown street where it feels much safer. Also, if you are from any sizable town east of the Mississippi River, the neighborhood here is likely to be safer than your neighborhood.
reviews/8/comments: Fantastic place! Perfect, private location in the heart of Leadville. Highly recommend staying with Brandy
reviews/9/comments: Absolutely loved this place! Within walking distance of downtown and easy drive to beautiful lakes and hikes

name: 🌲Hot Tub~Pool~WiFi~Ski-in/out~Local Shuttle~Timberline Studio Loft, Standard~Unit 301🌲
reviews/1/comments: It was a great experience! Enjoyed staying there.
reviews/2/comments: Great location! Perfect stay for a family of 3 or 4. Check in was easy and the stay was clean and tidy upon arrival. We plan to stay here again next time we visit Snowmass!
reviews/3/comments: We enjoyed our stay- the building is a little older but everything is clean and kept well. The unit has housekeeping service which was nice, we enjoyed the pool and game rooms and the shuttle was great to utilize for the rodeo.
reviews/4/comments: Timberline provided a comfortable stay along with a gorgeous view.
reviews/5/comments: Great ski in ski out condo.
reviews/6/comments: Great location and amenities. Would stay again!
reviews/7/comments: Great space! The staff was extremely accommodating from the beginning to the end with our luggage, customer service and car/snow assistance! Very much appreciated! Great first time in Colorado!
